law_content: Theoretical phonetics is a branch of linguistics that studies the production, transmission, and perception of speech sounds. This course aims to teach students the basic theories and methods of phonetics, helping them understand the construction and variation of speech sounds, as well as the relationship between speech sounds and language. The course covers important concepts and principles such as units of speech, syllable structure, phoneme theory, phonetic variation, and phonetic classification. Through theoretical discussions and phonetic experiments, students will learn fundamental skills and knowledge for conducting research and analysis in phonetics, laying a foundation for further study of speech and language.
zh_law_content: 理论语音学是语言学的一个分支，研究语音的产生、传播和感知。本课程旨在教授学生语音学的基本理论和方法，帮助学生理解语音的构造和变化规律，以及语音与语言间的关系。课程内容涵盖语音的单位、音节结构、音位理论、音变规律、语音分类等重要概念和原则。通过理论探讨和语音实验，学生将学习到从事语音学研究和分析的基本技能和知识，为进一步研究语音和语言提供了基础。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts and theories of linear algebra, as well as its importance in mathematics and various applications. Students will learn about vector spaces, matrices, linear equations, eigenvectors, and eigenvalues, and understand the geometric interpretations of linear transformations and linear systems of equations. They will also acquire knowledge of the algebraic representations of linear transformations and the rules of matrix operations. Additionally, the course will discuss the applications of linear algebra in other mathematical disciplines such as numerical computation, optimization problems, and differential equations. Through the study of this course, students will develop strong skills in mathematical analysis and computation, laying a solid foundation for their future studies and research in other disciplines.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍线性代数的基本概念和理论，以及其在数学和应用领域的重要性。学生通过学习，将会掌握向量空间、矩阵、线性方程组、特征值与特征向量等基本概念，了解线性变换和线性方程组的几何意义，掌握线性变换的代数表示和矩阵的运算法则等。同时，课程还将讲解线性代数在其他数学学科中的应用，如数值计算、最优化问题、微分方程等。通过课程的学习，学生将具备较强的数学分析和计算能力，为日后在其它学科的学习和研究打下坚实的基础。

law_content: This course explores the development and evolution of American history, with a focus on important events and figures in American society, politics, economy, and culture. By studying this course, students will be able to understand the origins of American history, the colonial period, the Revolutionary War, the Civil War, and the World Wars. They will also gain in-depth knowledge of the American political system, constitution, human rights, and democratic values. Additionally, this course introduces the development of American culture and analyzes its impact on the world. Through reading historical documents, watching films and television shows, and discussing historical issues, students will improve their critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
zh_law_content: 本课程讲述美国历史的发展与演变，着重探讨美国的社会、政治、经济和文化方面的重要事件和人物。通过学习本课程，学生将能够了解美国的历史起源、殖民时期、独立战争、内战、世界大战等重要历史事件，深入了解美国的政治体制、宪法、人权和民主价值观。同时，本课程还将介绍美国文化的发展，并分析其对世界的影响。通过阅读历史文献、观看影视作品和讨论历史问题，学生将能够提高批判性思维和分析问题的能力。

law_content: This course introduces the basic concepts and research methods of Chinese archaeology, including the origin, development, and characteristics of archaeology as a discipline. Through this course, students will gain an understanding of the main research topics and methods in Chinese archaeology, and acquire a grasp of the fundamental theories and techniques in the field. Additionally, students will also learn about the evolution and development of ancient Chinese culture. The course will also provide an overview of the current status and future development direction of Chinese archaeology, cultivating students' interest in and research capabilities in the field. Through field visits and literature research, students will acquire practical skills in archaeological operations and data analysis, laying a foundation for future research in archaeology.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍中国考古学的基本概念和研究方法，包括考古学的起源、发展和学科特点。通过学习，学生将了解中国考古学的主要研究内容和方法，掌握考古学领域的基本理论和技术，了解中国古代文化的演变和发展。课程还将介绍中国考古学的发展现状和未来发展方向，培养学生对考古学的兴趣和研究能力。通过实地考察和文献研究，学生将掌握考古学的实践操作和数据分析技能，为以后从事考古学研究打下基础。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic theories and methods of regional archaeology, helping students understand the application and research significance of archaeology in specific areas. By studying regional archaeology, students will gain basic skills in archaeological site exploration, excavation, and analysis, and understand the scope and objectives of regional archaeological research. The course also explores the relationship between archaeological culture and human society, as well as the importance of archaeological research for the study of human history and culture. Through practice and case studies, students will develop scientific thinking and research abilities, laying a foundation for future careers in archaeological research or related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍区域考古的基本理论和方法，帮助学生了解考古学在特定地区的应用及其研究意义。通过学习区域考古，学生将掌握考古遗址勘探、发掘和分析的基本技术，了解区域考古学的研究范围和目标。同时，课程还将探讨考古文化与人类社会的关系，以及考古研究对于人类历史和文化研究的重要性。通过实践和案例研究，学生将培养出科学思维和研究能力，为未来从事考古学研究或相关领域的工作打下基础。

law_content: This course is a specialized course on Chinese cinema. Through studying, students will gain an understanding of the development history of Chinese cinema, the current state of the film industry, representative works of Chinese cinema, and the influence of Chinese cinema domestically and internationally. The course will also explore the artistic characteristics, cultural connotations, and the relationship between Chinese cinema and society and the zeitgeist. By watching and analyzing classic Chinese films, students will be able to further enhance their understanding and appreciation of Chinese cinema, and to express their personal opinions and insights based on it. The objective of this course is to cultivate students' interest and love for Chinese cinema, as well as to improve their aesthetic ability and critical thinking skills.
zh_law_content: 本课程是关于中国电影的专题课程。通过学习，学生将了解中国电影的发展历史、电影产业的现状、中国电影的代表作品以及中国电影在国内外的影响等方面的内容。课程还将探讨中国电影的艺术特点、文化内涵以及与社会和时代的关系。通过观看和分析经典的中国电影作品，学生能够进一步提升对中国电影的理解和欣赏能力，并能够据此发表个人观点和见解。本课程旨在培养学生对中国电影的兴趣和热爱，以及提高他们的审美能力和批判思维能力。

law_name: 中国政治与公共政策英文
law_content: This course is an introductory course on Chinese politics and public policy that is conducted in English. The main objective of the course is to equip students with a thorough understanding of China's political system, which includes its structure, functioning, and important participants. Additionally, the course delves into different public policy concerns within China, such as economic growth, social welfare, and environmental preservation. In this course, students will critically analyze and assess the major political and policy obstacles that China faces, as well as the strategies and actions implemented to address them.
zh_law_content: This course offers an introduction to Chinese politics and public policy in English. It aims to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the political system in China, including its structure, processes, and key actors. The course also explores various public policy issues in China, such as economic development, social welfare, and environmental protection. Students will analyze and evaluate the major political and policy challenges facing China, as well as the strategies and measures adopted by the government. Through this course, students will enhance their knowledge and critical thinking skills in the field of Chinese politics and public policy.

law_content: This course aims to improve students' English writing skills and develop their language expression abilities and critical thinking skills. Through studying different types of English writing, such as argumentative essays, expository essays, and narrative essays, students will learn how to organize and express their own ideas, improving the accuracy of their writing logic and grammar. The course will also introduce common writing techniques and strategies, such as brainstorming, revising, and editing, to help students improve their writing efficiency and quality. In addition, students will cultivate sensitivity to language styles and rhetorical devices through reading and analyzing excellent English works. Through extensive writing practice and interactive discussions, students will gradually enhance their English writing proficiency.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在提高学生的英语写作能力，培养学生的语言表达能力和批判性思维能力。通过学习不同类型的英语写作（如议论文、说明文、记叙文等），学生将学会如何组织和表达自己的想法，提高写作逻辑和语法的准确性。课程还将介绍常用的写作技巧和策略，如构思、修改和编辑等，以帮助学生提高写作效率和质量。此外，学生还将通过阅读和分析优秀的英语作品，培养对语言风格和修辞手法的敏感性。通过大量的写作练习和互动讨论，学生将逐步提升自己的英语写作水平。

law_content: Intellectual Property Law is a legal system aimed at protecting and maintaining intellectual property, which includes patent law, trademark law, copyright law, etc. This course mainly explains the basic concepts, legal principles, and practical operations of intellectual property, enabling students to understand the legal system and related regulations of intellectual property, and grasp knowledge and skills in aspects such as application, examination, protection, and rights enforcement of intellectual property. Through this course, students will become familiar with the legal framework and system of intellectual property, understand the importance of intellectual property protection, and master the practical application and management of intellectual property, laying a solid foundation for future work in related fields.
zh_law_content: 知识产权法是以保护和维护知识产权为目的的法律体系，包括专利法、商标法、著作权法等。本课程主要讲解知识产权的基本概念、法律原理和实践操作，使学生能够了解知识产权的法律制度和相关法规，掌握知识产权的申请、审查、保护和维权等方面的知识和技能。通过本课程的学习，学生将能够熟悉知识产权的法律框架和制度，了解知识产权保护的重要性，掌握知识产权的实际运用和管理，为日后从事相关领域的工作打下坚实的基础。

law_name: 社科文献资源与检索利用
law_content: This course introduces the classification and characteristics of social science literature resources, as well as related retrieval and utilization methods. Through this course, students will understand the sources, forms, and organizational methods of social science literature resources, and master the usage skills of common social science literature databases and their retrieval tools. They will also learn the basic principles and steps of literature retrieval. Additionally, this course will cover methods and techniques for obtaining and utilizing social science literature resources, including literature borrowing, reading and excerpting, writing and referencing literature, etc. Through practice and case analysis, students will develop their literature retrieval and utilization abilities, and enhance their academic literacy and research capabilities.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍社科文献资源的分类和特点，以及相关的检索和利用方法。通过学习，学生将了解社科文献资源的来源、形式和组织方式，掌握常见的社科文献数据库及其检索工具的使用技巧，学习文献检索的基本原则和步骤。同时，本课程还将介绍如何获取和利用社科文献资源，包括文献借阅、文献阅读与摘录、文献写作与引用等方面的方法和技巧。通过实践和案例分析，培养学生的文献检索和利用能力，提高学生的学术素养和科研能力。

law_name: 知识服务组织的管理创新
law_content: This course aims to cultivate students' theoretical and practical abilities in innovative management of knowledge service organizations. By introducing the basic concepts, development history, and management models of knowledge service organizations, it helps students understand the important role of knowledge service organizations in social development. Additionally, the course will focus on the theories and methods of management innovation in knowledge service organizations, including knowledge management, information management, and human resource management, helping students master modern management theories and practices. Furthermore, through case analysis and practical demonstrations, this course will cultivate students' problem-solving skills and innovative thinking, improving their practical operational abilities. By studying this course, students will be able to engage in management work in the field of knowledge service organizations and contribute to their development.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在培养学生对知识服务组织管理创新的理论和实践能力。通过介绍知识服务组织的基本概念、发展历程和管理模式，帮助学生了解知识服务组织在社会发展中的重要作用。同时，课程还将重点讲解知识服务组织的管理创新理论和方法，包括知识管理、信息管理、人力资源管理等内容，帮助学生掌握现代管理理论和实践。此外，课程还将通过案例分析和实践论证，培养学生的问题解决能力和创新思维，提高学生的实际操作能力。通过学习本课程，学生将能够在知识服务组织相关职业领域从事管理工作，为知识服务组织的发展做出贡献。

law_content: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to think independently and solve problems through field research and practical activities. The course mainly includes field visits, field observations, data collection, and analysis. By directly observing and practicing in the field environment, students can develop their field research skills, data collection and processing abilities, as well as their problem-solving skills. Additionally, the course will also guide students in learning and applying relevant theoretical knowledge through case studies and group discussions, thereby enhancing their overall competence and teamwork abilities. Through the study of this course, students will be able to proficiently grasp the basic concepts, principles, and practical operation skills of fieldwork, laying a solid foundation for future field research, scientific research, and career development.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在通过实地调研和实践活动培养学生独立思考和解决问题的能力。课程主要包括实地考察、田野观察、数据收集和分析等内容，通过对野外环境的直接观察和实践操作，培养学生的实地调研能力、数据收集和处理能力以及解决实际问题的能力。同时，课程还将通过案例分析和小组讨论等形式，引导学生学习和应用相关理论知识，提升学生的综合素养和团队合作能力。通过本课程的学习，学生将能够熟练掌握田野作业的基本概念、基本原理和实际操作技巧，为今后的实地调研、科研和职业发展奠定坚实基础。

law_content: This course introduces the basic methods and techniques of anthropological research, enabling students to grasp the fundamental principles and procedural steps of anthropology research. By studying basic concepts, students will understand the research objects, methods, and processes of anthropology. The course also focuses on cultivating the ability of students to analyze and interpret social and cultural phenomena, including the diversity of cultural phenomena, cultural change, and cultural adaptation. Through the course, students will be able to apply anthropological methods in independent research, propose relevant questions and hypotheses, and design and implement empirical research in anthropology.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍人类学研究的基本方法和技巧，使学生能够掌握人类学研究的基本原理和操作步骤。通过学习基本概念，学生将了解人类学的研究对象、研究方法和研究过程。本课程还注重培养学生分析和解释人类社会和文化现象的能力，包括文化现象的多样性、文化变化和文化适应等方面的内容。通过课程学习，学生将能够运用人类学方法进行独立研究，并提出相关的问题和假设，以及进行人类学实证研究的设计和实施。

law_content: This course primarily introduces the development and major theories of contemporary Western political thought. Through studying different political trends, students will be able to understand and analyze the core concepts, core values, and relevant political theories of the contemporary Western political system. Additionally, the course will cover the historical background, major schools of thought, representative figures, and their influence on contemporary politics and international relations. By studying this course, students will understand the diversity and trends of contemporary Western political thought, cultivate critical thinking skills, and deepen their understanding and knowledge of the Western political system.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍当代西方政治思潮的发展和主要理论。通过对不同政治思潮的研究，使学生能够理解和分析当代西方政治体系的核心概念、核心价值观以及相关的政治理论。同时，课程还将涵盖西方政治思潮的历史背景、主要学派、代表人物以及其对当代政治和国际关系的影响。通过学习本课程，学生将能够了解当代西方政治思潮的多样性和发展趋势，培养批判性思维能力，加深对西方政治体系的理解和认识。

law_content: The aim of this course is to enable students to have a comprehensive understanding of the functions and roles of local government through studying local government and the rule of law. It delves into the responsibilities and obligations of local government in the construction of the rule of law. The course covers topics such as the basic concept of local government, its organization and functions, the relationship between local government and civil society, and the relationship between local government and the rule of law. Through case analysis, discussions, and field research, students will develop their ability to analyze and solve problems, and enhance their understanding and recognition of local government and the rule of law. In addition, through this course, students will come to understand and respect the rule of law, establish a correct legal awareness, and improve their legal literacy, providing a solid theoretical foundation for future engagement in related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在通过对地方政府与法治的学习，使学生能够全面了解地方政府的职能和作用，深入探讨地方政府在法治建设中的责任和义务。课程内容包括地方政府的基本概念、地方政府组织与职能、地方政府与市民社会的关系、地方政府与法治建设的关系等。通过对案例分析、讨论和实地调研等形式，培养学生分析问题、解决问题的能力，提高学生对地方政府与法治的理解和认识。同时，通过学习，使学生理解和尊重法治，树立正确的法律意识，提高法律素养，为将来从事相关工作打下坚实的理论基础。

law_content: This course introduces the basic theories and practices of Western political systems, including democratic systems, parliamentary systems, presidential systems, federal systems, etc. By analyzing the political systems of Western countries, it explores the advantages and disadvantages of different systems in terms of political stability, power separation, decision-making efficiency, etc. It also examines the significance of Western political systems for developing countries, as well as the challenges posed by the current global political landscape to these systems. By studying this course, students will understand the core concepts and operational mechanisms of Western political systems, and develop the ability to analyze different political systems, as well as the ability to reflect on and grasp the reform of our own political system.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍西方政治制度的基本理论和实践，包括民主制度、议会制度、总统制度、联邦制度等。通过分析西方国家的政治制度，探讨不同制度在政治稳定、权力分立、决策效率等方面的优劣。同时，还会探讨西方政治制度对发展中国家的借鉴意义，以及当前全球政治格局对西方政治制度的挑战。通过学习本课程，学生将了解西方政治制度的核心概念和运作机制，培养对不同政治制度的分析能力，以及对我国政治制度改革的思考和把握能力。

law_content: This course introduces the basic methods and skills of political science research and cultivates students' ability to independently conduct political science research. The course content includes research design, literature review, survey questionnaire design, quantitative and qualitative data analysis, and so on. By mastering the theory and practice of political science research, students will be able to conduct scientific, systematic, and credible political science research, providing strong theoretical support for political decision-making.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍政治学研究的基本方法和技巧，培养学生独立开展政治学研究的能力。课程内容包括研究设计、文献综述、调查问卷设计、定量和定性数据分析等方面的内容。通过掌握政治学研究的理论和实践，学生将能够进行科学、系统和可信的政治学研究，为政治决策提供有力的理论支持。

law_content: The purpose of this course is to explore the basic concepts and principles of administrative ethics, enabling students to understand the ethical issues in administrative behavior and improve their administrative decision-making skills and professional ethics. The course covers the theoretical foundation of administrative ethics, the values and principles of administrative ethics, and the norms and supervision of administrative ethics. Through case analysis and practical activities, students will learn methods and techniques to deal with various moral dilemmas and ethical conflicts, cultivating their moral judgment and decision-making abilities. By studying this course, students will not only be able to understand and adhere to ethical standards, but also apply ethical principles and values in practice to contribute to the public interest and social justice.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在通过探讨行政伦理学的基本概念和原理，使学生了解行政行为中的伦理问题，提高其行政决策能力和职业道德水平。课程内容包括行政伦理的理论基础、行政伦理的价值观和原则、行政伦理的规范与监督等方面。通过案例分析和实践活动，学生将学会应对各种道德困境和伦理冲突的方法和技巧，培养自己的道德判断能力和决策能力。通过本课程的学习，学生将不仅能够理解和遵守伦理规范，还能够在实践中运用伦理原则和价值观，为公共利益和社会正义做出贡献。

law_content: The purpose of this course is to study and analyze urban governance issues using quantitative methods. It covers topics such as urban governance theory, urban governance models, urban data analysis, urban planning and design, and urban governance policy evaluation. By taking this course, students will gain an understanding of the basic concepts and principles of urban governance, as well as mastery of relevant quantitative methods and tools. They will be able to apply these methods to analyze and solve real-life problems in urban governance. Through practice and case studies, students will also deepen their understanding of urban governance practice and enhance their abilities in the field of urban governance.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在通过定量方法来研究和分析城市治理的相关问题。主要内容包括城市治理理论、城市治理模型、城市数据分析、城市规划与设计、城市治理政策评估等。通过学习本课程，学生能够了解城市治理的基本概念和原理，掌握相关的定量方法和工具，能够运用这些方法来分析和解决城市治理中的实际问题。同时，通过实践和案例分析，学生也能够加深对城市治理实践的理解，提升自己在城市治理领域的能力。

law_content: This course explores theoretical and practical issues related to urban development and policy, aiming to help students understand the driving forces behind urban development, the logic behind the formulation and implementation of urban policies, and the interplay between urban development and policy. Through this course, students will grasp the basic concepts, principles, and methods of urban development theory and practice, as well as gain an understanding of the current research status and trends in urban development and policy. This course also focuses on developing students' ability to analyze and solve urban development and policy issues. Through case studies and practical activities, students will learn to apply relevant theories and methods to analyze practical problems in urban development and policy. Ultimately, through this course, students will acquire comprehensive knowledge of urban development and policy and be able to provide scientific basis and decision support for the formulation and implementation of urban development and policy.
zh_law_content: 本课程探讨城市发展与政策相关的理论和实践问题，旨在帮助学生理解城市发展的动力、城市政策的制定与实施的逻辑以及城市发展与政策的相互作用关系。通过学习，学生将掌握城市发展理论与实践的基本概念、原理与方法，并了解城市发展与政策的研究现状和发展趋势。本课程还侧重于培养学生分析和解决城市发展与政策问题的能力，通过案例研究和实践活动，使学生在实践中学会应用相关理论和方法分析城市发展与政策的实际问题。最终，通过本课程的学习，学生将具备较全面的城市发展与政策知识，能够为城市发展与政策的制定和实施提供科学依据和决策支持。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts, theories, and analysis methods of Chinese regional economics, aiming to enable students to systematically grasp the basic knowledge of regional economic development in China, deeply understand the economic characteristics and development patterns of different regions in China, as well as the interaction between regional economies. The course covers topics such as the formation and evolution of Chinese regional economics, the differences and issues in the development of different regions' economies, regional development strategies, and policies. Through studying this course, students will not only understand the background and current situation of Chinese regional economic development but also learn how to analyze and evaluate the development of Chinese regional economies, laying a solid foundation for future research and work in related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍中国区域经济学的基本概念、基本理论和基本分析方法，旨在使学生能够系统地掌握中国区域经济发展的基础知识，深入了解中国各地区的经济特点和发展规律，以及各地区经济之间的互动关系。课程内容包括中国区域经济的形成与演化、不同地区经济发展的差异与问题、区域发展战略与政策等方面。通过学习，学生不仅能够理解中国区域经济发展的背景和现状，还可以掌握分析和评价中国区域经济发展的方法和技巧，为未来从事相关领域的研究和工作打下坚实的基础。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the evolution and development of urban history and culture. Students will gain an understanding of the historical changes in different cities, the process of urban cultural formation, and the influence of cities on society, economy, politics, and other aspects. The course includes the historical background of urban development, urban planning and layout, urban architecture and art, urban society and culture, and other topics. By conducting in-depth research on urban history and culture, students will deepen their understanding of cities, enhance their comprehension of urban development, and cultivate critical thinking and cultural appreciation abilities.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍城市历史与文化的演变和发展。学生将通过学习了解不同城市的历史变迁、城市文化的形成过程，以及城市对社会、经济、政治等方面的影响。课程包括城市发展的历史背景、城市规划与布局、城市建筑与艺术、城市社会与文化等内容。通过深入研究城市历史和文化，学生将加深对城市的认识，提高对城市发展的理解，培养批判性思维和文化鉴赏能力。

law_content: This course introduces the basic concepts, principles, and theories of the history of the People's Republic of China. By exploring the historical development, political system, social changes, and cultural evolution of the People's Republic of China, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the historical background, important events, and significant figures of China. They will also learn about the patterns and trends of historical evolution and development in China, develop their ability to think and analyze the history of China, and deepen their understanding of social and political development in China.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍中华人民共和国历史的基本概念、基本原理和基本理论，通过探讨中华人民共和国的历史发展、政治制度、社会变迁和文化演变等方面的内容，使学生比较全面地了解中华人民共和国的历史背景、重要事件和重要人物，了解中华人民共和国的历史演变规律和发展趋势，培养学生对中华人民共和国历史的思考和分析能力，以及对中国社会和政治发展的认识和理解。

law_content: Party literature research is a discipline that mainly focuses on studying the party's literature. The goal is to deepen understanding of the party's theory, line, principles, and policies through in-depth study of party literature, enhance the level of understanding of the party's history, ideology, and culture, and cultivate students' ability to scientifically analyze party literature. This course will introduce the basic concepts, methods, and theories of party literature research. By studying important party literature, students will gain a deeper understanding of the party's theoretical system, master the basic skills of literature research, and cultivate the ability to integrate party theory with practice. Through this course, students can deepen their understanding of the party's history, previous party leadership collectives, and important documents of various periods, improve their interpretation and analysis skills of party literature, and provide theoretical support for participating in party construction and decision-making.
zh_law_content: 党的文献研究是一门以研究党的文献为主要对象的学科，目的是通过深入研究党的文献，加深对党的理论、路线、方针政策等基本知识的理解，提高对党的历史、思想和文化的认识水平，培养学生对党的文献进行科学分析的能力。本课程将介绍党的文献研究的基本概念、基本方法和基本理论，通过学习党的重要文献，使学生对党的理论体系有更加深入的认识，掌握文献研究的基本技能，培养学生将党的理论与实际相结合的能力。通过课程学习，学生可以加深对党的历史、历届党的领导集体及各个时期的重要文件的认识，提高对党的文献的解读和分析能力，为参与党的建设和决策提供理论支持。

law_content: Understanding Contemporary World Economy and Politics is the focus of this course, which encompasses important issues such as globalization, international trade, economic cooperation, international finance, and global governance. By studying this course, students will gain an understanding of the fundamental concepts, theories, and analytical methods of international economics and politics, as well as the basic laws and trends of international economic and political relationships. Additionally, this course will also emphasize the discussion of major economic and political events in the contemporary world, such as the global financial crisis, trade disputes, regional conflicts, and the formulation and implementation of related policies and strategies. Through the study of this course, students will develop an international perspective and the ability to analyze problems, laying a solid foundation for future research and work in related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程探讨当代世界经济与政治的重要问题，包括全球化、国际贸易、经济合作、国际金融、全球治理等方面的内容。通过学习本课程，学生将了解国际经济与政治的基本概念、理论和分析方法，掌握国际经济和政治关系的基本规律与趋势。同时，本课程还将重点讨论当代世界上的重大经济与政治事件，如全球经济危机、贸易争端、地区冲突等，以及相关政策和战略的制定与实施。通过本课程的学习，学生将培养国际视野和分析问题的能力，为未来从事相关领域的研究和工作打下坚实的基础。

law_content: This course introduces the basic theories and development of Marxism in foreign countries, focusing on major schools of thought, thinkers, and research achievements in foreign Marxism. Through studying, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the research field, methodologies, and key achievements of foreign Marxism. They will also grasp the core concepts and important theories, cultivate a deeper understanding of Marxism, and develop critical thinking abilities. Additionally, this course will explore the application and guiding role of foreign Marxism in contemporary social development, as well as its influence and enlightenment on Chinese Marxism. Through systematic learning and discussions, students will further expand their thinking, deepen their understanding of Marxism, and better grasp and apply relevant theories and methods to analyze and solve practical problems.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍了国外马克思主义的基本理论和发展历程，重点探讨国外马克思主义的主要学派、思想家和研究成果等内容。通过学习，使学生能够全面了解国外马克思主义的研究领域、研究方法和主要成果，掌握其核心概念和重要理论，培养学生对马克思主义的深入理解和批判思维能力。此外，本课程还将介绍国外马克思主义在当代社会发展中的应用和引领作用，以及对中国马克思主义的影响和启示。通过系统学习和讨论，学生能够进一步拓展思维，加深对马克思主义的认识，并能够更好地把握和运用相关理论和方法来分析和解决实际问题。

law_content: This course aims to introduce the development history of economics and various different schools and theories of economics, so as to enable students to understand the theoretical foundation of economics and the differences between different schools of economics. By studying the history of economics, students can understand the different perspectives and approaches of different economists to economic issues, thus deepening their understanding and knowledge of economics. The course covers topics such as ancient economics, classical economics, Marxist economics, neoclassical economics, and Keynesian economics.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在介绍经济学的发展历史和各种不同的经济学流派和学说，使学生了解经济学的理论基础和不同经济学流派之间的差异。通过学习经济学的历史，学生可以了解不同经济学家对经济问题的不同观点和解决方法，从而加深对经济学的理解和认识。课程内容包括古代经济学、古典经济学、马克思主义经济学、新古典经济学、凯恩斯主义经济学等。

law_name: 中国共产党建设的理论与实践
law_content: This course mainly introduces the theory and practice of the construction of the Communist Party of China, aiming to deepen students' understanding of the basic principles, organizational structure, and development process of the Communist Party of China. Students will gain a grasp of the ideological theories and political line of the Communist Party of China, as well as understand its important role in socialist construction. Through this course, students can deepen their understanding of the Communist Party of China, enhance their understanding of socialism with Chinese characteristics, and cultivate love for the party and the country. The course will be taught in the form of lectures, seminars, and case studies, encouraging students to actively participate in discussions and practical activities to improve their analytical and problem-solving abilities. It aims to establish a solid theoretical foundation for students to become new era individuals with ideologies, emotions, and a sense of mission.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍中国共产党的建设理论与实践，旨在使学生深入了解中国共产党的基本原则、组织结构和发展历程，掌握中国共产党的思想理论和政治路线，了解中国共产党在社会主义建设中的重要作用。通过学习，学生可以加深对中国共产党的认识，提升对中国特色社会主义的理解，培养爱党爱国的情感和责任意识。课程将以讲座、研讨、案例分析等形式进行授课，鼓励学生积极参与讨论和实践活动，提高学生的分析问题能力和解决问题的能力，为将来成为有思想、有情感、有使命感的时代新人奠定坚实的理论基础。

law_content: This course aims to cultivate students' ability in nonfiction writing, by studying the basic principles and techniques of nonfiction writing, so that students can use appropriate writing techniques and structures to present true stories and events in a vivid, accurate, and powerful way to readers. The course content includes basic concepts and classifications of nonfiction writing, writing styles and language skills, collection and organization of materials, literature research and interviewing techniques, as well as editing and revision methods. Through reading and analyzing excellent nonfiction works, students will learn how to select topics, conceive, write, and revise their own works, cultivating solid writing skills and unique creative styles. This course will provide students with abundant opportunities for writing practice and encourage them to explore and express stories and viewpoints from the real world.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在培养学生的非虚构写作能力，通过学习非虚构写作的基本原理和技巧，使学生能够运用适当的写作手法和结构，将真实的故事和事件以生动、准确、有力的方式呈现给读者。课程内容包括非虚构写作的基本概念和分类，写作风格和语言技巧，素材的收集和整理，文献调研和采访技巧，以及编辑和修订的方法。通过阅读和分析优秀的非虚构作品，学生将学习如何选题、构思、写作和修改自己的作品，培养扎实的写作技能和独特的创作风格。本课程将为学生提供丰富的写作实践机会，并鼓励他们发掘和表达真实世界中的故事和观点。

law_content: This course mainly focuses on the basic theories and practical skills of audiovisual news, aiming to cultivate students' sensitivity, comprehension, and creative abilities towards audiovisual news reporting. The course covers topics such as audiovisual news formats, editing and editing skills for news videos, camera techniques and lighting applications, audio processing and mixing techniques, etc. Through learning, students will be able to familiarize themselves with common audiovisual news reporting formats, master relevant technologies and tools, understand the current situation and development trends of audiovisual news reporting, develop their own abilities to collect audiovisual news materials and to create, and apply their knowledge and skills in audiovisual news reporting in practical scenarios.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要讲解视听新闻的基本理论和实践技巧，旨在培养学生对于视听新闻报道的敏感性、理解能力和创作能力。课程内容包括视听新闻形式、新闻片的剪辑和编辑技巧、摄像技术与光线应用、音频处理与混音技巧等。通过学习，学生将能够熟悉常见的视听新闻报道形式，掌握相关的技术和工具，了解视听新闻报道的现状和发展趋势，培养自己的视听新闻素材收集能力和创作能力，并能够在实践中运用所学知识和技巧进行视听新闻报道。

law_content: This course aims to cultivate students' mastery of the fundamental theories and practical skills of new media creation and operation. The course includes basic concepts of new media communication, principles and techniques of new media creation, and strategies and methods of new media operation. Through theoretical teaching and practical exercises, students will learn how to use various new media tools and platforms for creation and gain in-depth understanding of the entire process of new media operation, including content planning, social media management, and data analysis. By studying this course, students will have the ability to independently create and operate new media, laying a solid foundation for future careers in the new media industry.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在培养学生掌握新媒体创作与运营的基本理论和实践技巧。课程包括新媒体传播的基础概念、新媒体创作的基本原则与技术、新媒体运营的策略与方法等内容。通过理论讲授和实践操作，学生将学会运用多种新媒体工具和平台进行创作，并深入了解新媒体运营的全过程，包括内容策划、社交媒体管理、数据分析等方面的技巧和方法。通过本课程的学习，学生将具备独立进行新媒体创作和运营的能力，为未来从事新媒体行业打下坚实基础。

law_content: This course introduces the basic concepts and functions of financial markets and financial institutions, including the organizational forms and trading methods of financial markets, the classification and roles of financial institutions, and the interrelationships between financial markets and financial institutions. Through studying, students will gain an understanding of the operational mechanisms of financial markets and financial institutions, as well as knowledge in financial market behavior and risk management of financial institutions. Through case analysis and practical exercises, students will develop the ability to analyze issues related to financial markets and financial institutions, and be able to independently think and solve practical problems in the field.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍金融市场和金融机构的基本概念和功能 包括金融市场的组织形式和交易方式 金融机构的分类和作用 金融市场和金融机构的相互关系等内容 通过学习使学生了解金融市场和金融机构的运作机制 以及金融市场行为和金融机构的风险管理等方面的知识 通过案例分析和实践操作 培养学生分析金融市场和金融机构问题的能力 并能独立思考和解决金融市场和金融机构的实际问题

law_content: This course primarily introduces the fundamental concepts, theories, and practices of securities investment. Through this course, students will gain knowledge in areas such as the basic principles of securities investment, the risk-return characteristics, market analysis, and investment decision-making methods. The course will focus on the organization and operation mechanisms of the securities market, financial products, trading strategies, portfolio theory, and performance evaluation. By analyzing examples and case studies, students will be able to master the operation and risk management of derivative markets, as well as the skills to construct investment portfolios and implement risk diversification strategies. By the end of the course, students will possess a certain level of securities investment analysis and decision-making abilities, enabling them to make scientific and rational investment decisions in actual practice.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍证券投资的基本概念、理论和实践内容。通过学习，学生将了解证券投资的基本原则、风险利润特征、市场分析和投资决策方法等方面的知识。课程将重点介绍证券市场的组织和运行机制、金融产品和交易策略、投资组合理论和绩效评估等内容。通过实例分析和案例研究，学生将能够掌握衍生品市场的运作和风险管理，以及投资组合的构建和风险分散策略等技巧。在课程结束时，学生将具备一定的证券投资分析和决策能力，可以在实际投资中进行科学、合理的决策。

law_content: This course aims to explain the basic concepts and principles of strategy and game theory, and to help students master the related analytical methods and problem-solving skills through case studies and practical activities. The course covers topics such as the fundamental concepts of game theory, the construction of game models, and the formulation and analysis of strategies. Through the study, students will be able to understand the application of game theory in areas such as economics, politics, and management, and be able to apply strategic analysis methods to solve practical problems.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在讲解策略与博弈理论的基本概念和原理，并通过案例分析和实践活动，帮助学生掌握相关的分析方法和解决问题的技巧。课程内容包括博弈论的基本概念、博弈模型的构建、策略的制定与分析等方面的内容。通过学习，学生将能够理解博弈论对于经济、政治、管理等领域的应用，并能够运用策略分析的方法解决实际问题。

law_content: This course introduces the basic concepts of behavioral economics, analyzes the decision-making behavior of individuals and groups, and explores the influence of psychological factors on economic decisions. By combining the theories of economics and psychology, students will gain an understanding of the unique perspective of behavioral economics and learn how to apply its analytical tools in economic decision-making and policy-making. This course will also discuss some practical cases to help students understand the applications of behavioral economics in explaining and predicting market behavior, consumer behavior, investment behavior, and more. Through studying this course, students will be able to understand and analyze the psychological mechanisms behind economic decision-making and improve the efficiency and accuracy of their decisions.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍行为经济学的基本概念，分析个体和团体的决策行为，探讨心理因素对经济决策的影响。通过讲授经济学理论与心理学理论的结合，使学生了解行为经济学的独特视角，并学习如何应用行为经济学的分析工具进行经济决策和政策制定。本课程还将讨论一些实际案例，以帮助学生理解行为经济学在解释和预测市场行为、消费行为、投资行为等方面的应用。通过学习本课程，学生将能够理解和分析经济决策背后的心理机制，提高决策的效率和准确性。

law_content: This course will introduce the basic concepts, principles, and analytical methods of monetary economics, aiming to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the origin, development, functioning, and policy regulation of money. Through the study, students will be able to grasp knowledge about the supply and demand of money, the value of money, and monetary policy, as well as understand the role and impact of money in the economy. Additionally, this course will also introduce the research methods and frontier areas of monetary economics, cultivating students' ability to analyze and solve practical problems. Through the study of this course, students will be able to understand and apply the theories and methods of monetary economics, providing theoretical and technical support for future economic research and decision-making.
zh_law_content: 本课程将介绍货币经济学的基本概念、原理和分析方法，旨在使学生对货币的产生、发展、运行和政策调控有全面的了解。通过学习，学生将能够掌握货币供求关系、货币价值、货币政策等方面的知识，了解货币在经济中的作用和影响。同时，本课程还将介绍货币经济学的研究方法和前沿领域，培养学生的分析和解决实际问题的能力。通过课程的学习，学生将能够理解和应用货币经济学的理论和方法，为将来从事经济研究和决策提供理论和技术支持。

law_content: This course focuses on the knowledge and techniques of market data analysis. Students will learn how to collect, process, and analyze market data, as well as how to use data to predict market trends and make informed decisions. The course covers market research methods, data collection and organization, data visualization and reporting, market modeling and forecasting, market strategy analysis, and more. Through real-world examples and hands-on exercises, students will acquire the fundamental skills and practical methods of market data analysis, preparing them for future work in the field of marketing.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍市场数据分析的相关知识和技术。学生将学习如何收集、处理和分析市场数据，以及如何利用数据来预测市场趋势和做出决策。课程内容包括：市场研究方法、数据收集和整理、数据可视化和报告、市场模型和预测、市场策略分析等。通过实际案例和实践操作，学生将能够掌握市场数据分析的基本技能和应用方法，为未来的市场工作做好准备。

law_content: The Brand Management course aims to cultivate students' theoretical knowledge and practical skills in brand management. The course covers topics such as brand concepts and significance, brand values and positioning, brand strategy and planning, brand promotion and communication, and brand image and management. Through theoretical learning and case analysis, students will learn how to establish a successful brand and conduct in-depth analysis and practice in brand development and management. This course aims to help students master the core theories and practical skills of brand management, and develop innovative thinking and problem-solving abilities in the field of brand management.
zh_law_content: 品牌管理课程旨在培养学生对品牌管理的理论知识和实践技能。课程内容包括品牌概念与意义、品牌价值观与定位、品牌策略与规划、品牌推广与传播、品牌形象与管理等方面的内容。通过理论学习和案例分析，学生将学会如何建立一个成功的品牌，并对品牌的发展和管理进行深入分析和实践。本课程旨在帮助学生掌握品牌管理的核心理论和实践技巧，培养学生在品牌管理领域的创新思维和解决问题能力。

law_content: This course aims to help students understand the principles and motivations behind consumer behavior, as well as individual and mass behavior patterns in purchasing decisions. Through in-depth theoretical study and practical case analysis, students will learn about consumer needs for products and services, the buying decision process, and the influence of marketing strategies on consumer behavior. The course content includes consumer psychology, market segmentation, consumer research methods, and purchasing decision models. Through this course, students will gain a better understanding of consumer behavior and be able to apply relevant theories and methods in making marketing decisions and promotions in real-life work.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在帮助学生理解消费者行为背后的原理和动机，以及个体和大众在购买决策中的行为模式。通过深入的理论学习和实践案例分析，学生将了解消费者对产品和服务的需求、购买决策的过程、市场营销策略对消费者行为的影响等方面的知识。课程内容包括消费心理学、市场细分、消费者调查方法、购买决策模型等。通过本课程的学习，学生将能够更好地理解消费者行为，并能够在实际工作中运用相关理论和方法进行市场营销的决策和推广。

law_content: This course introduces the basic methods and techniques of marketing research, and cultivates students' ability to conduct market surveys, analyze data, and make market predictions. Through this course, students will grasp the fundamental concepts and principles of marketing research, understand the application scenarios and pros and cons of different research methods. The course content includes market survey design and implementation, data collection and organization, data analysis and interpretation, market forecasting and decision support. Students will also enhance their research and teamwork skills in the field of marketing through analysis of real cases and group projects.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍营销研究的基本方法和技巧，培养学生进行市场调查、数据分析和市场预测的能力。通过本课程的学习，学生将掌握营销研究的基本概念和原理，了解不同营销研究方法的应用场景以及其优缺点。课程内容包括市场调查设计与实施、数据收集与整理、数据分析与解读、市场预测与决策支持等方面。学生还将通过实际案例分析和小组项目实践，提升在市场营销领域的研究能力和团队协作能力。

law_content: This course primarily introduces the basic concepts, methods, and applications of operations research and optimal decision-making. By learning this course, students will be able to understand the importance and application value of operations research and optimal decision-making in engineering, management, and decision sciences, grasp common optimization methods and decision models, apply methods such as linear programming, integer programming, and dynamic programming for optimization decision analysis, and learn to use corresponding optimization software tools for modeling and solving. Additionally, this course will also introduce the theory of optimal decision-making, multi-objective optimization, and uncertain decision-making, cultivating students' systems thinking ability and innovative consciousness, and improving their practical problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍运筹优化与最优决策的基本概念、方法和应用。通过学习本课程，学生将能够了解运筹优化与最优决策在工程、管理和决策科学等领域的重要性和应用价值，掌握常见的优化方法和决策模型，能够运用线性规划、整数规划、动态规划等方法进行优化决策分析，并学会使用相应的优化软件工具进行建模和求解。此外，本课程还将介绍最优决策理论、多目标优化和不确定决策等相关内容，培养学生的系统思维能力和创新意识，提高其实际问题求解能力和决策能力。

law_content: The Simulation Modeling and Intelligent Decision Making course aims to cultivate students' abilities to analyze and make intelligent decisions using simulation models. By studying this course, students will grasp the basic concepts and principles of simulation modeling and learn how to use common simulation software for model construction and analysis. Additionally, the course will guide students to understand methods and tools for intelligent decision making, and develop their abilities to analyze and solve practical problems. Through practical case analysis and teamwork projects, students will apply the theoretical knowledge they have learned to real-life scenarios, enhancing their problem-solving abilities and decision-making skills.
zh_law_content: 仿真模型与智慧决策课程旨在培养学生运用仿真模型进行分析和智慧决策的能力。通过学习本课程，学生将掌握仿真模型的基本概念和原理，学会使用常见的仿真软件进行模型构建和分析。同时，课程还将引导学生了解智慧决策的方法和工具，培养其分析和解决实际问题的能力。学生将通过实际案例分析和团队合作项目，将所学理论知识应用于实际场景，提升解决问题的能力和决策水平。

law_content: This course aims to introduce the basic concepts, algorithms, and applications of machine learning and artificial intelligence. Students will learn the fundamental principles and methods of machine learning, including supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and reinforcement learning. In addition, the course will also cover the basic concepts and development history of artificial intelligence, including expert systems, machine vision, natural language processing, and other areas. Through practical projects and case studies, students will acquire essential skills and tools in machine learning and artificial intelligence and be able to provide practical solutions to real-world problems.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在介绍机器学习和人工智能的基本概念、算法和应用。学生将学习机器学习的基本原理和方法，包括监督学习、无监督学习和强化学习等。同时，还将介绍人工智能的基本概念和发展历程，包括专家系统、机器视觉、自然语言处理等方面的内容。通过实践项目和案例研究，学生将能够掌握机器学习和人工智能的基本技能和工具，为解决实际问题提供实用的解决方案。

law_content: This course introduces the basic concepts, principles, and applications of quantitative marketing models. Students will learn how to apply mathematical and statistical methods to solve marketing problems and will have hands-on experience through practical cases. The course covers market research, demand forecasting, market positioning, product pricing, promotion strategies, and more. By taking this course, students will master quantitative analysis tools and techniques and be able to provide data support for marketing decisions. They will also gain an understanding of the application of quantitative marketing models in different industries and market environments, laying a solid foundation for future marketing work.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍量化营销模型的基本概念、原理和应用。学生将学习如何运用数学和统计方法来解决营销问题，并通过实践案例进行实际应用。课程内容包括市场调研、需求预测、市场定位、产品定价、促销策略等方面。通过学习本课程，学生将掌握量化分析工具和技术，能够提供营销决策的数据支持。同时，学生还将了解量化营销模型在不同行业和市场环境下的应用，为未来从事营销工作打下坚实基础。

law_content: This course introduces the basic concepts and methods of causal inference, as well as its specific applications in business settings. Students will learn how to use data and statistical analysis to determine causal relationships and how to apply causal inference to business decision-making. The course covers the theoretical foundations of causal inference, commonly used methods and tools for causal inference, and application cases of causal inference in fields such as marketing, finance, and operations management. By studying this course, students will master the fundamental principles and practical skills of causal inference, providing them with theoretical and methodological support for making data-driven decisions in the business domain.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍因果推断的基本概念和方法，以及在商业应用中的具体应用情况。学生将学习如何利用数据和统计分析来确定因果关系，并了解如何将因果推断应用于商业决策中。课程内容包括因果推断的理论基础、常用的因果推断方法和工具、因果推断在市场营销、金融和运营管理等领域的应用案例等。通过学习本课程，学生将掌握因果推断的基本原理和实践技巧，为将来在商业领域进行数据驱动的决策提供理论和方法支持。

law_content:
The course introduces the basic concepts, principles, and methods of management science and information management, as well as the fundamental theories and technologies of information management. Through this course, students will be able to grasp the basic knowledge of management science and information management, understand their applications in practical management, and apply relevant tools and techniques for decision analysis and information management.

The course covers fundamental theories of management science and information management, decision models and analysis, information systems and technologies, and the design and development of management information systems. Students will learn how to enhance the scientificity and efficiency of management decisions through the mindset and tools of management science, understand the basic concepts and principles of information management, and master the methods and techniques for designing and developing information systems. They will also learn how to solve management issues and improve management efficiency using knowledge and technologies of information management.

Upon completion of this course, students will have the ability to apply knowledge of management science and information management to make management decisions and manage information effectively, enhancing their overall qualities and competitiveness. Additionally, this course lays a foundation for further study of relevant major courses and engagement in research and practical work in related fields.
zh_law_content:
管理科学与信息管理主要介绍管理科学的基本概念、原理和方法，以及信息管理的基本理论和技术。通过学习，使学生能够掌握管理科学与信息管理的基本知识，了解其在实际管理中的应用，并能够运用相关工具和技术进行决策分析和信息管理。

本课程包括管理科学和信息管理的基础理论、决策模型与分析、信息系统与技术、管理信息系统的设计与开发等内容。学生将学习如何通过管理科学的思维方式和工具，提高管理决策的科学性和效率；了解信息管理的基本概念和原理，掌握信息系统的设计与开发的方法和技术；学习如何运用信息管理的知识和技术解决管理问题，提高管理效能。

通过本课程的学习，学生将能够具备运用管理科学和信息管理知识进行管理决策和信息管理的能力，提高自己的综合素质和竞争能力。同时，也为进一步学习相关专业课程和从事相关领域的研究和实践工作奠定了基础。

law_content: This course is a professional course on stone materials, focusing on introducing knowledge about the types, properties, collection, processing, and application of stone materials. Students will learn about the formation of different types of stone materials and their applications in fields such as architecture, interior design, and landscape design. Through the study of this course, students will be able to understand the importance of stone materials in construction and design, master correct usage and maintenance methods, and be able to select suitable types of stone materials and processing methods according to project requirements. This course will also cultivate students' practical operation abilities and problem-solving skills through practical cases and experiments.
zh_law_content: 本课程是一个关于石材的专业课程，重点介绍石材的种类、性质、采集、加工和应用等方面的知识。学生将学习到不同类型的石材如何形成以及其在建筑、室内设计和景观设计等领域的应用。通过课程的学习，学生将能够了解石材在建筑和设计中的重要性，掌握正确的使用和保养方法，并能够根据项目需求选择适合的石材种类和处理方式。本课程还将通过实际的案例和实验，培养学生的实际操作能力和问题解决能力。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts, principles, and methods of strategic management, aiming to cultivate students' strategic thinking and decision-making abilities. Through learning, students will be able to understand the significance and role of corporate strategy, familiarize themselves with the basic process and models of strategic management, master the skills and methods of formulating, implementing, and evaluating corporate strategy, as well as the thinking methods to solve strategic problems. In addition, this course will also introduce the application of strategic management in different organizational levels and industries, as well as strategic choices and competitive analysis in an international context. Through a combination of theory and practice, students will gain a theoretical foundation and practical operational capabilities in strategic management, laying a solid foundation for future career development.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍战略管理的基本概念、原理和方法，旨在培养学生的战略思维和战略决策能力。通过学习，学生将能够了解企业战略的意义和作用，熟悉战略管理的基本流程和模型，掌握制定、实施和评估企业战略的技巧和方法，以及解决战略问题的思考方式。此外，本课程还将介绍战略管理在不同组织层级和不同行业中的应用，以及国际化背景下的战略选择和竞争分析等内容。通过理论与实践相结合的教学方式，学生将获得战略管理的理论基础和实际操作能力，为未来的职业发展打下坚实基础。

law_content: This course aims to explore the development process and current situation of China through immersive learning. The course covers various aspects such as China's economic development, social changes, political system, and cultural traditions. Through field visits, interviews, and exchanges, students will have the opportunity to firsthand experience China's achievements and challenges. Through in-depth research on China, critical thinking and cross-cultural communication skills will be cultivated. Experienced tutors will guide students in analyzing the complexities of China from multiple perspectives, helping them to deeply understand the opportunities and challenges China faces in the process of globalization. The course aims to cultivate students' global vision and cross-cultural awareness, providing a solid foundation for their future work and research related to China.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在通过沉浸式学习的方式，深入探索中国的发展历程和现状。课程内容包括中国的经济发展、社会变革、政治体制、文化传统等方面的内容。通过实地考察、访谈交流等形式，学生将有机会亲身感受中国的发展成就和挑战，并通过对中国的深度研究，培养批判性思维和跨文化交流能力。专业导师将带领学生从多个角度解析中国的复杂性，帮助学生深入理解中国在全球化过程中所面临的机遇和挑战。课程旨在培养学生的全球视野和跨文化意识，为学生未来从事与中国相关的工作和研究提供良好的基础。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts, development process, and characteristics of the Chinese economy, and delves into macroeconomic policies, industrial structure, market-oriented economic system reform, and international economic and trade cooperation in China. Through learning, students will be able to systematically understand the development model of the Chinese economy, the driving forces of economic growth, and the evolution of economic structure. They will also analyze the international competitiveness and challenges of the Chinese economy in the global economic context, and master certain economic data analysis methods and research tools. This course aims to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the Chinese economy and lay a solid foundation for research and work in related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍中国经济的基本概念、发展历程和特点，深入探讨中国经济的宏观经济政策、产业结构、市场经济体制改革和国际经贸合作等方面的内容。通过学习，使学生能系统地了解中国经济的发展模式、经济增长的驱动力和经济结构的演变，在全球经济背景下分析中国经济的国际竞争力和挑战，同时也掌握一定的经济数据分析方法和研究手段。本课程旨在为学生提供对中国经济的全面认知，并为从事相关领域的研究和工作打下坚实的基础。

law_content: This course is based on the management theory and practice with Chinese characteristics, introducing the basic concepts, characteristics, and principles of Chinese management, so as to deepen students' understanding of the uniqueness and advantages of Chinese management. Through teaching methods such as case analysis, discussion, and simulated practice, students' critical thinking and problem-solving abilities are cultivated. The course focuses on exploring the cultural background, organizational form, leadership, and decision-making process of Chinese management. Through the study of the course, students will be familiar with the development process and current situation of Chinese management, understand its application and challenges in domestic and foreign enterprises, and lay a solid foundation for future management work.
zh_law_content: 本课程以中国特色的管理理论与实践为基础，介绍中国管理的基本概念、特点和原则，使学生对中国管理的独特性和优势有更深入的了解。通过案例分析、讨论和模拟实践等教学方法，培养学生的批判性思维和解决问题的能力。重点探讨中国管理的文化背景、组织形态、领导力和决策过程等方面的内容。通过课程学习，让学生能够熟悉中国管理的发展历程和现状，了解中国管理在国内外企业中的应用和挑战，为今后的管理工作打下扎实的基础。

law_content: The aim of this course is to develop students' academic and research abilities, and further enhance their scientific research capabilities through participation in research seminars. The course covers topics such as the latest research trends in economics and management, research methods and techniques, paper writing, and academic presentation skills. Students will improve their critical thinking skills and teamwork abilities through reading and discussing important academic papers, writing course papers, and participating in research seminars. At the same time, the course will guide students to develop the correct ethics and enthusiasm for academic research. Through this course, students will acquire the basic qualities of scientific research, and lay a solid foundation for future academic research or further study.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在培养学生的学术研讨能力，通过参与研究会进一步提高学生的科研水平。课程内容包括经济学和管理学领域的前沿研究动态、研究方法和技巧、论文撰写和学术演讲等方面。学生将通过阅读和讨论国内外重要学术论文、撰写课程论文、参与学术研讨会等方式，锻炼自己的批判性思维能力和团队合作能力。同时，课程将引导学生形成正确的学术道德观念，培养学生对学术研究的热情和责任心。通过本课程的学习，学生将具备科研的基本素养，为将来从事学术研究或者进一步深造打下坚实的基础。

law_content: Chinese finance is a discipline that focuses on studying the theories and practices of finance, based on the Chinese financial market and financial system. This course aims to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the development process, basic framework, and main characteristics of Chinese finance by introducing fundamental concepts, theories, and principles of the Chinese financial market and financial system. The course covers topics such as the organization of financial markets, types and functions of financial instruments, roles and operations of financial institutions, formulation and implementation of financial policies, etc. Through classroom teaching and case analysis, students will develop their abilities in financial market analysis and financial decision-making, laying a solid foundation for their future careers in finance or further research in financial issues.
zh_law_content: 中国金融是以中国金融市场和金融体系为基础，研究金融理论和金融实践的学科。本课程旨在通过介绍中国金融市场和金融体系的基本概念、基本理论和基本原则，使学生能够全面了解中国金融发展的过程、基本框架和主要特点。课程内容包括金融市场的组织、金融工具的类型和功能、金融机构的角色和运作、金融政策的制定和实施等方面的内容。通过课堂教学和实践案例分析，培养学生的金融市场分析和金融决策能力，为他们今后从事金融工作或深入研究金融问题打下坚实的基础。

law_content: This course introduces the basic concepts and principles of operations management, including production planning, logistics management, quality management, and supply chain management. Through studying, students will understand the importance of operations management, grasp the basic theories and methods of operations management, improve the efficiency of resource utilization, optimize operational processes, enhance product and service quality, and achieve effective cost control. Additionally, this course will also introduce the application of operations management in enhancing business competitiveness, innovation, and sustainable development, cultivating students' operational management thinking and practical abilities. Through case analysis and practical exercises, students will learn to apply operations management theories and methods to solve practical problems and be well-prepared for future work in operations management.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍运营管理的基本概念和原理，包括生产计划，物流管理，质量管理，供应链管理等方面的内容。通过学习，学生能够了解运营管理的重要性，掌握运营管理的基本理论和方法，提高组织资源的利用效率，优化运营流程，提升产品和服务的质量，实现有效的成本控制。此外，本课程还将介绍运营管理在企业竞争力提升，创新和可持续发展方面的应用，培养学生的运营管理思维和实践能力。通过案例分析和实践操作，学生将学会运用运营管理理论与方法解决实际问题，为将来从事运营管理工作做好充分准备。

law_name: 政治学阶梯：体系与问题
law_content: This course introduces the basic framework and related issues of political science, aiming to help students establish a theoretical framework for political science and to delve into its related issues. The course covers topics such as the basic concepts of political science, political systems, and political behavior. Through this course, students will be able to systematically grasp the foundational knowledge of political science and understand various aspects of political systems and political behavior. Additionally, students will learn the basic methods and skills for analyzing political issues and develop critical thinking and independent thinking abilities. By studying this course, students will gain a better understanding of the research areas and trends in political science and acquire a deeper understanding of contemporary political issues.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍政治学的基本体系和相关问题，旨在帮助学生建立对政治学的理论框架，并深入探讨其相关问题。课程内容包括政治学的基本概念、政治制度和政治行为等方面的内容。通过学习，学生将能够比较系统地掌握政治学的基础知识，了解政治制度和政治行为的方方面面。同时，学生还将学习分析政治问题的基本方法和技巧，培养批判性思维和独立思考的能力。通过课程的学习，学生将能够更好地理解政治学的研究领域和发展趋势，并对当代政治问题有更深入的认识和理解。

law_content: Discrete Mathematics Foundation is a mathematical discipline that studies discrete structures and discrete objects. This course aims to cultivate students' ability in discrete thinking and mathematical abstraction, helping them grasp the basic knowledge and theories of discrete mathematics, and explore the applications of discrete structures in computer science, information technology, and other related fields. Specific topics include set theory, graph theory, Boolean algebra, logical reasoning, and mathematical recursion. Through this course, students will be able to master the basic concepts, principles, and methods of discrete mathematics, and develop skills in mathematical modeling and problem-solving, laying a solid mathematical foundation for further studies in computer science, information technology, and related fields.
zh_law_content: 离散数学基础是一门研究离散结构和离散对象的数学学科。本课程将通过培养学生的离散思维能力和数学抽象能力，帮助学生掌握离散数学的基本知识和基本理论，探讨离散结构在计算机科学、信息技术和其他相关领域中的应用。具体内容包括集合论、图论、布尔代数、逻辑推理、数理递归等。通过本课程的学习，学生将能够掌握离散数学的基本概念、基本原理和基本方法，培养数学建模和问题求解能力，为进一步学习计算机科学、信息技术和相关领域打下坚实的数学基础。

law_content: This course provides an introduction to the basic concepts, protocols, and applications of computer networks. By studying this course, students will understand the fundamental principles, network architecture, network protocols, network security, and more. They will also gain knowledge in network performance analysis, network topology design, network security technologies, and other aspects of computer networks. Through practical experiments, students will become familiar with network device configuration and management, as well as the principles and methods of network communication. They will also learn about current trends and cutting-edge technologies in computer network development.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍计算机网络的基本概念、协议及其应用。通过学习本课程，学生将理解计算机网络的基本原理、网络层次结构、网络协议、网络安全等内容。并掌握计算机网络的基本原理、网络性能分析、网络拓扑结构设计、网络安全技术等方面的知识。学生还将通过实验，熟悉网络设备的配置和管理、网络通信的实现原理和方法，并了解当前计算机网络发展的趋势和前沿技术。

law_content: This course aims to introduce the basic concepts, principles, and experimental techniques of computational methods. Through studying this course, students will acquire a fundamental understanding of computational methods and their applications in scientific and engineering calculations. The course covers topics such as numerical computation methods, approximate computation methods, interpolation and curve fitting, numerical integration, and numerical solutions of differential equations. Students will develop theoretical knowledge and practical skills in computational methods through learning and practice, and cultivate the ability to analyze and solve practical problems. This course will lay a solid foundation for students' professional development and provide strong support for their future scientific research and engineering practice.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在介绍计算方法的基本概念、基本原理和实验技术方法。通过学习，学生将掌握计算方法的基本思想，了解其在科学计算和工程计算中的应用。课程内容主要包括数值计算方法、近似计算方法、插值和曲线拟合、数值积分和微分方程的数值解等。学生将通过学习和实践，掌握计算方法的基本理论和实践技巧，培养分析和解决实际问题的能力。该课程将为学生的专业发展奠定良好的基础，并为其今后的科研工作和工程实践提供有力支持。

law_content: This course is a laboratory course in astrophysics. Its purpose is to cultivate students' ability to observe and design experiments, as well as to develop their skills in using experimental instruments and methods to solve problems encountered in experiments. Through learning and experimentation, students will understand and master some basic concepts, principles, and commonly used experimental methods in optics and astrophysics. The experiments mainly include how to obtain night sky photos and how to measure stellar magnitudes, among others. The experiments are divided into two modules: optics and astrophysics, each consisting of multiple experimental sections. Students will have hands-on experience in these experiments, which will help them solidify the main astronomical concepts and methods learned in the theoretical courses. Outstanding students selected to participate in national science and technology competitions will review what they have learned, further improve their scientific and technological capabilities.
zh_law_content: 本课程是天体物理学实验课程的一门 其目的是培养学生的实验观察和实验设计能力 以及培养学生使用实验仪器 使用实验方法 解决实验中遇到 问题的能力 通过学习和实验 学生将了解和掌握光学 天体物理学中的  一些基本概念 基本原理和常用的实验方法 实验的内容主要包括如何 获得夜空照片 如何测量 星等等 实验分为光学和天体物理学两个模块 每个模块包括多个实验环节 学 生将在实验中亲自操作 这些实验将帮助学生巩固在理论课程中学习到的 几个主要的天文学概念和方法 选拔参与国家科技赛事的优秀 学生 温故而知新 进一步的提高自己的科技水平

law_content: Physiology experiments are a course that studies the physiological functions and mechanisms of organisms through experiments. The course aims to cultivate students' experimental skills and scientific thinking, and to understand the structure and function of various systems in organisms through practical operations. Students will learn and master various physiological experimental methods and the use of instruments, understand common physiological indicators and their measurement principles. Through experiments, students will be able to deeply understand the operation mechanism of various systems in the human body, understand the regularities of changes in different physiological processes, master the writing of reports and the analysis of experimental results. Through practical exploration, students will deepen their understanding of theoretical knowledge in physiology, cultivate problem-solving abilities, and lay a foundation for further research in related fields.
zh_law_content: 生理学实验是一门通过实验来研究生物体生理功能和机制的课程。该课程旨在培养学生的实验技能和科学思维，通过实际操作了解生物体各个系统的结构和功能。学生将学习和掌握各种生理学实验方法和仪器的使用，了解常用的生理学指标以及其测量原理。通过实验，学生将能够深入理解人体各个系统的运作机制，了解不同生理过程中的变化规律，掌握报告书的撰写和实验结果的分析方法。通过实践探索，学生将加深对生理学理论知识的理解，培养解决问题的能力，为进一步从事相关领域的研究奠定基础。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic theories and experimental techniques of environmental microbiology, aiming to enable students to grasp the basic concepts, principles, experimental skills, and analytical methods of environmental microbiology. Through experiments, students will learn to isolate and identify microorganisms in environmental samples, understand the functions and roles of microorganisms in the environment, and gain an in-depth understanding of the current research status and trends in environmental microbiology. Through the study of this course, students will improve their understanding of the theory and experimental operation of environmental microbiology, cultivate a scientific and rigorous experimental attitude and experimental operation ability, and possess the basic skills for conducting research in environmental microbiology and related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍环境微生物学实验的基本理论和实验技术方法，旨在让学生掌握环境微生物学的基本概念、基本原理、实验技能以及实验分析方法。通过实验，学生将学会分离和鉴定环境样品中的微生物，了解微生物在环境中的功能和作用，深入了解环境微生物学的研究现状和发展趋势。通过本课程的学习，学生将提高对环境微生物学的理论和实验操作的理解，培养科学严谨的实验态度和实验操作能力，并具备从事环境微生物学研究及相关领域工作的基本能力。

law_content: Epidemiology is the science that studies the distribution of diseases in populations and their influencing factors. Through the study of epidemiology, the patterns of disease occurrence and transmission can be revealed, providing guidance for disease prevention and control. This course will introduce the basic concepts, research designs, and methods of epidemiology, and cultivate students' ability to analyze and solve public health problems. Through learning, students will master the steps and techniques of epidemiological investigations, understand the epidemiological characteristics of common diseases, and acquire skills in data analysis and interpretation in epidemiology. The course will also cover the applications of epidemiology in the formulation of public health policies and disease control, and provide practical opportunities to develop students' practical skills.
zh_law_content: 流行病学是研究人群中疾病分布及其影响因素的科学，通过流行病学的研究可以揭示疾病的发生规律和传播方式，为疾病的预防控制提供依据。本课程将介绍流行病学的基本概念、研究设计和方法，培养学生分析和解决公共卫生问题的能力。通过学习，学生将掌握流行病学调查的步骤和技术，了解常见疾病的流行病学特征，掌握流行病学的数据分析和解读方法。同时，课程还将介绍流行病学在公共卫生政策制定和疾病控制方面的应用，并提供实践机会，培养学生的实际操作能力。

law_content: This course aims to introduce the basic concepts, principles, and research methods of toxicology, enabling students to gain a comprehensive understanding of the fundamental knowledge and research progress in related fields. The course covers topics including the classification of toxicants, methods for assessing and determining toxicity, the processes of absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion of toxicants, the mechanisms of action and damage effects of toxicants on organisms, and the assessment of toxicant exposure and risk. Through lectures and laboratory practice, students will acquire a basic understanding of the theoretical foundations and experimental techniques of toxicology, comprehend the impacts of toxicants on human health and the environment, and develop critical thinking and analytical skills in toxicological research.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在介绍毒理学的基本概念、原理和研究方法，使学生能够全面了解毒理学的基础知识和相关领域的研究进展。课程内容包括毒物的分类、毒性的评估和测定方法、毒物的吸收、分布、代谢和排泄过程、毒物对生物体的作用机制和损伤效应、毒物暴露的评估和风险评估等。通过授课和实验实践，学生将掌握毒理学的基本理论和实验技术，了解毒物对人体健康和环境的影响，培养毒理学研究的基本思维和分析能力。

law_content: This course is a comprehensive internship course for environmental science majors, aimed at enabling students to systematically understand practical issues and solutions in the field of environmental health through field research and experimental operations. The course covers topics such as environmental pollution and health risk assessment, human behavior and environmental health, and monitoring and evaluation of indoor and outdoor environmental quality. Through internship activities, students will learn and master environmental monitoring techniques, investigation methods, and data processing and analysis skills. The course requires students to have basic knowledge of environmental science and laboratory skills, and be able to independently complete internship tasks. Through this course, students will develop the ability to apply environmental science knowledge and technology to solve practical problems, providing strong support for environmental protection and health management.
zh_law_content: 本课程是环境科学类专业的综合实习课程，旨在通过实地调研和实验操作等方式，使学生能够系统地了解环境健康领域的实际问题和解决方法。课程内容涵盖环境污染与健康风险评估、人类行为与环境健康、室内外环境质量监测与评价等方面的内容。通过实习活动，学生将学习并掌握环境监测技术、调查方法和数据处理与分析技巧。课程要求学生具备基本的环境科学知识和实验技能，并能独立完成实习任务。通过本课程的学习，学生将培养综合运用环境科学知识和技术解决实际问题的能力，为环境保护和健康管理提供有力的支持。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts, methods, and techniques of surface process simulation and monitoring, as well as the related theoretical knowledge and practical skills. Through learning, students will be able to grasp the basic principles and techniques of surface process simulation and monitoring, understand the dynamic changes and evolution laws of surface processes, and master the methods of quantitative analysis and prediction of surface processes using simulation and monitoring methods. At the same time, through practical operation and case analysis, students' practical operation ability and problem-solving ability will be cultivated, and their comprehensive quality and innovation ability will be improved. The learning content of this course includes the basic concepts and principles of surface process simulation and monitoring, methods and techniques of surface process simulation and monitoring, practical operation and case analysis of surface process simulation and monitoring, etc.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍地表过程模拟与监测的基本概念、方法和技术，以及相关的理论知识和实践技能。通过学习，使学生能够掌握地表过程模拟与监测的基本原理和技术，了解地表过程的动态变化和演化规律，掌握利用模拟和监测手段对地表过程进行定量分析和预测的方法。同时，通过实践操作和案例分析，培养学生的实际操作能力和问题解决能力，提高学生的综合素质和创新能力。本课程的学习内容包括地表过程模拟与监测的基本概念和原理、地表过程模拟和监测的方法和技术、地表过程模拟和监测的实践操作和案例分析等。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the research methods and findings of ancient climate and environment, helping students understand the evolutionary process of ancient climate and environment and its relationship with geological history. By studying this course, students will understand the significance of ancient climate and environment, master the research methods and techniques of ancient climate and environment, and be able to analyze and interpret the research results of ancient climate and environment.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍古代气候和环境的研究方法和成果，帮助学生了解古代气候和环境的演变过程及其与地质历史的关系。通过学习本课程，学生将了解古气候和古环境的重要意义，掌握古代气候和环境的研究方法和技术，并能够分析和解读古代气候和环境的研究结果。

law_content: This course aims to teach the concepts, techniques, and applications of advanced Geographic Information Systems (GIS). Students will learn about the practical applications of GIS in various fields, including urban planning, environmental protection, land management, and disaster management. The course covers advanced functionalities of GIS, such as geographic data analysis, spatial data mining, and simulation. Students will also learn how to independently collect, process, and analyze geographical data using professional GIS software. Through real-world case studies and practical projects, students will be able to proficiently apply GIS technology to solve geographical problems and gain a thorough understanding of the principles and application methods of advanced GIS technology.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在教授高级地理信息系统（GIS）的概念，技术和应用。学生将学习GIS在各个领域的实际应用，包括城市规划、环境保护、土地管理和灾害管理等。课程内容涵盖GIS的高级功能，如地理数据分析、空间数据挖掘和模拟等。学生还将学习使用专业的GIS软件进行地理数据的独立收集、处理和分析。通过实际案例和实践项目，学生将能够熟练运用GIS技术解决真实世界的地理问题，并掌握高级GIS技术的原理和应用方法。

law_name: 城市与区域经济学原城市经济学
law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts, theories, and methods of urban and regional economics. Students will gain understanding of the fundamental knowledge of urban economics, including the development patterns of urban economies, the evolution of urban industrial structures, and the economic linkages between cities. Additionally, the course will cover topics related to regional economics, such as regional development disparities and regional economic policies. Through this course, students will systematically grasp the basic theories and analytical methods of urban and regional economics, and gain a clear understanding of the functioning mechanisms of urban and regional economies.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍城市与区域经济学的基本概念、理论和方法。学生将通过学习了解城市经济学的基础知识，包括城市经济的发展规律、城市产业结构的演变以及城市间的经济联系等方面的内容。同时，课程还会涉及到区域经济学的研究内容，包括区域发展差异、区域经济政策等。通过本课程的学习，学生将能够系统地掌握城市与区域经济学的基本理论和分析方法，对城市和区域经济的运行机制有较为清晰的认识。

law_name: 地球科学概论系列课程
law_content: This series of courses introduces the basic concepts and theories of Earth science, covering various disciplines such as geology, atmospheric science, ocean science, and geophysics. By studying this series of courses, students can have a comprehensive understanding of the composition, structure, and evolutionary processes of the Earth, understand the characteristics and interrelationships of various layers of the Earth, and comprehend the causes and impacts of natural phenomena and geological events on Earth. At the same time, this series of courses also introduces the methods and techniques of Earth science research, cultivating students' scientific thinking ability and practical skills. By mastering the basic knowledge and research methods of Earth science, students can better understand and explain natural phenomena on Earth, and provide scientific support for geological resource development and environmental protection.
zh_law_content: 本系列课程介绍地球科学的基本概念和理论，涵盖了地质学、大气科学、海洋科学和地球物理学等多个学科领域。通过学习本系列课程，学生能够全面了解地球的组成、结构和演化过程，掌握地球各层圈的特性和相互关系，理解地球上各种自然现象和地质事件的成因和影响。同时，本系列课程还介绍了地球科学研究的方法和技术，培养学生的科学思维能力和实践操作能力。通过掌握地球科学的基本知识和研究方法，学生能够更好地理解和解释地球上的自然现象，为地质资源开发和环境保护提供科学支持。

law_content: This course aims to introduce the design principles and applications of Geographic Information Systems (GIS). Students will learn the basic concepts of GIS, data processing, and analysis techniques, and deepen their understanding and application skills of GIS through practical case studies. The course content includes map projections, coordinate systems, geographic data models, data collection and management, spatial analysis, and map production. Through classroom lectures, lab exercises, and project practice, students will master the basic principles and practical application skills of GIS, and develop the ability to solve practical geographic problems. In addition, the course also presents specific applications of GIS in urban planning, environmental management, transportation planning, and the latest trends in GIS technology. Through this course, students will be able to proficiently operate GIS software and flexibly apply GIS technology to solve practical problems.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在介绍地理信息系统（GIS）的设计原理和应用。学生将学习GIS的基本概念、数据处理和分析技术，并通过实际案例应用来加深对GIS的理解和运用能力。课程内容包括地图投影、坐标系统、地理数据模型、数据收集与管理、空间分析和地图制作等方面。学生将通过课堂讲授、实验练习以及项目实践，掌握GIS的基本原理和实际应用技巧，培养解决实际地理问题的能力。同时，课程还介绍了GIS在城市规划、环境管理、交通规划等领域的具体应用，以及GIS技术的最新发展趋势。通过本课程的学习，学生能够熟练操作GIS软件，灵活应用GIS技术解决实际问题。

law_content: The Earth's Structure is a fundamental course in Earth Science, aiming to explore the formation and evolution of the Earth and the laws of crustal movement through studying the internal structure of the Earth, plate tectonics, and structural deformation. This course employs various teaching methods such as theoretical teaching, experiments, and field investigations to cultivate students' understanding of Earth's structure and their ability to analyze problems. It enables students to grasp the basic concepts, principles, and research methods of Earth's structure, and apply this knowledge to explain geological phenomena and solve practical problems.
zh_law_content: 地球构造是地球科学的一门基础课程，旨在通过研究地球的内部结构、地壳板块运动、构造形变等方面的知识，探索地球的形成演化过程和地壳运动的规律。本课程通过理论授课、实验和实地考察等多种教学方式，培养学生的地球构造观念和分析问题的能力，使学生掌握地球构造的基本概念、基本原理和研究方法，并能够应用这些知识解释地质现象和解决实际问题。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the physical processes, structures, and characteristics of the middle and upper atmosphere. Through this course, students will grasp the basic concepts and principles of the atmosphere, understand the composition, structure, and physical properties of the atmosphere, and gain in-depth knowledge of the variations and evolution of atmospheric conditions. Additionally, this course will also cover topics such as atmospheric optical phenomena, atmospheric radiation transmission processes, mechanisms of cloud and fog formation in the atmosphere, radiation transmission and energy balance, atmospheric waves and vibrations, and electromagnetic phenomena in the atmosphere. Through a combination of theoretical lectures and laboratory sessions, students will be trained in analyzing and solving atmospheric physics problems, preparing them for future research in atmospheric science and related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍中高层大气层中的物理过程、结构与特性。通过学习，使学生掌握大气层的基本概念和基本原理，了解大气层的组成结构和物理特性，深入了解大气环境的变化与演变规律。同时，本课程还将介绍大气光学现象、大气辐射传输过程、大气中的云雾形成机制、辐射传输与能量平衡、大气波与振动、大气层中的电磁现象等内容。通过理论课和实验课结合的方式，培养学生分析和解决大气物理问题的能力，为学生今后从事大气科学及相关领域的研究做好基础准备。

law_content: Psychological statistics is an important course in psychology that primarily focuses on the principles and methods of statistical analysis in psychology. The course covers topics such as descriptive statistics, inferential statistics, and empirical research design. By studying this course, students will learn how to analyze and interpret psychological data, as well as master the skills of using statistical software. Additionally, this course also guides students in designing empirical research and cultivates their scientific research abilities. Through conducting experiments and completing course assignments, students will acquire a solid understanding of the fundamental concepts, principles, and practical applications of psychological statistics.
zh_law_content: 心理统计是心理学中的一门重要课程，主要介绍心理学中的统计原理和方法。本课程包括：描述统计学、推论统计学和实证研究设计等内容。通过学习，学生将了解如何对心理学数据进行分析和解释，并掌握统计软件的使用技巧。此外，本课程也将引导学生进行实证研究设计，培养学生的科学研究能力。通过完成实验和课程作业，学生将掌握心理统计学的基本概念、原理和实际应用。

law_content: The objective of this course is to cultivate students' knowledge and practical skills in the field of computational research. Through learning, students will grasp the basic theories and methods of computational research and learn to apply computational tools and software for scientific computing and data analysis. The course content includes fundamental knowledge and recent advances in frontier research areas such as computational modeling and algorithm design, big data processing and analysis, artificial intelligence and machine learning, and image and signal processing. Students will also engage in research project practice to enhance their problem-solving abilities and have the opportunity to participate in the publication and exchange of research results. Through this course, students will develop the ability and qualities to independently conduct research in the field of cutting-edge computational research, laying a solid foundation for future engagement in scientific research or application development fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在培养学生在计算研究领域的前沿知识和实践能力。通过学习，学生将掌握计算研究的基本理论和方法，学会运用计算工具和软件进行科学计算和数据分析。课程内容包括计算模型与算法设计、大数据处理与分析、人工智能与机器学习、图像与信号处理等前沿研究领域的基础知识和最新进展。学生还将进行科研项目实践，锻炼解决实际问题的能力，并有机会参与科研成果的发布与交流。通过本课程的学习，学生将具备在前沿计算研究领域进行独立研究的能力和素质，为未来从事科学研究或应用开发等领域打下坚实基础。

law_content: The Software Design Practicum course aims to cultivate students' software design and development skills through practical software development projects.
