The course covers the entire software development process, including requirements analysis, system design, coding, testing, and more. Students will learn to utilize various software development tools and techniques, such as UML modeling, agile development methods, version control, etc., to complete real-world software development tasks. In this course, students will also be exposed to knowledge in software quality assurance and software project management, among other software engineering topics. Through studying and practicing in this course, students will be able to grasp the basic principles and methods of software design and cultivate their ability to solve practical software development problems, ultimately laying a solid foundation for their future careers in software.
zh_law_content: 软件设计实践课程主要是通过实际的软件开发项目来培养学生的软件设计和开发能力。课程包括软件开发的整个过程，从需求分析、系统设计到编码和测试等环节。学生将通过实践项目，学会运用各类软件开发工具和技术，如UML建模、敏捷开发方法、版本控制等，来完成真实的软件开发任务。在课程中，学生还将接触到软件质量保证、软件项目管理等软件工程的相关知识。通过本课程的学习和实践，学生将能够掌握软件设计的基本原理和方法，培养解决实际软件开发问题的能力，为将来的软件工作打下坚实基础。

law_content: The foundational course of software science is one of the core courses in the field of computer science. The course aims to equip students with the basic concepts, theories, and technical methods of software science and to cultivate their abilities in software design and development. The course covers topics such as the fundamental principles of software engineering, the basic process of software development, software requirement analysis and specification, software design and implementation, software testing and debugging, and software maintenance and management. Through studying this course, students will understand and apply the fundamental theories and methods of software science to solve practical problems, and also possess the basic skills in software design and development, laying a solid foundation for further study and practice in software science.
zh_law_content: 软件科学基础课程是计算机类专业的基础课程之一。本课程旨在让学生掌握软件科学的基本概念、基本理论和基本技术方法，培养学生的软件设计和开发能力。课程内容包括软件工程的基本原理、软件开发的基本过程、软件需求分析与规格说明、软件设计与实现、软件测试和调试、软件维护和管理等。通过本课程的学习，学生将能够理解并应用软件科学的基本理论和方法解决实际问题，同时还将具备软件设计和开发的基本能力，为进一步深入学习和实践软件科学打下坚实的基础。

law_content: Cognitive neuroscience is an interdisciplinary field that studies the human brain and its cognitive functions. The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and theories of cognitive neuroscience, and explore how the brain generates cognitive processes such as thinking, perception, learning, and memory. Through this course, students can gain an understanding of the structure and function of the brain, the workings of neurons and neural networks, and the role of psychology in cognitive neuroscience research. Additionally, the course will introduce brain imaging techniques and experimental research methods to help students understand the research progress and application prospects of cognitive neuroscience. With the learning and practice in this course, students will develop skills in scientific thinking, data analysis, and experimental design, laying a solid foundation for future research or careers in this field.
zh_law_content: 脑与认知科学是研究人类大脑及其认知功能的跨学科领域。本课程的目标是介绍脑与认知科学的基本概念与理论，并探讨大脑如何产生思维、感知、学习和记忆等认知过程。通过学习，学生可以了解脑的结构与功能、神经元与神经网络的工作原理，以及心理学在认知科学研究中的作用。此外，课程还会介绍脑成像技术和实验研究方法，帮助学生了解脑与认知科学的研究进展和应用前景。通过本课程的学习和实践，学生将培养科学思维、数据分析和实验设计的能力，为未来从事相关研究或职业打下坚实的基础。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts and fundamental theory of digital signal processing, as well as commonly used analysis methods and processing techniques. By studying this course, students will be able to understand the characteristics of digital signals, master basic techniques such as digital signal sampling and quantization, digital filtering, and spectrum analysis, and understand the applications of digital signal processing in fields such as communication, audio and video processing, and image processing. In addition, this course will also introduce the development trends and latest research advances in digital signal processing, and cultivate students' innovative thinking and practical application abilities. Through laboratory practice, students will learn to use software tools such as MATLAB for digital signal processing design and simulation, and master the basic principles and operational skills of digital signal processing experiments.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍数字信号处理的基本概念和基础理论，以及常用的分析方法和处理技术。通过学习本课程，学生将能够理解数字信号的特点，掌握数字信号采样与量化、数字滤波、频谱分析等基本技术，了解数字信号处理在通信、音视频处理、图像处理等领域的应用。此外，本课程还将介绍数字信号处理的发展趋势和最新研究进展，培养学生的创新思维和实际应用能力。通过实验实践，学生将学会使用MATLAB等软件工具进行数字信号处理的设计和仿真，掌握数字信号处理实验的基本原理和操作技巧。

law_content: The main focus of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts, principles, and application technologies of quantum technology. By studying this course, students will learn the basic knowledge of quantum physics, master the fundamental principles and mathematical tools of quantum mechanics, become familiar with the description and evolution of quantum systems, understand the basic concepts of quantum state measurement and entanglement, and study the application technologies in fields such as quantum communication, quantum computing, quantum measurement, and quantum sensing. Through classroom lectures, laboratory work, and practical training, students will acquire the basic theories and experimental techniques of quantum technology, cultivate innovative thinking and scientific research methods, and lay a solid foundation for engaging in quantum technology research and application work.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍量子技术的基本概念、基本原理和应用技术。通过学习本课程，学生将了解量子物理学的基础知识，掌握量子力学的基本原理和数学工具，熟悉量子系统的描述和演化，了解量子态的测量和纠缠等基本概念，并学习量子通信、量子计算、量子测量和量子传感等领域的应用技术。学生通过课堂讲授、实验操作和实践训练，将掌握量子技术的基本理论和实验技术，培养创新思维和科学研究方法，为从事量子技术相关研究和应用工作打下坚实基础。

law_content: Solid-state physics is a branch of physics that studies the structure, properties, and behavior of solids. This course aims to introduce the basic concepts and theories of solid-state physics and cultivate students' understanding and comprehension of solid-state physics. Through studying this course, students will be able to grasp the fundamental theories and experimental methods of solid-state physics, understand the structure and crystallography of solids, investigate the electronic structure and conductivity of solids, as well as important phenomena and applications in solid-state physics such as phase transitions and magnetism. Through experimental exploration and theoretical analysis, students will also develop teamwork and scientific research abilities, laying a solid foundation for further learning and research in solid-state physics.
zh_law_content: 固体物理是研究固体的结构、性质和行为的物理学分支，本课程旨在介绍固体物理的基本概念和理论，培养学生对固体物理的基本认识和理解能力。通过学习本课程，学生能够掌握固体物理的基本理论和实验方法，了解固体的结构和晶体学，研究固体的电子结构和导电性，以及固体物理中的相变和磁性等重要现象与应用。通过实验探究和理论分析，学生还能够培养团队合作和科学研究能力，为深入学习和研究固体物理奠定坚实基础。

law_content: This course is an experimental course in the field of solid mechanics. Through this course, students will grasp the basic concepts, principles, and experimental techniques of solid mechanics experiments, and understand the current research status and development trends in solid mechanics experiments. The focus of the course is to cultivate students' ability to analyze experimental data in solid mechanics, master commonly used testing methods and skills in solid mechanics experiments, and enhance their abilities in experimental design and data processing. Through practical experiments, students will also learn about mechanical behavior, mechanical properties, and material mechanical properties. This course aims to cultivate students' hands-on ability, observational ability, and experimental skills, laying a solid foundation for their future work in solid mechanics research or related engineering practice.
zh_law_content: 本课程是固体力学领域的实验课程。通过本课程的学习，学生将掌握固体力学实验的基本概念、基本原理和实验技术方法，了解固体力学实验的研究现状和发展趋势。课程的重点是培养学生分析固体力学实验数据的能力，掌握固体力学实验中常用的测试方法和仪器设备操作技巧，提升学生的实验设计和数据处理能力。同时，通过实验实践，学生将学习到力学行为、力学性能和材料力学性质等相关知识。本课程旨在培养学生动手能力、观察能力和实验技能，为学生今后从事固体力学研究或相关工程实践打下坚实基础。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts and principles of computational solid mechanics, as well as related computational methods and techniques. Through learning, students will be able to master the mechanical behavior and models of solids, understand the basic theory and equations of solid mechanics, and acquire the basic methods and skills of computational solid mechanics. They will also learn how to analyze and solve solid mechanics problems using computational tools and software, as well as apply solid mechanics theory and methods in engineering practice and scientific research. Through this course, students will develop analytical and computational abilities in computational mechanics and engineering mechanics, providing a foundation for further study and application of solid mechanics.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍计算固体力学的基本概念和原理，以及相关的计算方法和技术。通过学习，学生将能够掌握固体的力学行为和力学模型，了解固体力学的基本理论和基本方程，掌握计算固体力学的基本方法和技巧。同时，还将学习如何利用计算工具和计算软件进行固体力学问题的分析和解决，以及如何应用固体力学理论和方法进行工程实践和科学研究。通过本课程的学习，学生将培养计算力学和工程力学方面的分析和计算能力，为进一步深入研究和应用固体力学提供基础。

law_content: Mechanical Design Fundamentals is one of the basic courses in mechanical engineering. It aims to cultivate students' systematic and scientific understanding of basic theories and methods of mechanical design, as well as their mastery of fundamental principles and skills in designing mechanical components, mechanisms, and systems. This course mainly covers basic concepts of mechanical design, requirements and representation methods of drawings, design of mechanical components, design of mechanical structures, and design of mechanical systems. Through the study of this course, students will be able to grasp the basic principles and methods of mechanical design, possess the ability to conduct simple mechanical designs, and lay a solid foundation for future professional learning and work.
zh_law_content: 机械设计基础是机械工程专业的基础课程之一，旨在培养学生具备系统、科学的机械设计基础理论和方法，掌握机械零部件、机构和机械系统设计的基本原理和技能。本课程主要包括机械设计的基本概念、图纸的基本要求和表示方法、机械零部件的设计、机械结构设计、机械系统设计等内容。通过本课程的学习，学生能够掌握机械设计的基本原理和方法，具备进行简单机械设计的能力，为以后的专业学习和工作打下坚实的基础。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts, fundamental theories, and fundamental methods of advanced algebra, aiming to enable students to systematically master the basic knowledge of advanced algebra, clearly understand the structure and properties of abstract algebra, be familiar with the basic operation rules and properties of algebraic systems, and be able to apply algebraic methods to solve practical problems. The content of the course includes linear algebra, matrix theory, vector spaces, group theory, and ring theory. Through a combination of theory and examples, it cultivates students' abstract thinking abilities and mathematical analysis abilities, and lays a solid foundation for further study in mathematics and applied mathematics. Through this course, students will master the basic concepts, fundamental principles, and problem-solving techniques of advanced algebra, and possess the ability to analyze and solve mathematical problems.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍高等代数的基本概念、基本理论和基本方法，旨在使学生能够系统地掌握高等代数的基础知识，清楚地了解抽象代数的结构和性质，熟悉代数系统的基本运算规则和性质，能够应用代数方法解决实际问题。课程内容包括线性代数、矩阵论、向量空间、群论和环论等，通过理论与实例相结合的方式，培养学生的抽象思维能力和数学分析能力，为进一步深入学习数学和应用数学打下坚实基础。通过本课程的学习，学生将掌握高等代数的基本概念、基本原理和解题技巧，具备分析和解决数学问题的能力。

law_content: This course is a basic experimental course for physics majors, aiming to cultivate students' experimental manipulation skills and scientific research literacy through physics experiments. The course content includes the principles and methods of basic physics experiments, the use and debugging of experimental equipment, data processing, and result analysis. By completing a series of experimental tasks, students can master basic physics experimental skills, understand the basic principles and methods of physics experiments, and be able to independently design, operate, and analyze data in experiments. This course emphasizes the combination of theory and practice, focusing on the cultivation of students' hands-on ability and practical problem-solving ability, and provides a solid foundation for subsequent professional course learning.
zh_law_content: 本课程是物理学专业的基础实验课程，旨在通过进行物理实验来培养学生的实验操作能力和科学研究素养。课程内容包括基本物理实验的原理和方法、实验仪器的使用和调试、数据处理和结果分析等方面的知识。通过完成一系列实验任务，学生能够掌握基础物理实验技能，了解物理实验的基本原理和方法，并能够独立进行实验设计、操作和数据分析。本课程重视实践与理论相结合，注重培养学生的动手能力和实际解决问题的能力，为后续专业课程的学习做好基础准备。

law_content: This course introduces the basic theory and methods of probability theory and mathematical statistics, aiming to cultivate students' ability to apply probability and statistical knowledge to analyze and solve practical problems. The course covers basic concepts in probability space, random variables, random processes, and statistical inference, as well as various probability distributions, parameter estimation, hypothesis testing, and other statistical methods. Through theoretical explanations and example analysis, students will master the fundamental concepts, principles, and skills in probability and mathematical statistics, understand the application of probability and statistics in fields such as science, engineering, and economics, and develop their logical thinking, data analysis, and problem-solving abilities.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍概率论和数理统计的基本理论和方法，旨在培养学生运用概率和统计知识分析和解决实际问题的能力。课程内容包括概率空间、随机变量、随机过程、统计推断等方面的基本概念，以及各种概率分布、参数估计、假设检验等统计方法。通过理论讲解和实例分析，使学生掌握概率与数理统计的基本概念、基本原理和基本技巧，了解概率与统计在科学、工程、经济等领域中的应用，培养学生的逻辑思维、数据分析和问题解决能力。

law_content: This course introduces the basic principles and fundamental knowledge in the field of chemical engineering, including the physical properties of substances, chemical reactions, mass balance, energy balance, etc. It also covers the design and optimization of chemical processes, such as drawing process flow diagrams, analyzing and calculating transfer processes, etc. By studying this course, students will gain theoretical foundations and practical skills, enabling them to understand and solve basic problems in chemical engineering and lay a solid foundation for future work in the field.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍化工工程领域的基本原理和基础知识，包括物质的物理性质、化学反应、质量平衡、能量平衡等方面。同时也会涉及到化工过程的设计和优化，如流程图的绘制、传递过程的分析和计算等。通过学习本课程，学生将获得理论基础和实践技能，能够理解和解决化工工程中的基本问题，为日后从事化工相关工作打下坚实的基础。

law_content: This course aims to cultivate students' experimental skills and scientific literacy in the field of energy and environmental engineering. Through a combination of theory and practice, it aims to enhance students' understanding and application ability of experimental techniques in energy and environmental engineering. The course covers fundamental principles of energy and environmental engineering experiments, experimental design, experimental operation techniques, and experimental data processing and analysis. By completing various experimental tasks, students will learn about experimental methods in energy and environmental engineering, the use of instruments and equipment, and the interpretation of experimental results. In addition, this course will also introduce the latest research advances and application directions in the field of energy and environmental engineering experiments, as well as relevant knowledge of experimental safety and environmental protection. Through this course, students will be able to master the basic skills and practical abilities of energy and environmental engineering experiments, laying a solid foundation for future research and work in related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在培养学生在能源与环境工程领域的实验能力和科学素养，通过理论与实践相结合的方式，提高学生对能源与环境工程实验的理解和应用能力。课程包括能源与环境工程实验的基本原理、实验设计、实验操作技术和实验数据处理分析等内容。通过完成各种实验任务，学生将学习到能源与环境工程实验方法、仪器设备的使用和实验结果的解读，同时培养学生的实验思维和解决问题的能力。此外，本课程还将介绍能源与环境工程实验领域的最新研究进展和应用方向，以及相关的实验安全与环境保护知识。通过本课程的学习，学生将能够掌握能源与环境工程实验的基本技能和实践能力，为今后从事相关研究和工作打下坚实的基础。

law_content: Material physics is a discipline that studies the physical properties and behaviors of materials, primarily focusing on the fundamental theories and experimental methods related to the structure, properties, preparation, and application of materials. This course aims to cultivate students' understanding and mastery of the basic concepts, principles, and experimental techniques in material physics, enabling them to analyze and interpret the physical properties and behaviors of materials and provide theoretical support for material design, preparation, and application. The course content includes the basic theories and experimental methods related to the crystal structure, defects and elastic mechanics, thermal properties, electrical properties, magnetic properties, etc. Through classroom teaching and experimental practice, students will acquire the basic skills and abilities to engage in material physics experiments, laying a foundation for further research in materials science and engineering.
zh_law_content: 材料物理是一门研究材料的物理性质和物理行为的学科，主要涉及材料的结构、性能、制备和应用方面的基础理论和实验方法。本课程旨在培养学生对材料物理的基本概念、基本原理和实验技术方法的理解和掌握，使学生能够分析和解释材料的物理性质和行为，为材料的设计、制备和应用提供理论支持。课程内容包括材料的晶体结构、缺陷与弹性力学、热学性质、电学性质、磁学性质等方面的基本理论和实验方法。通过课堂教学和实验操作，学生将具备从事材料物理实验的基本技能和能力，为进一步深入研究材料科学和工程提供基础。

law_content: Material Engineering Fundamentals is a basic course in the field of Material Engineering. It aims to provide students with a fundamental understanding of material structures, properties, preparation, and applications, as well as basic analysis and experimental techniques. The course covers fundamental knowledge in material composition and structure, mechanical properties, physical properties, thermal properties, electrical properties, as well as material preparation, processing methods, and common material applications. By studying this course, students will be able to grasp the basic concepts and principles of material engineering, possess the ability to analyze and solve material-related problems, and establish a foundation for further study and research in material engineering.
zh_law_content: 材料工程基础课程是材料工程专业的一门基础课程，旨在通过讲授材料的结构、性能、制备和应用等方面的基本知识，让学生建立起对材料工程的基本认识和了解，掌握基本的分析和实验技术方法。课程内容包括材料的组成和结构、材料的力学性能、物理性能、热学性能、电学性能等方面的基础知识，以及材料的制备和加工方法、常见材料的应用等方面的内容。通过学习本课程，学生将能够掌握材料工程学科的基本概念和原理，具备分析和解决材料问题的基本能力，为进一步学习和研究材料工程提供基础。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the principles and methods of modern materials analysis, including the basic concepts, principles, and techniques of materials analysis. Through studying this course, students will gain an understanding of the fundamental theories, instrumentation, and experimental techniques of modern materials analysis. They will also learn the basic principles and methods of characterizing material properties and structures, as well as the applications of common materials analysis techniques. This course will also cover topics such as surface analysis, microstructural analysis, and compositional analysis to enhance students' understanding of material properties and structural analysis. Through theoretical learning and experimental practice, students will develop the ability to analyze and solve problems related to material properties and structures, laying a foundation for future research or work in this field.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍现代材料分析与原理，包括材料分析的基本概念、原理和方法。通过学习本课程，学生将会了解现代材料分析的基本理论、仪器设备和实验技术，掌握材料性能和结构表征的基本原理与方法，以及常见材料分析技术的应用。本课程还将介绍材料表面分析、微观结构分析、组分分析等方面的内容，以提高学生对材料性能和结构分析的理解和认识。通过理论学习和实验实践，使学生具备分析和解决材料性能与结构问题的能力，为其未来从事相关研究或工作打下基础。

law_content: The Earth Materials course is a foundational course for geology or earth science majors, which aims to introduce the composition, properties, and evolutionary processes of Earth materials. Through this course, students will learn about the classification, structure, formation, and physical characteristics of Earth materials, as well as how to explore their evolutionary history and geological processes through experiments and research. The course also emphasizes the cultivation of students' laboratory skills, enabling them to grasp the basic principles and methods of Earth material analysis, and proficiently utilize modern scientific and technological equipment for experimental research. In addition, students will gain an understanding of the significant implications of Earth materials for Earth evolution, mineral resources, and the environment, and discuss the current status and trends in Earth material research. By studying this course, students will acquire a solid foundation in the basic concepts, principles, and experimental techniques of Earth materials, laying a strong groundwork for future research in the field of geology or earth science.
zh_law_content: 地球物质课程是地质学或地球科学专业的一门基础课程，旨在介绍地球物质的组成、性质和演化过程。通过本课程的学习，学生将了解地球物质的分类、结构、成因和物理特性，并学习如何通过实验和研究探索地球物质的演化历史和地质过程。课程还注重培养学生的实验技能，让学生掌握地球物质分析的基本原理和方法，并能熟练运用现代科学技术设备进行实验研究。此外，学生还将了解地球物质对地球演化、矿产资源和环境等方面的重要意义，并探讨地球物质研究的现状和发展趋势。通过本课程的学习，学生将掌握地球物质的基本概念、基本原理和实验技术方法，为从事地质学或地球科学领域的研究打下坚实基础。

law_name: 整合量子力学与分子光谱
law_content: This course aims to integrate knowledge of quantum mechanics and molecular spectroscopy to explore the fundamental theory and applications of molecular structure and spectroscopy. The course covers mathematical foundations of quantum mechanics, Schrödinger equation, and wave functions, as well as electronic structure, molecular orbitals, and vibrational-rotational spectroscopy. Through learning, students will gain a deep understanding of the quantum mechanical description of molecules and the principles of molecular spectroscopy, as well as mastering quantum mechanical calculation methods and analytical techniques of molecular spectroscopy. Furthermore, the course discusses the applications of molecular spectroscopy in areas such as chemical structure determination, kinetic studies, and spectral analysis, and introduces relevant experimental techniques and instruments. Through practical experiments and case studies, students will develop the ability to process and interpret molecular spectroscopy data, providing scientific solutions to practical problems.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在整合量子力学和分子光谱的知识，以探索分子结构和光谱学的基本理论和应用。课程内容包括量子力学的数学基础、薛定谔方程和波函数，以及电子结构、分子轨道和振动-转动光谱。通过学习，学生可以深入理解分子的量子力学描述和分子光谱的原理，掌握量子力学计算方法和分析分子光谱的技巧。此外，课程还讨论了分子光谱在化学结构确定、动力学研究和光谱分析等领域的应用，并介绍了相关的实验技术和仪器。通过实验操作和案例分析，学生将培养分子光谱数据的处理和解释能力，为实际问题提供科学的解决方案。

law_content: Integrated thermodynamics is the study of the basic principles, concepts, and methods of thermodynamics, combining thermodynamics with other sciences to study the processes of substance transformation scientifically. This course aims to develop students' ability to comprehensively apply the knowledge of thermodynamics and other related disciplines to solve practical problems. Through learning, students will grasp the basic concepts, principles, and methods of thermodynamics, understand the application of thermodynamics in engineering practice and scientific research, acquire the basic skills of analyzing and calculating thermodynamic problems, and cultivate their innovative ability and comprehensive qualities.
zh_law_content: 整合热力学是研究热力学的基本原理、基本概念和基本方法，以热力学为基础，结合其他科学，研究物质转化过程的科学。该课程旨在培养学生综合运用热力学和其他相关学科知识，解决实际问题的能力。通过学习，使学生掌握热力学的基本概念、基本原理和基本方法，了解热力学在工程实践和科学研究中的应用，掌握分析和计算热力学问题的基本技能，培养学生的创新能力和综合素质。

law_content: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts and theories of flight mechanics and control. Students will learn about the motion and behavior of aircraft in the air, as well as how to manipulate the attitude and motion of an aircraft through control means. The course content includes the fundamental principles of flight mechanics, aircraft stability and maneuverability, flight trajectory and performance, etc. Through theoretical explanations and case analysis, students will be able to understand the equations of motion and control mechanisms of aircraft, master the dynamic model and control system design methods of aircraft, and be capable of performing performance analysis and control strategy design for aircraft. This course is of great significance for the training of aircraft designers and pilots, and also lays a solid foundation for further study and research in related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍飞行力学和控制的基本概念和理论。学生将学习飞机在空中的运动和行为，以及如何通过控制手段来操纵飞机的姿态和运动。课程内容包括飞行力学基本原理、飞行器稳定性和操纵性、飞行轨迹和飞行性能等。通过理论讲解和实例分析，学生将能够理解飞行器的运动方程和控制机构，掌握飞行器的动力学模型和控制系统设计方法，能够进行飞行器的性能分析和控制策略设计。本课程对于飞行器设计和飞行器操控人员的培养具有重要意义，也为后续学习和研究相关领域打下坚实的基础。

law_content: Ancient Chinese is a core course in the Chinese Department of Peking University. It was developed by the Ancient Chinese Teaching and Research Office, and it aims to provide students with comprehensive, systematic, and innovative training in professional course development. It was awarded the first prize in the 5th National Higher Education Teaching Achievement Awards in 2005, making it the only humanities course among the awarded projects. As one of the core courses in the Chinese Department, this course focuses on cultivating and improving students' ability to read ancient books. The teaching content incorporates a variety of disciplines, such as literature, history, language, culture, astronomy, and geography. It combines classroom teaching with outside reading, and includes classic and ancient texts as required reading materials. It provides planned guidance for students' reading and learning, and emphasizes the reading of original ancient texts. However, due to the rich content and large number of students, it is difficult to fully meet the diverse learning needs within the limited classroom time. Therefore, it is hoped that small class teaching can be used to provide students with more time for intensive reading of original documents, deepen their understanding of the original texts through discussions, better grasp the content of the lectures, and also cultivate students' ability to think, discuss, and exchange learning experiences.
zh_law_content: 古代汉语 是北京大学中文系的专业核心课 古代汉语教研室集体完成的“ ” 古代汉语系列课程建设的新开拓 以为学生提供全面系统和前沿创新的“ ———专业课程训练为核心 曾荣获 年第五届高等教育国家级教学成果一等” ２００５奖 这是本届 项国家级一等奖获奖项目中唯一的一门人文学科课程 作为 ５９ 中文系的专业核心课 本课程以培养和提高学生阅读古书的能力为出发点 教 学内容追求多样化 把古代的文学 历史 语言 文化 天文 地理等学科知识熔     于一炉 把课堂教学和课下读书有机结合起来 为此设计了与教材配套的经典 古籍作为必读的参考资料 有计划地指导学生阅读和学习 加强原典古籍文 本的阅读力度 但因为教学内容丰富 修课学生的人数较多 课堂时间难以满  足学生多样化的学习需要 故而希望借助小班教学为学生提供精读原典文献的时间 并通过讨论加深学生对原典文献的理解 更好地把握课堂讲授的内 容 同时也培养学生思考 讨论问题 以及交流学习心得的能力

law_content: This course introduces introductory knowledge of modern Chinese phonetics, vocabulary, and characters, laying the foundation for subsequent courses. The Modern Chinese course is a basic course in Chinese linguistics, divided into two parts: "Modern Chinese I" and "Modern Chinese II". The teaching content of "Modern Chinese I" includes an introduction, phonetics, characters, and vocabulary.
zh_law_content: 本课程学习现代汉语语音学 词汇学 文字学的入门知识 为后续课程打下基  础 现代汉语 课程是汉语语言文字学的基础课 分为上 下两部分 其中 “ ”   现代汉语 上 的教学内容包括绪论 语音 文字和词汇 个部分

law_content: This course is one of the core foundation courses in the Chinese department, Introduction to the History of Chinese Literature. Firstly, it introduces the discipline of literary history and the basic characteristics of Chinese literary history. The learning objectives are to overview the overall development of literature from pre-Qin to the Han Dynasty. Then, the following topics will be discussed in order: mythology and ancient songs, The Book of Songs, prose of the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods, historical biographies: [Title], prose, Chu Ci, Han Dynasty fu, Han Dynasty prose, Han Yuefu poetry and poetry of the end of the Han Dynasty.
zh_law_content: 本课程是中文系主干基础课 中国古代文学史 之一 首先介绍文学史的学科“ ” 性质及中国文学史的基本特点 学习目标 概述先秦至两汉文学发展的大势  然后依次讲述下列内容 神话与上古歌谣 诗经 春秋战国诸子散文 史传： 《 》 散文 楚辞 两汉辞赋 两汉散文 汉乐府诗与汉末文人诗

law_content: This course introduces the fundamental concepts, theories, and analytical methods of linguistics. It aims to enable students to grasp the basic knowledge of linguistics systematically, gain a clear understanding of the structural patterns of language, the rules of language evolution, the nature of writing, and the relationship between language and society.
zh_law_content: 本课程讲解语言学的基本概念 基本理论和基本分析方法 使学生通过学习能 比较系统地掌握语言学的基础知识 比较清楚地了解语言的结构规律 语言的 演变规律 文字的性质 以及语言与社会的关系等方面的内容

law_content: This course primarily studies and lectures on the process, development, and evolution of the New Literature from the period before and after the May Fourth Movement until the establishment of the People's Republic of China in 1949. It explores the modernization of literature that adapted to the social transformations in China and the special role played by the New Literature in promoting individual modernization. The course also examines the transformation and reform of traditional literature, the changes in language forms and aesthetic concepts, and focuses on the analysis and evaluation of major literary historical phenomena and representative writers' works. Additionally, it traces the formation of the modern literary tradition.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要研究和讲授五四前后到 年共和国成立这一历史阶段 新文学１９４９ 的发生 发展和衍变的过程 考察与中国社会变革相适应的 文学现代化 历  “ ”史内容 包括新文学对传统文学的变革与改造 在促进 人的现代化 方面所  “ ”发挥的特殊作用 以及语言形式和审美观念的变革 重点是对重大文学史现象 ；和代表性作家作品的分析评价 以及对现代文学传统形成的梳理

law_content: This course provides a systematic introduction to the development of Chinese literature since 1949, including significant writers, their works, and literary phenomena. The purpose is to enhance students' knowledge of literary history and guide them in gaining a deep understanding of important literary works and literary phenomena.
zh_law_content: 本课程较为系统地介绍 年以来中国文学的发展过程 重要作家作品及文１９４９ 学现象 目的是增强学生的文学史知识 并引导他们深入地理解重要文学作品 和文学现象

law_content: Literary principles is a fundamental course in the Chinese literature department of a university. It focuses on the basic theories, concepts, categories, and interdisciplinary methods related to literature. The course systematically teaches the essence and form of literature, aiming to enable students to grasp the fundamental nature, characteristics, laws, and functions of literature from a theoretical perspective.
zh_law_content: 文学原理是大学中文系的主干基础课 以文学的基本理论 概念 范畴 以及相   关的学科方法为研究对象 系统讲授文学的本体与形态等基本内容 通过学 习 使同学能够从理论高度掌握文学的基本性质 特点 规律和功能

law_content: This course consists of lectures and practical exercises. The lecture part mainly introduces the characteristics and types of Chinese reference books, as well as the main methods of searching for Chinese characters and words, ancient and modern books, chapters, sentences, newspaper articles, academic papers, biographies, geographical literature, general knowledge, historical events, etc. It also provides an appropriate introduction to the use of modern information technology resources and various Chinese reference books, while paying attention to supplementing and introducing new reference books. The practical exercises are in the form of assignments after completing each unit, allowing students to consult and use commonly used Chinese reference books in order to become familiar with and master the correct methods of using these reference books, better serving their studies and scientific research. The practical exercises account for 6 hours, while the remaining time is for lectures.
zh_law_content: 本课程分讲授和实习两部分 讲授部分主要介绍中文工具书的特点和类型 主要排检方法 如何查找汉语字词 古今图书 篇目文句 报刊论文 人物传记     地理文献 百科知识 历史事件等内容 适当介绍利用现代信息技术资源使用  各类中文工具书 并注意对新岀工具书的补充和介绍 实习是在每单元内容 学完以后 以作业的形式 让学生查阅和使用常用的中文工具书 以便熟悉和  掌握中文工具书的正确使用方法 更好地为学习和科研服务 实习占 学时  ６ 其余为讲授时间

law_content: This course aims to help international students understand and grasp the core content and fundamental spirit of Chinese traditional culture, familiarize themselves with cultural knowledge, deepen their understanding of ancient society, cultivate preliminary methods of cultural research, and explore comparative research ideas through vertical and horizontal connections.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在帮助留学生同学理解与把握中国传统文化的核心内容与基本精神 熟悉文化常识 加深对古代社会的认识 培养文化研究的初步方法 在纵向；  ； 与横向联系中开拓比较研究思路

law_content: This course mainly introduces the general situation of the four major categories of ancient Chinese classics: philosophy, history, literature, and miscellaneous. It discusses the compilation, versions, transmission, and organization of important classics, aiming to give students a basic understanding of ancient Chinese classics and cultivate their ability to consult and utilize various ancient books.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍中国古代经 史 子 集四部典籍概况 讲述重要典籍的成书    内容 版本 流传与整理情况 使学生对中国古代典籍有一基本了解 并培养学生查阅 使用各种古书的能力

law_content: Comparative literature is an open discipline that studies literature from an international perspective. This course will introduce the theoretical foundations and historical development of comparative literature, as well as its history and current state in China. Based on this, it will explore and analyze the basic theories and main research methods of comparative literature, including the study of influences, reception, the relationship between Chinese and foreign literature, comparative poetics, interdisciplinary integration, and cross-cultural comparisons. The aim is to provide students with a general understanding of comparative literature.
zh_law_content: 比较文学是一门从国际的视角研究文学的开放学科 本课程将介绍比较文学的学科理论 学科发展史 比较文学在中国的历史和现状 在此基础上介绍和分析  比较文学的基本理论和主要研究方法 包括 影响 接受研究 中外文学关系研 ： — 究 比较诗学 科际整合 以及跨文化比较等 从而使学生了解比较文学的一般

law_content: Folk literature is a unique form of literature that uses oral language as its medium, distinguishable from written literature. In daily life, folk literature serves an irreplaceable function. This course will provide a comprehensive introduction to the fundamental theories of folk literature and the classic oral literary works popular among various social classes.
zh_law_content: 民间文学就是一种以口头语言作为载体的不同于书面文学的特殊文学 在日常生活中 民间文学具有不可替代的功能 本课程将概括介绍民间文学的基 本理论和流行于社会各个阶层之中的经典性的口头文学作品

law_content:
How to carry out the basic computer education among newly enrolled university students has always been a problem in the design of university courses. Generally speaking, the introduction to computing and programming foundations are the basic foundation of computer science, which includes computing introduction and programming foundations (Programming Foundation) in high school. Many students have already received basic computer education, including basic knowledge of computers such as software, hardware, computer networks, binary, word processing, as well as basic operating system and database operations. It also includes some basic programming training. However, due to various reasons such as further education and others, students have different levels of foundation. Some have little knowledge of basic computer knowledge, some have mastered basic computer operations and applications, some can write programs, and some have mastered good programming skills. However, very few students can truly understand the essence of computation.

Considering these situations, this course integrates the connotation of computation and programming foundations in terms of content, allowing students to grasp the principles and methods of program design based on understanding the essence of computation, and then master the ability to solve practical problems. At the same time, we design different teaching classes according to students' different levels of competence to meet their different needs, striving to keep every student's learning "fresh" in this course and avoid phenomena such as falling behind or slow progress.
zh_law_content: 如何在新入学的大学生中开展计算机基础教育 一直是高校课程设计中面临的一个问题 一般说来 计算机学科的入门基础包括计算引论  （Ｉｎｔｒｏｄｕｃｔｉｏｎ ｔｏ和程序设计基础 两个部分 在高中阶Ｃｏｍｐｕｔｉｎｇ） （Ｐｒｏｇｒａｍｍｉｎｇ Ｆｏｕｎｄａｔｉｏｎ） 段 很多学生已经接受过计算机基础教育 包括计算机的基础知识 如软件 硬   件 计算机网络 二进制 文字处理 以及基本的操作系统和数据库操作等 也    包括一些基本的程序设计训练 当然 由于升学及其他方面的原因 不同学生  的基础各不相同 有的对计算机的基础知识了解很少 有的学会了计算机的 基本操作和应用 有的会写程序 有的则掌握了较好的编程技巧 但很少有学  生能够真正理解计算的本质 考虑到这些情况 本课程在内容上融合了计算的 内涵和程序设计基础两个方面 让学生在理解计算的本质的基础上掌握程序设计的原理和方法 进而掌握解决实际问题的能力 同时 我们根据学生的不同层  次 设计不同的教学班级来满足学生的不同需求 争取让每个学生都能够在本课 程中保持 新鲜 的学习 避免了 跟不上 嚼冷饭 进度慢 等现象

law_content: Introduce the basic methods of data structure and algorithm analysis from different perspectives. Help students understand the logical structure of commonly used data structures such as linear lists, stacks, queues, strings, arrays, trees, and graphs, as well as the corresponding basic operations, implementation, and evaluation. Develop their ability to analyze the time and space complexity of algorithms. Introduce sorting techniques, including insertion sort, selection sort, exchange sort, radix sort, and merge sort, and discuss their time and space costs. Through this course, students will master the design and analysis methods of commonly used data structures and algorithms. Enhance their programming skills by selecting appropriate data structures to solve simple problem-solving scenarios.
zh_law_content: 从 角度介绍常用的数据结构和算法分析的基本方法 使学生从数据１． ＡＤＴ 结构的逻辑结构 相应的一组基本运算 实现 以及对实现的评价等方面去掌  握线性表 栈 队列 串 数组 树 图等常用的数据结构 并对算法的时间和空      间复杂性有一定的分析能力介绍排序技术 使学生掌握插入排序 选择排序 交换排序 基数排序 归并２．     排序等常用的排序算法 并讨论它们的时间和空间开销 通过本课程的学习 学生将掌握常用的数据结构和算法的设计和分析方法３．  提高程序设计的能力 针对简单的求解问题 选择合理的数据结构解决之

law_content: Probability theory is a mathematical discipline that studies the objective regularities of random phenomena, while mathematical statistics is a discipline that studies random phenomena using limited data with random influences. Through the teaching of this course, students are expected to master the basic concepts of probability theory and mathematical statistics, understand their underlying theories and methods, and develop a preliminary understanding of the basic ideas and methods of dealing with random phenomena. Students will also be equipped with the ability to apply probability and statistical methods to analyze and solve practical problems.
zh_law_content: 概率论是研究随机现象客观规律性的数学学科 而数理统计则是以有限的带随机影响的数据来研究随机现象的学科 通过本课程的教学 使学生掌握概 率论与数理统计的基本概念 了解其基本理论和方法 从而使学生初步掌握处 理随机现象的基本思想和方法 培养学生运用概率统计方法分析和解决实际问题的能力

law_content: C++ is an important computer language with modern programming ideas. It is beneficial for gaining a deep understanding of C++ (OOP), programming efficient computer software. The main objective of this course is to introduce the basic concepts of the language and object-oriented programming methods. It is a language programming course through which students can gradually learn by utilizing numerous program examples and related exercises. The primary goal is to cultivate students' mastery of the basic elements of programming language and progressively acquire the functionality of object-oriented programming in C++. This will establish a solid foundation in program design for future course studies.
zh_law_content: 是一门具有现代编程思想 的重要计算机语言 有利于深入了解计Ｃ＋＋ （ＯＯＰ） 算机器 编写快速高效的计算机软件 本课程的主要目的：主要介绍 语言和面向对象程序设计的方法的基本概念 它是一门语言编Ｃ＋＋ 程课程 学习过程中可通过大量的程序实例和相关练习逐步掌握 主要培养学 生掌握程序设计语言的基本要素学习者在学习过程中逐步掌握 的面向对象的功能 从而掌握面向对象程序Ｃ＋＋ 设计的基本知识和基本技能 为后续的课程学习奠定坚实的程序设计基础

law_content: The required thesis for a third-year undergraduate student.
zh_law_content: 三年级本科生必须完成的论文

law_content: This course is designed for senior students majoring in Chinese literature. It focuses on the study of classical masterpieces of Chinese literary criticism, tracing the origin, changes, and characteristics of Chinese literary theory, and exploring its contemporary value. The course aims to provide an overview of the development of Chinese literary criticism, clarify its concepts and categories, and summarize the valuable experiences in order to enhance students' theoretical level and appreciation ability.
zh_law_content: 本课程是为中文系高年级学生开设的专业核心课 以中国文论经典名篇为讲授对象 讲授中国文论的源流正变 斯文 传统 理论特性及当代价值 梳理 “ ”  中国文论发展脉络 概念范畴 总结中国文论的宝贵经验 以提高学习者的文  学理论水平和鉴赏能力

law_content: This course mainly discusses the historical changes of literary theory from Ancient Greece to the late 20th century in the Western world. Based on the framework of chronological development, it introduces and explains important theorists and theoretical schools, allowing students to understand and master the basic knowledge of the evolution of Western literary theory, and continuously improve their theoretical literacy and analytical ability.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要讲述从古希腊到 世纪晚期欧美文学理论的历史变迁 并在梳理逻２０ 辑脉络的基础上 对重要的理论家和理论流派予以介绍 阐释 使同学了解和掌  握有关西方文学理论演变的基本知识 不断提高自身的理论素养和分析能力

law_content: This course aims to provide students with a basic understanding of the development of Western literature from ancient Greece to the 20th century through reading and lectures on Western literary classics. Students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the original works of Western literature. The course includes reading works such as Homer's epics, Oedipus the King, Confessions, King Lear, Don Quixote, and various works by Balzac, Flaubert, and Madame Bovary.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在通过对西方文学经典的阅读和老师的讲授 使学生了解从古希腊到 世纪的西方文学的基本历程 对西方文学原著获得直观的认识 学生将２０  阅读包括 荷马史诗 俄狄浦斯王 忏悔录 李尔王 堂吉诃德 包法利《 》《 》《 》《 》《 》《夫人 等作品

law_content: This course provides systematic instruction on the knowledge of Chinese dialectology, helping students integrate the basic knowledge of various branches of Chinese linguistics into the analysis and handling of dialect phenomena. It emphasizes the combination of theory and practice, and focuses on cultivating the ability to observe, capture, analyze, and handle dialect phenomena.
zh_law_content: 本课程通过系统讲授汉语方言学知识 帮助学生将汉语语言学各分支学科的基础知识融会贯通于方言现象的分析处理 强调理论与实践的结合 注重培养 观察 捕捉 分析 处理方言现象的能力

law_content: This course builds upon the foundation of Modern Chinese language taught in the first grade, focusing on the study of modern Chinese grammar. It covers important achievements in modern Chinese grammar research and requires students to practice in order to gain a concrete understanding of the current developments in this field. The main objective is to equip students with the ability to learn and master the methods of studying modern Chinese grammar, particularly the method of syntactic analysis, thereby enhancing their analytical and problem-solving skills.
zh_law_content: 本课程在一年级 现代汉语 课的基础上 分专题有重点地讲授现代汉语语法“ ” 研究的一些重要成果 并要求学生做一定的练习 以使学生能具体了解当前在 现代汉语语法研究方面的一些成果 更重要的是使学生能从中学到并掌握研究现代汉语语法的方法 特别是句法分析方法 提高学生分析问题 解决问题  的能力

law_content: This course uses Mandarin Chinese phonetic system as an example to teach the basic knowledge of general phonetics. The main topics include the fundamental knowledge of modern phonetics, analysis of Mandarin Chinese phonemes, tones, and intonation system, as well as the basic characteristics of Mandarin Chinese prosody. It also covers the analysis of the Chinese phonetic alphabet and the Beijing dialect phonetic system.
zh_law_content: 本课程以普通话的语音系统为例 讲授普通语音学的基础知识 主要包括 现代语音学的基础知识 普通话声 韵 调系统的分析 普通话韵律（１） ；（２）   ；（３）特征简析 汉语拼音方案 与北京音系

law_content: This course is based on modern Chinese and Chinese dialectology and teaches knowledge of experimental phonetics. The main content includes the voiced properties of speech, the acoustic phonetic foundation of speech production and perception, and the voiced forms and distinctive properties of vowels, consonants, syllables, stress and tone in speech. The course also covers experimental research methods of speech, the instruments for speech analysis and synthesis. Practical exercises on speech analysis are also included in this course.
zh_law_content: 本课程在现代汉语和汉语方言学等课程的基础上讲授实验语音学知识 主要内容包括 语音的有声性质 语音产生和感知的声学语音学基础 元音 辅音：  ；  音节 轻重音 声调等的有声形式和区别性质 语音的实验研究方法 语音分析  ； ；和合成的仪器 本课程还安排语音分析的实验操作教学

law_content: The goal of this course is to train students to extract theoretical knowledge from specific language materials and establish the basic concept of linguistics as a science. This will be done through systematically introducing the relationship between linguistic theories and materials, as well as the appropriate scientific procedural operations. Chinese linguistics problems will be used as the object of study, combined with teaching, discussions, exercises, etc., in order to stimulate students' interest in scientific research and encourage them to transition from a learning-oriented approach to a research-oriented approach.
zh_law_content: 本课程的目标是训练学生从具体的语言材料中提取理论的能力和树立语言学作为一门科学的基本观念 通过系统介绍语言学理论与材料的关系 以及相 应的科学操作程序 并以汉语中的语言学问题为操作对象 结合讲授 讨论 习   题等各种方式来激发学生进行科学研究的兴趣 并促使学生从学习型向研究型转变

law_content: The main topics covered in this course include the nature of Chinese characters, the process of their formation, the evolution of their physical structure, the classification of basic types of Chinese characters, the complex relationship between the form, sound, and meaning of Chinese characters, and an introduction to around 500 commonly used Chinese characters, their original form and meaning, as well as various usage scenarios. Additionally, a brief overview of the history of Chinese character research is also provided.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要讲授的内容有 汉字的性质 汉字的形成过程 汉字形体的演变 汉：   字基本类型的划分 汉字形音义之间的复杂关系 全课介绍五百个左右常用汉字的初文和本义 以及它们在使用中的种种情况 此外 也对汉字研究的历  史做简单的说明

law_content: This course is one of the basic courses for undergraduate students majoring in Classical Literature. The main topics covered in this course include the origin and development of textual criticism, the content of textual criticism, methods of textual criticism, how to read ancient annotations, and content related to textual criticism in the compilation of ancient texts. Through studying this course, students are expected to have a preliminary understanding of the basic theories and skills of reading, compiling, and researching ancient texts.
zh_law_content: 本课程是古典文献专业本科生的基础课程之一 本课程讲授的主要内容有 ：训诂的产生与发展 训诂的内容 训诂的方法 如何阅读古注 古籍整理中与训   诂有关的内容等 通过本课程的学习 力求使学生初步掌握阅读古籍并进而 整理和研究古籍的基本理论与技能

law_content: This course mainly teaches the basic concepts of phonology, introduces Guangyun, initials, finals, and tones, and compares them with modern Chinese. It briefly introduces knowledge about Old Chinese phonology and post-Guangyun rhyme books. Through this course, students will have a basic understanding of Chinese phonology and the Guangyun sound system, laying the foundation for further studying Chinese historical phonetics in the book Yuxue and independently solving phonological problems in ancient books.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要讲授音韵学的基本概念 介绍 广韵 声母 韵母及声调系统 并与 《 》  现代汉语进行对比 简单介绍上古音的有关知识和 广韵 以后的韵书 通过； 《 》 讲授 使学生对汉语音韵学和 广韵 音系有一个基本的了解 为进一步学习 《 》 汉语语音史和独立解决古书中的音韵问题打下基础

law_content: This course teaches the basic knowledge of ancient Chinese versions of Han books and the methods of identification and compilation. It also introduces the versions and contents.
zh_law_content: 本课程讲授中国古代汉籍版本的历史 基本知识及鉴别整理方法 并简介版本 目录

law_content: This course mainly teaches the basic content and knowledge of the catalog of ancient Chinese books, including the development and evolution of the meaning of the catalog, the classification and development of the catalog of ancient books, the compilation status of the catalog of ancient books, the types and characteristics of the catalog of ancient books, and the functions and roles of the catalog of ancient books, etc.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要讲授中国古籍目录的基础内容和知识 目录 含义的发展演变：“ ” 古籍目录的分类沿革 古籍目录的编制情况 古籍目录的种类和特点 古籍目  录的功能和作用等

law_content: This course covers the history, basic knowledge, theory, and methods of textual criticism in ancient Chinese Han books, including the relationship between textual criticism and compilation, as well as the supplementary and corrective aspects of textual criticism.
zh_law_content: 本课程讲授中国古代汉籍校勘的历史 基本知识 理论与方法 兼及校勘与辑  佚 补遗的关系

law_content: This course covers the development of ancient textual studies from the pre-Qin period to the Song, Liao, and Jin dynasties. It introduces the academic characteristics and achievements of important ancient textual scholars in each period and summarizes the experiences and methods in the development history of ancient textual studies. The goal is to help students understand the historical development of ancient textual studies and improve their abilities in reading, utilizing, organizing, and researching ancient texts.
zh_law_content: 本课程讲述从先秦到宋辽金时期的古文献学的发展状况 介绍各个时期重要的古文献学家的学术特点及成就 并总结古文献学发展历史中的经验和方法 使 学生了解古文献学发展的历史 提高学生阅读 利用 整理和研究古文献的能力

law_content: A course for non-mathematics and non-physics students to learn the basic theory and techniques of linear algebra.
zh_law_content: 非数学类 非物理类学生学习线性代数的基本理论和基本技术的一门课程

law_content: This course is a basic course on database technology, which provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamental concepts, principles, and methods of database systems. It also includes frequent updates on the latest advancements in database technology, laying a solid foundation for further studies in advanced database courses. With a focus on practicality, this course adheres to the principle of learning by doing and emphasizes the application and development skills of practical database systems. For each practical aspect in the practical section, numerous practical and innovative exercises are designed, supported by a rich set of case studies for students to reference and learn from.
zh_law_content: 本课程是关于数据库技术的基础课程 全面介绍数据库系统的基本概念 原理 和方法 并随时概述数据库技术的新进展 为进一步学习数据库其他高级课程 奠定基础本课程强调 学以致用 水中习水 的教学原则 鉴于数据库技术的实用“  ” 性 本课程在讲授基础理论知识的同时 着重培养学生掌握实用的数据库系统 的应用开发技能针对实践环节的每个知识点 本课程都设计了大量实用而新颖的实习题目 并配有丰富的案例供学生参照学习

law_content: Natural language is the language we use for everyday communication, such as English and Chinese. Unlike programming languages, natural language is more difficult to analyze and process. However, natural language processing (NLP) technology is widely applied in areas like intelligent question answering and machine translation. Introduction to Natural Language Processing is a required course for undergraduate students majoring in applied linguistics in Chinese departments, and it is also an elective course for undergraduate students in the School of Information Science and Technology. This course, jointly offered by the Department of Computer Science and the Chinese department at Peking University, emphasizes the fundamental principles, concepts, and common algorithms of natural language processing. It encourages students to think deeply and gain understanding of relevant issues through classroom learning, project practice, and communication. Building on the foundation of programming courses, this course aims to introduce students to the probabilistic and statistical foundations of natural language processing, the linguistic foundations of natural language processing, and the basic application knowledge of natural language processing. Additionally, it provides an introductory overview of hot topics such as machine translation and deep learning. In addition to theoretical introductions, this course also includes language analysis and programming practice tasks. Through a combination of theory and practice, we hope to cultivate students' innovative spirit and practical abilities in interdisciplinary fields and promote the comprehensive improvement of their knowledge, abilities, and qualities.
zh_law_content: 自然语言是我们平时每天交流所使用的语言 比如英语 汉语等等 不同于编  程语言 自然语言更难进行分析和处理 同时 基于自然语言处理的技术正在  得到广泛的应用 比如智能问答 机器翻译等等 自然语言处理导论 是一   《 》门面向中文系应用语言学专业本科生开设的必修课程 同时也是一门面向信息科学技术学院本科生的任选课程 本课程属文理交叉性质 由北大计算机 系和中文系联合开设 两方教师联合讲授 重视自然语言处理的基本思想 概  念和常见算法的讲解 鼓励学生深入思考 在课堂学习 项目实践和交流中获  得对相关问题的理解 在程序设计课程的基础上 本门课程旨在向同学们介 绍 自然语言处理的概率统计基础 自然语言处理的语言学基础以及自然语言： 处理的基础应用知识 同时 希望就一些热点课题 比如 机器翻译以及深度   学习等进行入门介绍 本门课程除了对理论的介绍 还安排了语言分析和编 程实践任务 通过理论结合实践的教学方式 我们希望可以培养学生的在交 叉学科领域的创新精神和实践能力 促进学生的知识 能力 素质的综合提高

law_name: 语言工程与中文信息处理
law_content: This course is aimed at senior undergraduates majoring in linguistics. The course has two main objectives. First, students should have a basic understanding of algorithms and techniques in natural language processing and preliminary skills in writing Chinese information processing applications. Second, students should be able to use computers to assist in language resource construction, accumulate knowledge in language research and machine learning, and gain practical experience in language engineering. This course balances the learning of basic knowledge in natural language processing and project practice in language engineering. The content mainly includes file processing, Chinese character encoding, string processing (such as character frequency statistics, dictionary management system), corpus construction and application, Chinese word segmentation, Chinese part-of-speech tagging, Chinese syntactic and semantic analysis, machine translation, etc. The course format includes classroom lectures, programming exercises, language engineering project practice, literature reports, and project presentations.
zh_law_content: 本课程面向语言学专业高年级本科生 课程有两个主要目标 一是学生应了 ：解自然语言处理中的基本算法和技术 初步掌握编写中文信息处理应用程序的技能 二是学生能够利用计算机辅助进行语言资源建设 积累面向语言研究； 和机器学习的语言知识工程实践经验 本课程兼顾自然语言处理的基础知识学习和语言工程项目实践 内容主要包括 文件处理 汉字编码 字符串处理 ：   字频统计 词典管理系统 语料库构建与应用 中文分词 中文词性标注 中文    句法语义分析 机器翻译等课程形式包括课堂讲授 编程练习 语言工程项目实践 文献报告与项目展示  等

law_content: This course is the first part of the undergraduate course in Chinese Ancient History offered by the History Department. It mainly focuses on the period between Pre-Qin Dynasty and the Wei, Jin, and Southern and Northern Dynasties. The content is divided into four major parts: Pre-Qin period, Qin and Han period, Wei and Jin, and Southern and Northern Dynasties. There is also a special topic on institutional history.

law_content: This course is one of the compulsory courses in the history major for undergraduate students. It is intended to continue teaching modern Chinese history after " " contemporary history of China, and will be divided into two segments: the history of the Republic of China and the history of the People's Republic of China after 1949. The course will be taught using a comprehensive approach, focusing on the political history of modern China, while also including aspects such as economy, military, diplomacy, society, and culture and ideology. The main assessment will be based on the students' understanding of the basic knowledge of modern Chinese history, as well as their thinking abilities and academic insights.

law_content: The main focus of the research is on the study of the classics and representative literature in the History Department, Sub-department, and Collection Department, supplemented by the study of classical Chinese language versions and catalogs. The study of historical literature is a key aspect, covering different genres such as narrative biography, annals, chronological records, case studies, geography, and institutional systems. It serves as a foundation for acquiring basic knowledge.

This course will focus on four key aspects of Chinese Ancient History research, namely, chronology, officials, geography, and dynasties. Through teacher lectures and student practice, students' basic abilities in researching Chinese Ancient History will be cultivated.

law_content: The course "Modern Chinese History" is a compulsory course for undergraduate students majoring in History. It is taught in small-sized classes and focuses on in-depth discussions on the period from the start of the Opium War in 1840 to the May Fourth Movement in 1919 in Chinese history.

law_content: This course is an introductory course to the study of world ancient and medieval history. It familiarizes students with the geography, chronology, personalities, notable institutions, and other related aspects through close reading of historical materials. Students are expected to write concise and imaginative historical notes.
zh_law_content: 本课程是世界古代中世纪研究的入门性课程 通过精读相关的历史资料 使得 选修者熟悉其中的地理 年代 人物 名物制度等 并写出简短而富有新意的历   史札记

law_content: This course is an advanced practice of world modern history. It is not a basic knowledge learning course nor a research course to discuss and solve new problems. Instead, it is a preparatory course that aims to enhance students' original and innovative thinking skills for independent research and writing of annual papers. This course covers important historical topics such as the rise of modern Europe, the English Revolution, the Enlightenment, American independence, the French Revolution, the Industrial Revolution, World War I, the October Revolution, fascism, the Cold War, and European integration. We adopt a lively and interactive practice-oriented teaching approach, with teacher guidance and student practice as the main focus. This course aims to closely align with the requirements of scientific research and train students' ability to grasp others' research results, accurately raise questions, and analyze primary materials. The emphasis of this course is on teaching historical research methods and it welcomes students from all professional fields, including modern European and American history.

law_content:
The basic content includes World History conceptual explanation, origin, evolution, and the significance of studying World History. In-terms of: 1. The construction process of the discipline of World History in different countries, the main traditions of Western World History, and the modern Western macro world history. 2.
