law_content: Italy has had a comprehensive and lasting influence on world culture since the European Renaissance, profoundly shaping the social form and way of thinking of modern people. A good way to explore this influence is by examining the role of Italy in literature, history, and cultural history since the Renaissance, within the dual context of the Western and Chinese worlds. Through detailed case studies, we will investigate Italy's contributions to the world in literature, art, philosophy, and broader cultural fields. On one hand, we will trace the dissemination and transformation of important cultural products such as texts, music, theater, and film that were exported from Italy to the West and China. On the other hand, we will examine the different constructions of Italy's image and concept by people outside Italy, in order to consider why people from different times and places always seek to find their own identity and path in the mirror of Italy. Furthermore, we will explore Italy's relationship with modernity and what guidance and teachings it can offer to present-day China. From a student's perspective, this course can be summarized as an "imaginary journey." The cultural products and characters involved in this journey to Italy all have real or metaphorical meanings, and students will explore the world and themselves alongside them in this course.

The goal is for students to achieve basic accuracy in pronunciation and intonation, be able to understand slow conversations with Hindi speakers, and engage in general conversations about daily life.

law_content: The cultural industry is the sunrise industry of the 21st century and a growth point for China's economic development. Developing the cultural industry requires cultivating talented individuals who are familiar with its basic concepts and proficient in the operational laws of various sectors within the industry. These individuals need to have a comprehensive understanding of culture and be skilled in management. Through theoretical teaching and analysis of practical cases, students can comprehend the basic theories of the cultural industry, understand its fundamental content, and help them recognize the cultural industry through the integration of theory and practice, enabling them to acquire the necessary theoretical knowledge and practical working abilities in engaging in the cultural industry.

law_content: This course is a compulsory course for second-year undergraduate students majoring in cultural industry management. The main task of this course is to make students understand the basic laws, theories, and skills of cultural intercultural communication activities. Through systematic classroom teaching, practical experience, and experimental exploration, students will be able to independently understand and master the basic laws, theories, and skills of cultural intercultural communication activities. This course requires students to read designated reference materials and complete book reports, actively participate in classroom discussions and presentations, complete practical experience and experimental exploration activities, and submit reports. Through this course, students will be able to independently understand and master the basic laws, theories, and skills of cultural intercultural communication activities.

law_content: General History of Chinese Art: From the Origins of Chinese Art to the Ming and Qing Dynasties. This course will be taught in a relatively comprehensive and thorough manner, following the chronological development of Chinese art throughout history. Utilizing a large amount of high-quality visual materials, including images, the course will cover various art forms, artistic schools, representative figures, and important works, among other key points of knowledge. Additionally, the course will incorporate the latest research findings from the past thirty years in the field of Chinese art history, such as new perspectives and materials, to ensure that students have a basic understanding of the frontiers and dynamics of academic research. The aim of the course is to enable students to grasp the overall development of Chinese art history through systematic learning. Furthermore, the course will focus on expanding students' aesthetic abilities, enhancing artistic cultivation, and improving their understanding of humanities.

law_content: This course is a compulsory course for undergraduate students in the Academy of Fine Arts. The main content is to read in depth the important primary documents in the history of Western art studies. In the history of Western art development, a large number of scholars and documents from the German-speaking area have provided important resources for the development of the international art history discipline today. This is also the focus of this course's research. Reading these documents is of great significance to the revival of classical art theory, the rediscovery of art works, the establishment of the history of art discipline, and the understanding of German national culture. This significance is particularly prominent in two aspects. Firstly, the classical art theory of this period is an important foundation for the international art history and art theory disciplines today. Secondly, the classical art theory of this period deeply influenced the early acceptance and understanding of Western art traditions in the Chinese academic community.

law_content: This course first selects articles that have had a significant impact on the development of Chinese painting in China and have theoretical value. Secondly, articles that demonstrate important concepts in Chinese painting are chosen, taking into account their occurrence, development, and changes. Furthermore, the selected articles aim to cover different periods of Chinese painting development, striving to present a relatively complete theoretical framework of Chinese painting. This course is structured as follows: firstly, the background of the articles, including the authors, publication time, and main contents, will be discussed. Secondly, the core viewpoints presented in the articles will be analyzed, explained, and relevant research achievements in the academic community will be introduced and absorbed.

law_name: 艺术史论专业论文写作
law_content: Designed specifically for undergraduate students majoring in Art History, this course emphasizes the integration of theory and practice. The contents are divided into four parts. The first part focuses on the interpretation of images, the second part involves the analysis of exhibitions, the third part provides training in writing professional book reviews, and the fourth part focuses on the development of skills in writing academic papers.
zh_law_content: 专为艺术史论专业的本科学生而设 强调理论与实践的结合 内容分四个部 分 一是对图像的阐释 二是对展览的评论 三是专业书评的写作训练 四是专：   业论文的写作训练

law_content: Human beings preserve their memories in two ways: through words and images. Art museums preserve the visual memory of humanity. The images displayed in art museums, organized by time period or style, reflect the history of human visual experiences and visual changes. This visual history can also validate other historical activities of humanity. In fact, throughout the entire history of humanity, especially in the early stages, images have been our main intellectual means to understand the world, express thoughts and emotions, and record past events. Written history only records half of human history, while images record the other half that cannot be recorded by words. If we were to burn down all the collections in an art museum, a large portion of human memory would be lost. Therefore, art museums are a treasure trove of visual evidence for history. Modern museums have evolved from art museums, making art museums the primary form of museums. This course will discuss the characteristics, organization, systems, and functions of art museums, as well as the history and main literature of art museums. It will also discuss the relationship between art museums and other types of museums.
zh_law_content: 人类以两种方式保存自己的记忆 文字与图像 艺术博物馆保存着人类的图： 像记忆 在艺术博物馆里 依照年代或风格展示的图像作品反映了人类视觉经 验与视觉变化的历史 而这部视觉历史也可验证人类其他的历史活动 事实 上 在人类的整个历史时期 特别是早期人类的历史 图像一直是我们理解世  界 表达思想与感情 记录过去事件的主要智性手段 以文字撰写的历史只记  录了人类历史的一半 而图像记录了文字无法记录的另一半 假如我们烧毁 艺术博物馆中的全部藏品 大半人类记忆势必湮没无存 因此 艺术博物馆是  图像证史的史料宝藏 现代博物馆正是脱胎于艺术博物馆 艺术博物馆是博 物馆的主要形式 本课程将讲授艺术博物馆的特性 组织 制度与功能 介绍   ；艺术博物馆的历史与主要文献 论述艺术博物馆与其他类型博物馆的关系 论

law_content: Visual culture research is an emerging academic hotspot in the field of humanities in recent years. The so-called visual culture research is the study of visual activities and their objects, examining the viewing behaviors, visual experiences, and visual images of individuals in specific societies. Due to the richness of visual objects and the complexity of visual behaviors, visual culture research necessarily has prominent interdisciplinary characteristics, involving multiple disciplines and research fields such as cultural studies, critical theory, art history, film studies, image science, psychoanalysis, anthropology, literature, communication studies, and the history of science and technology. In terms of the scope of objects, visual culture involves a wide range of visual image fields such as fine arts, photography, images, film, advertising, and television. It also includes a more comprehensive viewing system, such as the behavior of appreciation, window shopping, roaming, landscapes, and different experiences of the eyes. This course introduces the basic content and main methods of visual culture research, including the disciplinary context of visual culture research, major theoretical approaches, image analysis, visual criticism, and the history of visual culture.
zh_law_content: 视觉文化研究是人文学科领域近年来新兴的学术热点 所谓视觉文化研究是对视觉性的活动及其对象的研究 考察特定社会中人的观看行为 看的活动  视觉体验和视觉形象等 由于视觉对象的丰富性和视觉行为的复杂性 视觉 文化研究必然具有突出的跨学科性 涉及文化研究 批评理论 艺术史 电影   学 图像学 心理分析 人类学 文学 传播学 科技史等诸多学科和研究领域      视觉文化从对象范围来讲 涉及美术 摄影 图像 电影 广告 电视等众多视觉     形象领域 同时更包含更为广泛的整体的观看系统 如观赏行为 逛街 游荡    风景 眼睛的不同的体验等内容本课程介绍视觉文化研究的基本内容和主要方法 包括视觉文化研究的学科脉络 主要理论方法 图像分析 视觉批评 视觉文化史等内容

law_content: This is a course on playwriting and screenwriting. The main objective of this course is to enhance students' understanding of the theories and skills related to drama and film writing, improve their ability to interpret cinematic narrative and enhance their aesthetic literacy. Moreover, this course aims to equip students with fundamental skills and methods for playwriting and screenwriting. It will guide students in acquiring basic scriptwriting skills, understanding classic dramatic structures, mastering models for interpreting scripts, adopting writing techniques for different genres, and recognizing cinematic narrative techniques.
zh_law_content: 这是一门编剧课程 内容包括戏剧和电影 本课程的基本目的在于提升学生对于戏剧 影视编剧的理论和技能等方面的认识 提升对电影叙事的解读能力和审美素养 并掌握戏剧影视编剧的 基本技能和方法 指导学生掌握基本的编剧技能 了解经典的戏剧结构 掌握 ； ；解读剧本的模型 掌握类型的写作方法 认识电影叙事的手法

law_content: This course, "Research on Music in Film Creation by Master Filmmakers" (2009-2012) and "The Accumulation and Development of Professional Courses in Film Music and Sound" (2017), focuses on the concept, nature, history, functions, creation, aesthetics, and evaluation of film music. Emphasizing the forefront of knowledge and the pioneering nature of methods, the course values cultivating students' problem awareness and critical thinking abilities and highlights the integration of theory and practice. The course covers a wide range of works, with a particular focus on milestone masterpieces in the development of film music. If film is considered the director's visual conveyance of art, music is like a pair of indispensable wings. It is worth noting that the course adopts a systematic analysis method for film music, which is a unique and important feature compared to previous courses.
zh_law_content: 经由 大师电影创作中的音乐研究 公选课 影视音乐与声《 》（２００９—２０１２ ）《音 专业课 的积累与发展而成 课程围绕电影音乐的概念 属性 历》（２０１７ ）   史 功能 创作 美学 评价七大支点展开 强调知识的前沿性与方法的开创性     重视培养学生的问题意识与思辨能力 突出理论与实践相结合 本课程涉及 作品广泛 尤为侧重电影音乐发展历程中的里程碑杰作 如果说电影是导演的 艺术 视觉传达犹如叙事之主体 音乐则犹如双翼 不可或缺 特别值得注意   的是 电影音乐之系统分析法 关于电影音乐的类型问题 系课程以往不同之  富于原创之重要特色

law_content: This course is based on the basic principles and laws of performing arts and guides students to gain a deep understanding of the creative principles and performance skills of performing arts. It aims to cultivate students' artistic sensitivity and self-expression, and expand their artistic connotation.
zh_law_content: 本课程基于表演艺术的基本原理和规律 引导学生深入了解表演艺术的创作原理和表演技巧 培养学生的艺术感受力与自身表现力 扩充其艺术内涵

law_name: 影视制作（电影剪辑基础）
law_content: This is a highly integrated course of theory and practice, based on American academy editing theory, analyzing the editing theory, rules, and techniques of Hollywood commercial films. The course focuses on hands-on practice using the most widely used film and television editing software in the world industry. It teaches the production process, material management, editing, synthesis, and color correction of film and television dramas using Avid MC. Additionally, there will be lessons featuring observation of films, as well as on-site post-production of mainstream domestic films using the Quanta IQ 3D production platform.
zh_law_content: 这是一门理论与实践高度结合的课程 以美国学院派剪辑理论为基础 分析好 莱坞商业电影的剪辑理论 规则和技巧 上机实践以当前世界电影工业界使用 ；最广的电影 电视剧编辑合成软件 为学习对象 讲授电影 电视剧的 Ａｖｉｄ ＭＣ  制作流程 素材管理 编辑 合成 校色 另外有 节课观摩 电影     ２ Ｑｕａｎｔｅｌ ＩＱ ３Ｄ制作平台上国内主流电影的后期制作现场

law_content: The study and research scope of this course focuses on narrative artistry in films, while also considering television and online platform storytelling works such as TV dramas and web movies. The course conducts a comprehensive study of the theoretical and practical aspects of directing in narrative audiovisual arts. It combines teaching philosophies from specialized art schools and comprehensive university art academies, referencing teaching methods from film schools in the United States, France, and other countries, forming a teaching mechanism that integrates theory and practice. Through this course, students will acquire a complete theoretical system of film directing and strong creative practical abilities. Students should possess basic knowledge of film and television arts and have some understanding of the basic processes involved in film and television production.
zh_law_content: 本课程的学习研究范畴以电影中心 兼顾电视及网络平台叙事艺术作品 如电 （视剧 网络电影 课程对叙事型视听艺术的导演工作进行理论与实践的整体 ）性研究本课程结合了专门艺术院校与综合大学艺术学院的教学理念 参考了美国 法国等多所电影学院的教学方法 形成了一种理论和实践互通的教学机 制 通过本课程的学习 学生将掌握完整的电影导演理论体系和较强的创作实 践能力学生应具备影视艺术的基本知识 对影视制作的基本环节具有一定的了解

law_content: Chinese opera is an essential part of China's traditional culture and embodies the essence of traditional Chinese aesthetics. This course primarily focuses on the history, theory, and aesthetic of Chinese opera, aiming to interpret the unique cultural temperament and aesthetic connotation of Chinese opera.
zh_law_content: 中国戏曲是中国传统文化最重要的一部分 也体现着中国传统美学精神 本 课程以介绍中国戏曲的历史 理论与美学为主 力图阐释中国戏曲的独特的文 化气质与美学内涵

law_content: World Film History primarily focuses on the historical development of world cinema and addresses key issues related to the development of film art, including " ". This course emphasizes three aspects of film history: the evolution of the film industry and film technology, the development of film language and form, and the growth and interaction of national film movements. The course places particular emphasis on early film creation and the establishment of national film characteristics, as well as the modernization process of film and its influence on contemporary cinema. Using narrative film development as its main thread, the course introduces and evaluates important directors and their representative works, while also considering the development of experimental film and documentaries. The main focus is on American and European cinema, with some attention given to the development of national cinema in other regions.
zh_law_content: 世界电影史 主要讲授世界电影的历史发展 以及电影艺术发展过程中涉及《 》 的主要问题 本课程侧重电影史发展的三个方面 电影工业与电影技术的变 ：化 电影语言和电影形态的演进 各国电影运动的发展与互动 课程重点是早  期电影创作与民族电影特色的建立 以及电影现代化进程及其对当代电影的影响 本课程以叙事电影的发展为主线 介绍和评析重要导演及其代表作 兼  顾实验电影与纪录片的发展 以美国 欧洲为主 兼顾其他地区民族电影的发  展

law_content: The art and cultural activities in contemporary society have diverse connections with the economic domain. At the same time, the creation and circulation of art and culture often need to be integrated into existing economic systems in order to survive and develop.
zh_law_content: 当代社会的艺术与文化行为 与经济范畴有着多样性的关联 同时艺术与文 化的创造与流通 亦经常须纳入既有的经济体系中方能获得生存及发展的机

law_content: This course introduces the legal principles related to art law, intellectual property, commercial contracts, value assessment, and combines theoretical and practical analysis with classic cases in performing arts, visual arts, and audiovisual arts. The course aims to cultivate the legal thinking and application abilities in the field of arts for students in art departments. Students are required to understand the basic legal issues in art law and gain a comprehensive understanding of relevant legal regulations.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍艺术法相关的法律原理 知识产权 商业合同 价值评估等理论与  实务 并结合表演艺术 视觉艺术和影音艺术等领域的经典案例展开分析 本  课程旨在培养艺术院系同学的法律思维以及在艺术领域中的法律应用能力要求同学们了解艺术法的基本法律问题 通过对相关部门法的概括学习 了解

law_content: This course requires students to have taken courses on Introduction to Cultural Industries and Special Topics in Cultural Industries or related training. After completing this course, students should have a grasp of the essential characteristics, theoretical background, advantages, and limitations of creative management. They should also have preliminary skills in analyzing the development strategies, business models, and organizational management of cultural industries. This course is an interdisciplinary applied research course that combines cultural industries with management science. Its main aim is to train students in the basic concepts, methods, and tools of creative management, and to analyze individual cases with outstanding examples from domestic and international cultural industries. The basic content of the course includes the nature and background of creative management, the theoretical concepts and models of creative management, and the application of creative management principles in practical cases.
zh_law_content: 本课程要求学生曾接受过文化产业导论和文化产业专题研究课程或相关课程训练 学习完本课程后学生应该掌握有关创意管理的本质特征 理论背景 适  用的优势与局限 初步具有分析文化产业的发展战略 商业模式与组织管理的 基本能力本课程是文化产业与管理科学相结合的一门跨学科的应用专题研究课程 主要训练学生掌握创意管理的基本概念 方法和工具 并结合国内外文化  产业优秀案例进行个案分析 课程基本内容包括如下 创意管理的本质与背 ：景 创意管理的理论 概念与模型 创意管理原理在实践案例中的运用

law_content: This course introduces the development history and frontier trends in the intersection of information technology and cultural industries. It teaches relevant case studies of the integration of information technology and cultural industries both domestically and internationally, as well as the underlying technological principles. It also includes practical applications of artificial intelligence algorithms. The course combines theory and practice to cultivate students' interdisciplinary innovation thinking abilities.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍信息技术与文化产业交叉领域的发展历史与前沿趋势 讲授国内外信息技术融合文化产业相关案例及背后的技术原理 实践人工智能算法应用 将理论与实践相结合 培养学生的学科交叉创新思维能力

law_content: This course is a compulsory course for third-year undergraduate students majoring in Cultural Industry Management. The main purpose of this course is to cultivate the ability of students to understand and grasp the changing laws of cultural art markets and policies in the context of globalization. The main task of this course is to examine the changing development laws of cultural art markets and cultural policies in China and Western countries under the background of globalization. Through systematic classroom teaching, students can independently understand and comprehend the history, current situation, and development trends of cultural art markets and policies in the context of globalization. This course requires students to complete the reading of designated reference materials and submit book reports, actively participate in classroom discussions and presentations, complete practical investigations and submit investigation reports, and compare and analyze the characteristics of cultural art markets and the uniqueness of cultural policies in China and several representative countries in the West. Through this course, students can independently understand and grasp the history, current situation, and development trends of cultural art markets and cultural policies in China and Western countries.
zh_law_content: 本课程是为文化产业管理本科专业三年级学生开设的专业必修课程本课程的主要目的是 培养学生理解和把握在当今全球化语境下文化艺：术市场与政策的变化规律的能力本课程的主要任务是 在全球化背景下 考察中国和欧美国家的文化艺术： 市场与文化政策的变化发展规律 通过系统的课堂教学 使学生能够自主地了 解和理解文化艺术市场与政策的历史 现状与发展趋势 培养学生理解和把握 在当今全球化语境下文化艺术市场与政策的变化规律的能力本课程要求学生完成课堂学习之外 阅读指定的参考文献并完成读书报告 积极参与课堂讨论和陈述 完成实践考察并提交考察报告 完成中国和欧  美几个代表性国家的文化艺术市场特点的比较分析和文化政策特殊性的比较分析 通过该课程教学 使学生能够自主地理解和掌握中国和欧美国家的文 化艺术市场与文化政策的历史 现状与发展趋势

law_content: This course revolves around the history of world cinema and is divided into fourteen topics. The specific course content may vary each year, and there are primarily three forms of teaching. The teaching content will be adjusted according to the yearly plan, focusing on teaching through documentary films. The main format involves watching, analyzing, and explaining the documentaries involved.
zh_law_content: 本课围绕世界电影史 分为十四个专题 每年专题内容会有变化 主要有以下  三种授课形式 具体的授课内容会根据当年的计划进行调整 围绕电影史纪录片展开教学 主要形式是观看 分析和讲解纪录片所涉及

law_content:
The course of Theory and Practice of Calligraphy and Painting is a curriculum that enhances aesthetic education in universities. The course consists of two parts: the theoretical part mainly analyzes and explains the relationship between Chinese philosophical aesthetics and Chinese calligraphy and painting, including Chinese philosophical aesthetic thoughts, concepts of calligraphy and painting creation, artistic creation techniques, and related issues of artistic expression forms. It also lectures on the theories of calligraphy and painting in different dynasties in China and representative artists and their works. Through analysis and explanation of these works, it clarifies the intrinsic connotation, aesthetic categories, aesthetic characteristics, and artistic creation of Chinese calligraphy and painting, allowing students to have a comprehensive understanding of the forms and aesthetic spirit of Chinese calligraphy and painting.
The practical part mainly focuses on painting and calligraphy training, enhancing students' artistic practice and experience, cultivating their artistic aesthetic perception and artistic creation abilities, and improving their aesthetic and artistic literacy.
zh_law_content: 书画理论与实践 是强化大学美育教育的课程 课程由两个部分组成“ ”  ：一 理论部分 主要分析讲解中国哲学美学与中国书画艺术相互关系问题 即  中国哲学美学思想 中国书画创作理念 艺术创作技法及表现形式之间的相关 联问题 讲授中国历代书画艺术理论和代表性艺术家及其代表性作品 通过对 ；作品的讲解分析 阐明中国书画艺术的本体内涵 审美范畴 审美特性 以及艺   术创作等问题 使学生全面了解和认识中国书画艺术的表现形式与中国书画艺术美学精神二 实践部分 主要开展绘画与书法训练 加强学生艺术实践体验环节 培养艺   术审美与艺术创作能力 提高学生审美与艺术素养

law_content: This course mainly invites experts in the field of art history from the School of Art to give themed lectures, focusing on specific topics and conducting targeted teaching. The main goal is to cultivate the ability of senior undergraduate students to independently engage in image research. Students will be guided on how to select topics, argue their points, and analyze cases and evidence, fostering their understanding of the subject.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要通过专题讲座的形式 邀请艺术学院从事中 外美术史研究的专家 按方向 分专题 有针对性地授课 重点培养高年级本科生独立从事图像研究  的能力 引导学生学会如何选题 论证 以及如何对案例和例证展开分析 理解

law_content: This course will provide a systematic explanation of the basic visual language system in film and television. It will introduce professional training methods and enable students to develop a certain understanding of the principles of audiovisual language in film. By the end of the course, students will have a basic ability to design shot composition and will have a comprehensive understanding of the visual language in film. They will be able to identify commonly used techniques and approaches in commercial film production and will have the basic skills to convey information and emotions using audiovisual language.
zh_law_content: 本课程将对影视基本造型语言系统进行系统化讲解 介绍专业化训练的途径 让学生对电影视听语言的原理具备一定的理解能力 初步具备镜头画面设计能力 系统了解完整的电影视觉造型语言 基本识别商业电影制作中常用的绝； 大部分创作手段和一般技巧 基本具备使用视听语言去传递信息和情感的能；力

law_content: This course takes the development history of Chinese films as its main thread, focusing on the visual pursuits, spiritual explorations, and cultural significance of Chinese filmmakers such as Zheng Zhengqiu, Shi Dongshan, Cai Chusheng, and Xie Jin. It will discuss in depth the films' interpretations of works such as 'Laborer's Love,' 'Sisters of the Gutter,' 'Fishermen's Song,' 'The River Flows Eastward,' 'Yellow Earth,' 'Red Sorghum,' 'Farewell My Concubine,' and 'Little Go Warrior.' The course aims to provide a comprehensive and in-depth exploration of the specific situation of Chinese film development and the lessons learned from it.
zh_law_content: 本课程以中国电影 年的发展历程为线索 以郑正秋 史东山 蔡楚生 谢１００    晋 张艺谋 贾樟柯等 代中国电影人的影像追求 精神探索和文化含义为主  ６ 要讲述内容 结合 劳工之爱情 姊妹花 渔光曲 一江东水向东流 黄土 《 》《 》《 》《 》《地 红高粱 霸王别姬 小武 等影片的文本读解 相对全面 深入地探讨》《 》《 》《 》  中国电影发展的具体状况及其经验教训

law_content: This course aims to reconstruct the history of China's foreign relations, breaking through Orientalism and Eurocentrism in the narrative framework, highlighting the subjectivity of Chinese history. The period from 1840 to 1949 is the most tragic century in Chinese history. China's modern and contemporary foreign relations developed against the backdrop of two contexts. On the one hand, in the mid-19th century, the development of the outside world had created a political culture completely different from traditional East Asian international relations, and the aggression policies of the Western powers made conflict the basic characteristic of Sino-foreign relations. On the other hand, while intense conflicts occurred in Sino-foreign relations, the Chinese people who felt disgraced and humiliated were also undergoing dramatic changes in their perception of the outside world and their own traditions. Since then, China has been involved in an ongoing major transformation. Politically, the theories passed down by the ancients regarding governing the country and achieving global peace, the theories of power, and even various political terminologies have been faced with unprecedented challenges. Culturally, this transformation has overturned the Confucian logic of achieving personal self-cultivation and social harmony by observing objects and acquiring knowledge, and has had to start from addressing the current situation, moving towards political and cultural revolutions, and finally towards a revolution of the human himself/herself. In terms of the Republic's foreign relations, it can be seen as a continuation of late Qing foreign diplomacy to some extent, because the fundamental issues of China's modern diplomacy - national independence and territorial integrity - had not been completely resolved. This historical mission was only accomplished when the People's Republic of China was established. To grasp the diplomacy of the past hundred years, it is not only necessary to clarify the causes and effects of typical events in Sino-foreign negotiations, but also to
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在重构中国对外关系史 突破 东方主义 和 欧洲中心论 的叙事范 “ ” “ ”式 凸显中国历史的主体性 年是中国历史上最具悲剧性的一个世纪 发生在此时期的１８４０—１９４９ 中国近现代对外关系是在以下两个背景中展开 一方面 世纪中期 中国外： １９ 部世界的发展已经营造了一个完全不同于东亚传统国际关系的政治文化 中外所处时代和地域的差异 列强的侵略政策 使中外关系以冲突为基本特征成 为必然 另一方面 在中外关系发生剧烈冲突的同时 蒙羞受辱的中国人看待  外部世界和反观自身传统的基本格调也在发生剧烈的嬗变 中国自此卷入了一场迄今仍在进行的大变局 从政治上来讲 古人留下的有关治国平天下的 理论 有关权术的理论甚至各种政治词汇都受到了前所未有的挑战 从文化上而言 这场变局颠倒了儒家所谓自格物致知而修齐治平的逻辑 不得不从应 ：付时局开始 走向政治革命 走向文化革命 最终走向人本身的革命 民国外   交一定意义上而言是晚清外交的继续 因为中国近代外交的基本问题 主 ———权独立与领土完整 并没有得到彻底解决 这一历史使命直到新中国成立——— 才完成要把握百年外交 不仅要求理清中外交涉典型事件的来龙去脉 而且要尝 试对历史进行反思 这一段中外关系史 不仅在中国的历史发展上具有重要 意义 而且在世界文明发展史上 由于具有如此深厚久远文化传统的中国能在 短短一个多世纪里基本实现了和世界异质文明的接轨 因而其意义也是富于启发性的 在这场惊人的巨变中 我们看到了中国人顽强的调适能力 看到了  中国文化内在的巨大潜力 百年外交留下了多少屈辱的历史 又留下了多少 可歌可泣的英雄故事 而穿着儒袍的中国第一代外交家们所开展的弱国外交 其详情则鲜为人们所知 百年外交 跌宕多劫 本课程不仅要求学生掌握外  交史 更希望能培养学生的爱国精神 倘若对学生学术思维乃至人生观念的熏 陶有所裨益的话 那将是不小的收获

law_content: Diplomacy is a branch discipline of international studies that focuses on the diplomatic behavior of sovereign states in their dealings with one another. This course primarily introduces the theory, norms, institutions, and art of diplomacy, exploring how these aspects have evolved over time. The main topics and issues covered in this course include the nature of diplomacy and its research objects, the origins and evolution of diplomacy, the purposes and roles of diplomacy, major diplomatic ideologies, basic rules and norms of diplomatic behavior, the relationship between diplomacy and national interests, diplomatic mechanisms and foreign policy decision-making, the forms and contents of diplomacy, as well as the impact and challenges of new issues in international relations on diplomatic behavior, norms, and ideologies in contemporary diplomatic developments.
zh_law_content: 外交学 是国际研究的一门分支学科 以主权国家对外行使主权的外交行为“ ” 为主要研究对象 这门课程主要介绍外交学理论 规范 制度以及外交实践的  艺术等与外交实践有关的内容 并探讨这些内容是如何变迁的 本课程教授 的主要内容和问题包括 外交的本质与外交学研究的对象 外交的起源和演： 变 外交的目的及作用 主要的外交思想 外交的基本准则和行为规范 外交与   国家利益的关系 外交机制与对外政策决策 外交的形式与内容 以及当代外  交发展的趋势和国际关系中新问题对外交行为 规范 思想的影响和挑战等

law_content: This course mainly focuses on the basic logic and process of traditional and empirical research in social sciences, as well as some fundamental research methods. By introducing the basic logic and methods of social science research, it aims to help students evaluate existing research and conduct their own research.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要讲授社会科学传统研究与实证研究的基本逻辑和过程 以及一些基本的研究方法 通过引介社会科学研究的基本逻辑和方法 帮助学生评估 现有的研究以及开展自己的研究

law_content: This course aims to understand political changes in various countries by utilizing methods such as literature review, thematic discussion, case studies, and comparative analysis. The main topics explored include the origins and paths of political modernization, various types of democracy, and the patterns of cultural changes and their political significance.
zh_law_content: 本课程通过文献评述 专题讨论 个案研究 比较分析等方法理解世界各国的  政治变迁 主要探讨的问题有 政治现代化的起源与发展道路 民主制的诸类 ： 型 文化变迁的模式及其政治含义等

law_content: This course is a compulsory course for traditional majors in the School of International Relations. Extensive reading and accurate understanding of foreign books and materials are essential skills for studying and researching international issues. Reading is the best way to think. Through immersive and in-depth reading, one can immerse oneself in the world of the original author, understand differences in perspectives and positions, and gain diverse insights into academia and thoughts. This course selects four interdisciplinary English originals for intensive reading and discussion. The four themes of the reading materials involve Chinese studies, American history and society, state and development (1) (2) (3), and globalization and neoliberalism. These are all inevitable important topics and research fields in political science, including international relations. Through reading and analysis of these original texts, students can become more objective observers on issues such as China's development and globalization.
zh_law_content: 本课程是国关学院传统专业必修课 广泛阅读并准确理解外文书籍和资料是学习和研究国际问题的必备技能 阅读是最好的思考 身临其境的深度阅读 可以最大限度地进入原著作者的世界 理解视角和立场的差异 见识学术和思 想的五彩斑斓 本课程选取四本跨学科的英文原著进行精读和讨论 阅读材 料的四个主题分别涉及 中国研究 美国历史与社会 国家与发展（１） （２） （３） 以及 全球化与新自由主义 这些都是政治学 包括国际关系学科 学习中（４）  （ ）不可回避的重要议题和研究领域 通过对这些原著文本的阅读和分析 学生 们可以成为在中国发展和全球化等议题上更冷静的观察者

law_content: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the main topics in international political economy, including the five major theories of international political economy, the political science of international trade, the political science of foreign direct investment, the political science of international finance, the political economy of development and transition, and the political economy of regionalism.
zh_law_content: 本课程系统介绍国际政治经济学的主要内容 包括国际政治经济学五大理论 国际贸易的政治学 跨国投资的政治学 国际金融的政治学 发展和转型的政  治经济学 地区主义的政治经济学

law_content: This course will introduce and explore the political mechanisms, policy processes, and interactions among relevant actors in the field of international public affairs. By taking this course, students should be able to develop a preliminary ability to understand and analyze major global public policy issues based on a combination of theory and empirical evidence. At the same time, this course will provide further directions and opportunities for students who aspire to research and practice in the field of international public policy.
zh_law_content: 本课程将介绍并探讨国际公共事务领域的政治机制 政策过程及相关行为体之间的互动模式 学生通过本课程 应初步具备在理论与实证结合基础上理 解与分析全球公共政策主要问题的能力 与此同时 本课程将为有志于国际 公共政策领域研究与实践的学生提供进一步深入思考和钻研的方向与空间

law_content: This course is designed for undergraduate students, especially for international undergraduate students. It provides a comprehensive introduction to contemporary Chinese politics and the process of public decision-making. The course focuses on the political structure of China and the relationship between the state and society. Students will gain a preliminary understanding of contemporary Chinese government, politics, and society, as well as the background and approaches to handling various decision-making and social issues in contemporary China, such as social movements, environmental protection, family planning, economic reform, and political development in different fields. Through this course, students will have a comprehensive understanding of Chinese politics and society.
zh_law_content: 本课程是针对本科生 尤其是本科留学生特点开设 本课程将全面介绍当代 中国政治以及公共决策过程 本课程强调中国政治结构 国家与社会的关系  学生将初步了解当代中国政府 政治与社会 并理解当代中国政治与社会各种 决策以及社会问题的背景以及处理方法 例如社会运动 环境保护 计划生  育 经济改革 政治发展等不同领域 通过本课程的学习 学生能全面了解中国政治与社会

law_content: This course teaches students to apply quantitative analysis methods to study social science problems and to master various quantitative research methods such as decision analysis, group decision making, systems analysis, graph and network analysis, etc. Students will also apply these methods to specific problems and cases in the field of social science to develop a comprehensive knowledge system and practical application skills.
zh_law_content: 本课程教授学生运用定量分析方法研究社会科学问题 学习掌握决策分析与群体决策 系统分析 图与网络分析等多种定量研究方法 并基于社会科学领  域的具体问题及案例展开实际应用 培养学生文理复合的知识体系 以及应

law_name: 国际组织与全球治理前沿名家讲座
law_content: How do international organizations work? How do they influence the international landscape? How do they solve global governance issues? This course, through inviting renowned speakers, explores how international organizations address security, development, energy, environment, public health, and other fields from both theoretical and practical perspectives. Through studying this course, students will understand: 1) the specific operations of similar international organizations and deeply analyze the role of international organizations in global governance; 2) how to write research proposals for solving important global issues.
zh_law_content: 国际组织如何运作 如何影响国际格局 如何解决全球治理问题 本课程通？ ？ ？过邀请名家讲座 从理论与实践的角度探讨国际组织如何解决安全 发展 能  源 环境 公共卫生等领域的问题 通过本门课程的学习 学生将 了解不    （１）同类型的国际组织如何具体运作 理解并深入分析国际组织在国际关系（２） 全球治理中的作用 学会撰写解决当下重要全球性问题的研究计划

law_name: 谈判模拟与国际文书写作
law_content: Diplomatic negotiation refers to the negotiation activities carried out by a country or its authorized representatives as the main body to achieve the foreign policy objectives of the country. It is also known as international negotiation in the international arena. This course aims to introduce the theoretical analysis methods and practical strategies of diplomatic negotiation. The main contents include the theoretical framework for negotiation analysis, the actors and stakeholders in contemporary diplomatic negotiations, specific factors influencing the negotiation process and outcomes, as well as how negotiators can prepare negotiation strategies and utilize negotiation skills in a targeted manner. The distinctive feature of this course lies in integrating negotiation theory, practice, and application. Learning the theory and strategies of diplomatic negotiation in this course is not only useful for participating in negotiations between countries, but also helpful for daily negotiations and interpersonal communication.
zh_law_content: 外交谈判是指以国家为主体或由国家授权的合法代表为实现国家的对外政策目标而从事的谈判行为 国际上也称为国际谈判 本课旨在介绍外交谈判的 理论分析方法与实践策略 主要内容包括谈判分析的理论框架 当代外交谈判 的行为体和利益相关者 影响谈判进程与结果的特定因素 以及谈判者如何有 针对性地准备谈判策略和运用谈判技巧 本课程的特色在于把谈判理论 实 践和应用融为一体 学生学习外交谈判的理论与策略并非只对参加国家间的谈判有用 而且对日常生活中的谈判和人际交流也有帮助

law_content: In the era of globalization, cultural identity and cultural differences are issues that have attracted wide attention in international communication. Understanding and understanding different cultures is also a basic prerequisite for effective international communication. This course starts with the connotation of culture, the basic characteristics of culture, the main types of world culture, and the main theories and methods of cultural comparison, to introduce the basic characteristics of Chinese culture and foreign cultures, and the individuality and commonalities between them. The aim is to give students a basic experience of cultural issues, lay a foundation for enhancing their understanding of the theories and practices that arise under different cultures, and improve their ability to engage in international communication and communication.
zh_law_content: 在全球化的时代 文化认同与文化差异是一个在国际交往中引起广泛关注的问题 对不同文化的认识和理解 也是有效的国际交往的基本前提 本课程  从文化的内涵 文化的基本特征 世界主要的文化类型 以及文化比较的主要  理论和方法入手 介绍中国文化与外国文化的基本特质 它们之间的个性与共 性 目的是让学生们对文化问题有一个基本的体验 为提升他们理解不同文化 之下产生的理论与实践的能力 以及国际交流与沟通的能力打下一定的基础

law_content: This course systematically describes the occurrence and development of the world socialist movement from three levels: ideologica trends, movements, and institutions. It focuses on the emergence and development of Marxism, as well as the occurrence and development of the international communist movement under the banner of Marxism. The course analyzes the reasons for the zigzag development of the world socialist movement and concludes with its important experiences and lessons.
zh_law_content: 本课程从思潮 运动和制度三个层次系统地描述了世界社会主义运动的发生和发展 其中重点论述了马克思主义的产生和发展 以及以马克思主义为旗帜 的国际共产主义运动的发生和发展 分析了世界社会主义运动曲折发展的原因 总结了其重要的经验和教训

law_content: Traditional China is a vast and populous community with a long history and a republican system. The political system of traditional China is extremely rich, mature, and advanced. This course covers a wide range of topics, including the introduction, the emperor system, the prime minister system, and the civil officer system. It also includes the feudal system, the prefecture and county system, the election system, the imperial examination system, the local gentry system, reforms, and restructuring, among others.
zh_law_content: 传统中国是一个广土众民 历史长久 民族共和的共同体 传统中国的政治制  度极其丰富 也极其成熟 发达  本课程涵盖的范围 上起周秦 下迄明清 主要包括导论 皇帝制度 宰相    制度与文官体制 封建制与郡县制 选举制与科举制 乡绅制度 变法与改制等   专题

law_content: This course aims to introduce the major schools of Western international relations theory, so that students can grasp the core concepts, understand the differences in underlying assumptions, main points, and policy implications among different theories, comprehend the explanatory power and limitations of different theories, and consciously utilize theoretical analysis to analyze and explain international issues based on this foundation.
zh_law_content: 本课旨在介绍西方国际关系理论的主要流派 使学生能够掌握相关核心概念 理解不同理论之间在前提假设 主要观点和政策推论方面的差异 了解不同理 论的解释力和局限性 并在此基础上自觉利用理论分析和解释国际问题

law_content: Criminal Procedure Law is a legal discipline that primarily focuses on the legislation, practical operation, and theoretical analysis of criminal proceedings. It is one of the fourteen core courses offered by law schools and is also a key subject in the national judicial examination.
zh_law_content: 刑事诉讼法学是一门以刑事诉讼立法 刑事诉讼实务和刑事诉讼理论为主要研究对象的一门法律学科 它是法学院开设的十四门基干课之一 也是国家司 法考试的重点科目

law_content: This course will focus on discussing several important areas of private international law, such as the basic theories, principles, norms, and institutions of law application. It will also examine relevant theories and practices both domestically and internationally, with a particular emphasis on studying legal conflicts and law application in areas such as foreign-related civil and commercial subjects, foreign-related property rights, foreign-related intellectual property rights, foreign-related creditors' rights, foreign-related marriage and family, and foreign-related succession rights. Given that China has become a multiple legal jurisdiction country, including mainland China, Hong Kong, and Macau, this course will also separately address issues of interregional legal conflicts. In order to ensure the substantive rights and interests of parties involved in foreign-related civil and commercial matters are fully and effectively protected, this course will also conduct in-depth and meticulous analyses of international civil litigation and international commercial arbitration.
zh_law_content: 本课程将集中讨论国际私法的若干重要领域 诸如法律适用的基本理论 基本 原则 基本规范和基本制度 同时从国内外的有关理论与实践入手 着重研究  涉外民商事主体 涉外物权 涉外知识产权 涉外债权 涉外婚姻家庭 涉外继    承权等领域的法律冲突与法律适用 鉴于我国现已成为一个多法域国家 内 （地 香港及澳门 本课程还将单独阐述区际法律冲突问题 为使涉外民商事 ） 当事人的实体权益能够得到充分 切实的保障 本课程亦将对国际民事诉讼 和国际商事仲裁做深入细致的分析

law_content: Economic law is a newly developed legal field that has evolved most rapidly since the 20th century, arising from the development of capitalism and industry to a new stage. It originally built upon institutional economics and macroeconomics but has since been influenced by social jurisprudence, legal economics, and various economic theories. In practice, it has manifested as public policy and related legal system changes represented by the privatization and marketization of public functions in English-speaking countries. This course focuses on introducing the core theories of governing economic law and will also analyze and discuss legal issues and practices relevant to China. Specific content includes the origin and development of economic law, theoretical framework, public-private relations, substantive justice and social theory, regulatory theory, property theory, and contract law.
zh_law_content: 经济法是自 世纪以来发展最为迅速的新型的法律部门 是资本主义和产业２０ 发展达到新的阶段而产生的法律部门 它最早以制度经济学和宏观经济学为基础 进入 年代以来 受到了社会法学 法律经济学 以及诸多经济理论的 ８０   影响 并且在实践中表现为以英美国家的公共职能私有化 市场化为代表的公 共政策和相关法律制度变化 本课程侧重于介绍统治经济法的各个部门的核心理论 也将分析和探讨与中国相关的法律问题和实践 具体内容包括经济 法的源流 理论框架 公私关系 实质正义和社会理论 规制理论 财产理论 合

law_content: As one of the fourteen fundamental courses in law determined by the Ministry of Education, the main objective of this course is to introduce students to the basic concepts of commercial law and its methodological characteristics. It aims to provide a foundation for students to engage in theoretical or practical work in the field of commercial law after graduation. The course will focus on the comparative aspect of law, emphasizing the commonalities of commercial law and highlighting the characteristics of Chinese commercial law. When teaching the Chinese commercial law system, particular emphasis will be placed on training students' ability to search for and analyze legal provisions, as well as their ability to solve practical problems.
zh_law_content: 作为教育部确定的十四门法学基础课程之一 课程主要目的是向学生介绍商法的基本概念及商法在方法上的特点 年以后商法在中国发展及其与中１９４９国经济发展的关系 以及商法在其他国家的发展趋势 为他们毕业后从事商法 方面的理论或实务工作打下基础本课程将侧重比较法方面的讲授 在介绍商法及其具体制度的共性的同时 突出中国商法的特点 在讲授中国的商法制度时 将着重训练学生查找并  分析法条的能力 以及解决实际问题的能力

law_content: This course is one of the 14 core courses in the law major of higher education institutions determined by the Higher Education Institution Law Discipline Teaching Guidance Committee of the Ministry of Education. The course comprehensively and systematically elaborates on the basic theories and knowledge of administrative law and administrative litigation law. The scope of research mainly includes the general principles and principles of administrative law, the responsibilities and powers of administrative subjects, the means of management, and the rights and obligations of administrative counterparts. The general theory of administrative behavior and the nature, characteristics, constitutive elements, legal requirements, and operational procedures of various types of administrative behavior. The general theory of administrative remedies, the nature and functions of administrative reconsideration and administrative litigation, the scope of acceptance, jurisdiction, procedures, and standards of administrative reconsideration and administrative litigation. The general theory of administrative compensation, including the constitutive elements of compensation liability, the principle of attribution, the scope, methods, and criteria of compensation, and procedures, etc. This course mainly focuses on the practice of administrative law in China and the theory of administrative law, and at the same time absorbs and learns from the achievements of foreign administrative law research. This course strives to form and establish a theoretical system of administrative law with Chinese characteristics based on inheriting, criticizing, and discarding various academic schools of foreign administrative law, such as the control theory, management theory, administrative power-oriented theory, and the rights-oriented theory of counterparts.

law_content: International public law mainly refers to the sum of legal norms between international legal subjects, including both legal norms during peacetime and during armed conflicts or wars, between belligerent nations and between belligerent nations and neutral nations. Its characteristics are mainly manifested in the following aspects: Firstly, the main subjects of international law are sovereign states, and intergovernmental organizations can become international legal subjects under certain conditions and within a certain scope. Secondly, the main sources of international legal norms are international treaties, international customs, and general legal principles. Thirdly, the enforcement of international law mainly relies on the individual or collective actions of sovereign states, and intergovernmental organizations can also take collective enforcement measures under specific circumstances. Fourthly, the overall development of international law is constrained by factors such as international politics and international economics. Therefore, a good foundation in domestic law and basic knowledge and training in international politics and international economics are required before studying this course.

law_content:
Conceptually, international economic law refers to the sum of legal norms that regulate international economic activities and international economic relations. It encompasses the legal norms and institutional framework that regulate the legal relationships formed in the transnational trade and circulation of goods, technology, capital, and services in international economic exchanges. International economic law is an interdisciplinary field that involves various legal norms such as international law, domestic law, public law, private law, international commercial law, and foreign economic law. Its interdisciplinary and comprehensive nature reflects the complexity of international economic legal relationships and the need to effectively regulate such complex relationships. It regulates economic interactions that transcend national borders, not only between countries, governments, and international organizations, but also among individuals and legal entities from different countries, as well as their economic relationships with foreign governments or international organizations.

The scope of international economic law is closely related to the legal norms and institutions governing international trade. It is a general term for the legal norms that regulate trade relations between countries and other related relationships. International trade law regulates international trade relations, which is an important component of international economic relations. It mainly includes four aspects of legal norms: (1) domestic laws that regulate international trade, such as contract law, maritime law, negotiable instrument law, and insurance law; (2) regulations of countries on international trade management, such as customs law and tariff law; (3) foreign exchange management laws; and (4) laws regulating imports and exports.

law_content: This course is proposed to be coordinated by the school, taught jointly by the Law School and the School of Marxism at Peking University, and the Xi Jinping Thought on Rule of Law Research Institute at Peking University. It will start with lectures on the principles of Marxist jurisprudence by the School of Marxism, with a total of two sessions and several hours of study. Afterwards, the Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era will be taught by the Xi Jinping Thought on Rule of Law Research Institute, with a total of two sessions and several hours of study. Finally, the Law School will teach the specific content of Xi Jinping's rule of law thought and organize exams for assessment, with a total of several sessions and several hours of study. law_content: Information measurement, early name of bibliometrics and informetrics, has always been a classic research topic in the fields of library science and information science. Information storage and retrieval is one of the required courses in the field of Information Management and Information Systems. The course content mainly includes the following knowledge units:

2. Improved or optimized models of information retrieval systems, including the types, basic structures, and development and design of information retrieval systems.

3. Information retrieval techniques and methods, including text retrieval techniques and non-text retrieval techniques.

4. Retrieval techniques and methods for audio and video information, as well as search techniques for commonly used web information retrieval systems, including the basic process, retrieval strategies, and features of different types of retrieval systems.

5. Evaluation of information retrieval, including the history of evaluation research, evaluation index systems, and case studies.

6. Text information processing automation techniques, including automatic indexing, text clustering and classification, text filtering, and text summarization.

7. Other related topics.

law_content: This course mainly teaches knowledge related to information systems analysis and design. The content includes analyzing business cases, such as modeling, data modeling, and process modeling, development strategies, and increasingly more knowledge on object modeling and project management. Students can also learn about system output and user interface design, data design, system architecture, structural design and implementation, as well as knowledge related to system operation, support, and security.

law_content: This course is an introductory course for Library Science majors, covering the basic principles, historical development, contributions of academic scholars, content framework, research methods, and future trends of Library Science. Through this course, students will establish a solid theoretical foundation, become familiar with the historical development and current situation of Library Science, acquire general research methods in Library Science, and improve their theoretical literacy and understanding. This course also lays a solid foundation of professional knowledge for students to further study other specialized courses in Library Science and prepares them for future careers in libraries or other information-related fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程是图书馆学专业的入门课程 讲授图书馆学的基本原理 发展历史 学  术大家的贡献 内容体系 研究方法 未来走向等 通过本课程的教学 为学生    打下坚实的理论基础 熟悉图书馆学发展历史与现状 掌握图书馆学的一般研 究方法 提高学生图书馆学理论素养和认识能力 为进一步学好其他图书馆学 专业课程打下良好基础 也为学生毕业后从事图书馆或其他信息工作奠定坚实的专业基础知识

law_name: 社科文献信息资源与检索利用
law_content: This course is a foundational and practical course aimed at undergraduate students, with the objective of enhancing their abilities in accessing, selecting, and utilizing academic literature and information resources. It mainly introduces the main types, origins, and evolution of literature and information resources in the field of humanities and social sciences in China, as well as the main tools, methods, approaches, and standards for obtaining and utilizing literature and information resources. It aims to help students improve their information literacy and enhance their ability to utilize literature and information resources.
zh_law_content: 本课程是面向本科生的基础性 工具性课程 以提高学生文献信息资源的获取 能力 选择能力 利用能力为目标 主要介绍产生在中国的人文社科领域的文  献信息资源的主要类型 源流演变 主要检索工具 文献信息资源获取和利用  的思路 方法 途径与规范 帮助学生提高文献信息素养 增强文献信息利用能力

law_content: This course focuses on the development and evolution of Chinese book history, conducting in-depth research on ancient Chinese book culture. It starts with the origin of writing and the emergence of publishing activities in Chinese history, organized in a chronological order according to different time periods and dynasties. Through the exploration and analysis of the historical background, compilation and printing institutions, organizational management, important achievements, etc., it presents a colorful panorama of Chinese book history spanning thousands of years. The course also introduces important publishing institutions, prominent publishers, contemporary significant publishing events, as well as groundbreaking publications in an orderly manner. To enhance interactivity, the course includes hands-on activities where students will learn about the production of ancient books and experience firsthand how a book is made and written. This aims to help students understand that knowledge not only accumulates civilization but also connects with national emotions. Currently, the focus of manual book production is on two forms: thread-bound and accordion-bound.
zh_law_content: 本课程以中国图书史的发展 演变为核心 对中国古代图书文化进行深入的考 察 从我国历史上文字产生 图书起源 出版活动萌芽开始 以时间和朝代为   序 通过对各历史时期的时代背景 编纂刻书机构 组织管理 重要成果等的阐   述和分析 展现出一幅绵延千年的中国图书史的多彩画卷 对历史上重要的出 版机构 贡献突出的出版家 当代重要出版事件 以及具有划时代意义的出版  物纵横有序地进行讲授同时为增强互动性 课程会有 学时的古书制作 结合所学 通过手作 让 ４   学生动手亲自感受一本书是如何被制作和书写出来的 让学生体验知识不仅是一种文明的累积 也是一种民族情感的连接 目前主要集中两种形态的手 写本制作 线装和经折装

law_name: 知识服务组织的管理与创新
law_content: This course mainly introduces the theory of organizational management and its development and evolution in the context of knowledge service organizations, with libraries and information institutions as representatives. The specific modules of the course include organizational strategy, organizational structure, organizational capability, and organizational innovation. The main theories are explored through in-depth reading of management classics and case analysis. In addition, this course uses case discussions to explore to what extent these theories originated from industrial organizations and management can be applied to knowledge service organizations represented by libraries and information institutions, thus forming new theories for strategic management and innovation in knowledge service organizations.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要介绍组织管理理论及其在以图书馆 情报所为代表的知识服务机构情景下的发展演绎 具体课程包括四大模块 组织战略 组织结构 组织能 ：  力及组织创新 主要理论通过管理学经典文献精读和案例分析来完成 除此 之外 本课程以案例研讨的方式与学生一起探究这些产生自工业组织和管理的理论 在多大程度上能够应用于以图书馆 情报所为代表的知识服务机构  从而形成针对知识服务机构的战略管理与创新的新理论

law_content: This course focuses on the construction of information resources in information service organizations. Starting from the analysis of the concepts and functions of information, information media, and information resources, it systematically discusses paper-based, non-paper-based, electronic, and network information media, as well as the types, characteristics, and roles of various information resources. It reveals the production, distribution process, and management of information media, and explores control mechanisms. Based on the actual situation of information service organizations in China, it comprehensively introduces the principles of information media collection planning. It deeply analyzes the methods of information media selection and collection, and provides a detailed introduction to the automation of information media collection.

law_content: As an introductory course on public cultural services, it mainly covers basic concepts and theories related to public cultural services. The main content includes the basic connotation of public culture and public cultural services, the main bodies, rights holders, and responsible parties of public cultural services, equalization of public cultural services, institutional guarantees for public cultural services, supply of public cultural services, including government provision and social provision, evaluation of public cultural services, international public cultural services, and the construction of China's public cultural service system, and informationization of public cultural services.

law_content: The reference consulting service holds a pivotal position among various services in the library. The reference consulting department is also an essential department in the library. Research on the content, patterns, and new methods of reference consulting services in the digital environment is an important issue in the field of library science.

law_content: A database is an organized repository that stores and manages data according to data structures. With the development of database technology and market demand, data management has evolved from simply storing and managing data to providing various ways of data management required by users. Database technology is the core component of information systems such as management information systems, office automation systems, and decision support systems. It is an important technical means for scientific research and decision management and has been widely applied in various fields. The main contents include: Chapter 1 Database Basics Overview; Chapter 2 Relational Model; Chapter 3 Structured Query Language; Chapter 4 Data Modeling; Chapter 5 Database Design; Chapter 6 Database Management; Chapter 7 Database Application Programs; Chapter 8 Big Data, Data Warehousing, and Business Intelligence Systems. Database Instances and Application Development.

law_content: Thesis, patents, reports, news, and online reviews are important sources and components of big data, playing an increasingly important role in data analysis and mining. However, these pieces of information are primarily in the form of unstructured text. Analyzing and mining these texts requires identifying the textual features, establishing language computing models, and utilizing machine learning, especially deep learning, for training to recognize these features and analyze, understand, and generate text. This course focuses on the analysis and mining techniques, algorithms, and platform tools for unstructured text information. It specifically includes three modules: natural language processing module, including lexical analysis, syntactic analysis, and semantic analysis, with a focus on language models, analysis processes, and algorithms; text computing models, including text representation, deep learning language models, and topic models; and text mining applications, including information extraction, text classification and clustering, and online reviews mining. This course is a required course for the Big Data Management and Application major, and is also available for students from other majors as an elective. It is mainly aimed at senior undergraduate students.

law_content: Information representation is the foundation of information management. Knowledge graph is a semantic and conceptualized form of information representation, used to support intelligent operations such as reasoning, question answering, and semantic correlation. This course divides information management into four historical stages: paper-based literature environment, digitized information environment, network information environment, and intelligent information environment. Traditional libraries, information retrieval systems, database systems, and search engines are regarded as information systems in the above information environments. This course analyzes the methods of information representation, organization, and operation in various information systems, and examines the internal information flow of information systems to bridge the gap between core courses in information management. It aims to consolidate and deepen the disciplinary foundation of information management. Based on this, students will learn the basic knowledge of ontology construction for knowledge graph, as well as the methods of constructing semantic and intelligent information systems using XML and RDF.

law_content: This is a foundational course offered to first-year undergraduate students in the Department of Sociology. This four-credit course is primarily delivered through classroom lectures, supplemented by discussions. The main topics covered in the course include an overview of social work, the historical development of social work, social welfare systems, values and philosophical foundations of social work, and social work theories and methods. The course aims to cultivate students' values, skills, theoretical analysis, and practical abilities in social issues and professional helping activities.

law_content: After the mid-19th century, social anthropology began to emerge in Europe, particularly in Britain, France, Germany, Russia, Japan, and other countries under different names such as anthropology, sociology, ethnology, and ethnography. In the early 20th century, functional anthropology, sociological yearbooks, and historical particularism emerged in the UK, France, and the US, leading to the development of modern ethnographic methods and anthropological theories. In the 1950s, with the emergence of structural anthropology in France, as well as the new evolutionary theories in the Soviet Union, the US, and China, the discipline entered an important stage. Since the 1970s, with the background provided by previous developments, social anthropology has entered a period of post-structuralism, political economy, and post-modernism. It seeks to interpret human existence from social and cultural perspectives. Its fundamental branches include classification, kinship, religion, political anthropology, and economic anthropology. In addition to these core areas, social anthropology also focuses on the study of ethnicity, material culture, urban areas, healthcare, and history. Since the end of the 20th century, China has begun to introduce social anthropology knowledge from Europe, and indirectly from Japan. From the 1920s, specialized research institutions have been established in national research institutions and comprehensive universities. Among them, the Central Research Academy and Yanjing University are particularly important. By the 1940s, the discipline in China had approached the level of advanced countries in anthropology, such as France. Although the name of the discipline was banned in the 1950s, research still continued, focusing on large-scale ethnographic investigations and historical surveys.

law_content: What is anthropology? What are the basic questions of anthropological research? What are the core concepts and theoretical paradigms in anthropology? What is this course about? This course introduces the development history of anthropological theories, different academic regions and their theoretical paradigms and representative figures, different theoretical orientations and themes. Through reading literature, classroom teaching, group presentations, and critical writing, it helps undergraduate students majoring in anthropology and other students interested in anthropology to clarify the research boundaries of anthropology, define the research objects of anthropology, and master the knowledge tradition of anthropology.
zh_law_content: 什么是人类学 人类学研究的基本问题 核心概念 理论范式是什么 此课程？   ？介绍人类学理论的发展历史 不同学术区域及其理论范式和代表人物 不同的 理论面向和主题 通过阅读文献 课堂授课 小组汇报以及批判性写作 帮助   人类学专业的本科生以及对人类学感兴趣的其他专业学生厘清人类学的研究边界 定义人类学的研究对象并掌握人类学的知识传统

law_content: This course is mainly designed for undergraduate students majoring in anthropology in the Department of Sociology. It aims to provide a comprehensive introduction to the development history of Western anthropology. The content includes the prehistory of Western anthropology, the emergence and establishment of anthropology as a professional discipline in the UK, France, Germany, and the United States at the end of the 19th and early 20th centuries, as well as the subsequent formation of different anthropological traditions and changes.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要为社会学系人类学专业本科学生开设 旨在对西方人类学的学科发展历史作基础性 综合性介绍 内容包括西方人类学的史前史 世纪末  １９ ２０世纪初人类学作为一门专业学科在英国 法国 德国和美国的萌芽和确立的过 程 以及此后形成的不同人类学传统和流变

law_content: The emergence of modern sociology in China can be traced back to the late Qing Dynasty, when Western knowledge started to spread to the East and the New Culture Movement began. This was also a time when China actively integrated itself into the process of modernization in politics, economy, society, and culture. The initial ideas put forward by Kang Youwei and Liang Qichao, such as "collective governance" and "standing together in solidarity," laid the foundation for the establishment of Chinese sociology. Later, thinkers like Yan Fu advocated for the importance of a comprehensive education system, which further developed the discipline. During the Republican era, Chinese sociology not only had a well-established disciplinary structure and various schools of thought, but also expanded its influence to other social sciences and even the humanities and history fields. It became the dominant force in theoretical and methodological discussions within the academic community. Scholars from various schools put forward diverse conceptual ideas and strategies, ranging from understanding the people's attitudes to examining institutions, from studying culture to analyzing politics. These diverse approaches and strategies have become an important tradition that contemporary sociologists must inherit. This course systematically organizes the ideological trajectory and academic traditions of Chinese sociological research since the late Qing Dynasty and the Republic, with a particular focus on the effort made by the Yanjing School to localize sociology in China.
zh_law_content: 中国现代社会学 发端于清末西学东渐和维新变法之时 也是中国开始在政 治 经济 社会和文化等诸领域主动融入现代化进程之时 初如康有为 梁启   超所持的 合群立会 的主张 后如严复 群学为纲 的思想 都为中国社会学“ ”  “ ” 的确立奠定了基础 民国时期 中国社会学的发育不仅学科配置健全 流派纷  呈 亦扩展至社会科学诸学科 乃至人文历史领域 成为学术界理论和方法上  的主导力量 各派学者提出了各种从民情到制度 从文化到政治的总体理念 和方略 这是今天社会学者从事研究必须继承的重要传统 本课程系统整理 清末民国以来的中国社会学研究的思想脉络和学术传统 特别是燕京学派的社会学中国化的努力

law_content: This course is a mandatory course for undergraduate first-year students. The course content is taught based on the basic elements required for argumentative research papers, including research preparation, problem formulation, literature evaluation, method selection, data organization, analysis framework, theoretical interpretation, and research plan.
zh_law_content: 本课程为一年级本科生必修课程 课程内容根据论证性论文要求的基本环节讲授 研究准备 构建问题 文献评估 方法选择 组织资料 分析框架 理论解： ； ； ； ； ； ；释 研究计划

law_content: The course focuses on the basic principles of traditional Chinese social thought, emphasizing reading and understanding of original texts. It provides an introduction to the indigenous cultural resources that have contributed to the development of Chinese sociology.
zh_law_content: 本门课系统介绍中国传统社会思想的基本内容 注重原典阅读和理解 介绍中 国社会学发展的本土文化资源

law_content: Understanding the essence of social casework and enabling students to grasp the general theories and development of casework (1) Introducing three basic theoretical models for implementing casework: psychoanalytic theory and psychoanalytic therapy (2): behaviorist theory and behavior therapy, and person-centered theory and person-centered therapy. Mastering the theoretical foundations and values of these three casework approaches and studying the psychological, social, and therapeutic aspects of social casework and their application in casework practice (3) Learning and discussing the values and conflicts in casework practice (4) Learning and discussing the core conditions of helping relationships (5) Recognizing that social casework is a planned and changing process (6) Recognizing, discerning, and discussing the different roles of social casework practitioners (7) Learning intervention techniques in casework and their application in the helping process (8) Enhancing awareness of self-application in the helping process and recognizing its importance.
zh_law_content: 认识社会个案工作的本质 使学生掌握个案工作的一般理论及其发展（１）  介绍三种个案工作实施的基本理论模式 精神分析理论和精神分析疗法（２） ： 行为主义理论和行为疗法 人本中心理论和人本中心疗法 掌握这三种个案工作的理论基础和价值取向学习社会个案工作的 心理 社会 疗法及在个案实务中的应用（３） “ ——— ” 学习和讨论个案工作实务中的价值及矛盾冲突（４） 学习和讨论助人关系的核心条件（５） 认识社会个案工作是一有计划变迁的过程（６） 认识 辨别和讨论社会个案工作者的不同角色（７）  学习个案工作的介入技巧及在助人过程中的运用（８） 提高在助人过程中对应用 自我 的意识 认识其重要性

law_content: Group social work is one of the three major practical methods in social work. This course mainly introduces the basic principles of group social work, the theoretical foundation of group work, types of groups, elements of group systems, group dynamics, the process of group social work, and the evaluation of group social work. The purpose of setting up this course is to enable students to systematically understand the significance, origin, and development of group social work, as well as the theoretical foundation of group social work practice, gain a deep understanding of the structure, process, and development of groups, and on the basis of mastering the principles and characteristics of different implementation stages, integrate the various methods and skills of group social work to organize the implementation of group social work. The course will illustrate the practical theory with relevant cases, focusing on the analysis of practical theory while emphasizing teaching the skills and methods of group work, to prepare students for engaging in group social work.
zh_law_content: 小组社会工作是社会工作三大实务方法中的一个重要方法 本课程主要介绍小组社会工作的基本原理 小组工作的理论基础 小组类型 小组系统的要素   小组动力 小组社会工作历程以及小组社会工作的评估 设置本课程的目的在于使学生系统了解小组社会工作的意义 起源和发展以及小组社会工作实务的理论基础 深入理解小组的结构 过程和发展 并在熟练掌握各个不同实  施阶段的原则和特点的基础上 综合运用小组社会工作的各种方法和技巧组织小组社会工作的实施 课程将在阐述实务理论的同时辅以相关案例 在重 视对实务理论分析的同时 注重教授小组工作的技巧和方法 为学生从事小组 社会工作做准备

law_content: This course teaches the basic theories, methods, and practices of community work. Chapters 1-4 introduce the basic principles of community and community work, including theoretical foundations, practical models, and methods. Chapters 5-9 discuss the practical development of urban and rural communities in China and address relevant issues. The course aims to integrate theory and practice, drawing on the experiences of community development abroad while reflecting on the unique characteristics of community development in China. It aims to cultivate students' solid theoretical foundation, practical skills, and reflective abilities.
zh_law_content: 本课程讲授社区工作的基本理论 方法与实务 第一至四章介绍社区及社区工作的基本原理 理论基础 实务模式与方法 第五至九章介绍我国城市与农  ；村社区发展的实践并对相关问题予以讨论 课程力求理论与实践相结合 在 借鉴国外社区发展经验的基础上 对我国社区发展的本土特色予以反思 培养 学生良好的理论功底及实务与反思能力

law_content: Social administration is the core component of social work knowledge and skills. This course presents knowledge modules in a macro, meso, and micro level format. The content covers theoretical and methodological knowledge in different dimensions such as social service systems, social organization management, and social service project design. This course has a strong practical orientation, requiring students to analyze and respond to specific issues in current social services in order to enhance their practical abilities in social administration.

law_content: This course takes domestic and international social policies as empirical materials to guide students in understanding the theories and methods of social policy analysis.
zh_law_content: 本课程以国内外社会政策作为实证资料 指导学生了解社会政策分析的理论和方法

law_content: This course is primarily delivered through lectures supplemented by classroom discussions. The lecture format involves inviting representative and pioneering scholars in the field of anthropology from both within and outside the university to deliver lectures. By studying this course, undergraduate students will be able to understand the basic characteristics of the discipline of anthropology, including some fundamental areas, topics, concepts, and methods. They will also gain knowledge about the differences and similarities between anthropology and other social sciences. Furthermore, they will acquire an understanding of the anthropological research perspectives and achievements on Chinese society and China's overseas perspectives. This course aims to provide a foundation for further systematic and in-depth study of anthropology.

law_content: This course will introduce the political aspects from an anthropological perspective. It will use ethnography to explore political life. The course aims to encourage students to go beyond the assumptions of Western political theories and understand political phenomena and the construction of order. It will explore traditional approaches in political anthropology, combining ethnography to introduce concepts such as power, ethnicity, nation, theatrical state, and ritual state. The course will also introduce new practices in contemporary political anthropology research, such as integrating film and media, as well as collaborative and interventionist research.

law_content:
The course "Ethnicity and Society" is a general education course offered by the Sociology Department of Peking University for undergraduate students. It is a foundational knowledge course with a focus on general education.

Most countries in the world today are multi-ethnic nations, and issues of race and ethnicity have always been a global problem since modern times. In recent years, wars, civil conflicts, and social conflicts in various countries have been closely related to ethnic issues to a greater or lesser extent. China has several ethnic minorities, with a total population surpassing 100 million. These ethnic autonomous regions account for a significant portion of the country's land area. In addition, there is support from foreign political forces and extreme religious forces.
