law_content: How was the contemporary international political and economic system formed and evolved? In the context of globalization, what is the relationship between government and markets? How much should the government intervene in economic affairs? How do economic factors affect the relations between countries and domestic politics? This course aims to provide an introduction to the basic relationship between politics and economics. Its main objective is to help students understand and reflect on the interaction between the forces of the political-economic system and the main actors at the international and domestic levels.
zh_law_content: 当代国际政治 经济体系是怎样形成和演化的 全球化背景下 政府与市场的 ？ 关系是什么 政府应该介入多少经济事务 经济因素是怎样影响国家间的关？ ？系和国内政治的 本课程在回答上述问题时致力于对政治与经济的基本关系？做一个介绍 其主要目的在于帮助学生了解和思考政治 经济体系 力量 与   主体行为者在国际和国内两个层面上和层面间的相互作用

law_content: Comparative Politics is one of the most important components of political science. This course is designed to guide undergraduate students to enter the field of Comparative Politics. Through this course, students should be able to understand the overview of Comparative Politics, including conceptual frameworks, research directions, major theories, and methods. Additionally, to a certain extent, students will be exposed to representative works by key scholars in the field.
zh_law_content: 比较政治学是政治学最重要的组成部分之一 本课程是引导学生 本科 进 （ ）入比较政治学领域的入门课程 通过本课程的学习 学生应能了解比较政治 学领域的概貌 包括概念体系 研究方向 主要的理论和方法等 同时在一定程   度上接触这一领域中主要学者的代表性著作

law_content: The study of Chinese political thought or political philosophy originated in the decade of the 20th century. Liang Qichao and Xie Gongquan are important figures in pre-Qin political thought, with Liang Qichao's "Historical Thoughts" and Xie Gongquan's "The History of Chinese Political Thought" being representative works. They established the academic tradition of studying Chinese political thought or political philosophy. Xie's "The History of Chinese Political Thought" serves as the textbook for introducing comparative political thought or political philosophy research methods. The main goal is to study and discuss the main content, context, and characteristics of Chinese political thought or political philosophy from pre-Qin to the end of the Qing Dynasty and the beginning of the Republic of China in order to achieve the purpose of clarifying the origin and carrying forward the tradition.
zh_law_content: 中国政治思想或政治哲学的研究 始于 世纪 年代 梁启超 先秦政治思 ２０ ２０  《想史 萧公权 中国政治思想史 为其代表性著作 本课继承》（１９２３） 《 》（１９４５） 梁启超 萧公权开创的中国政治思想或政治哲学研究的学术传统 以萧氏 中  《国政治思想史 为教材 尝试导入比较政治思想或政治哲学的研究方法 系统》  学习和研讨先秦至清末民初中国政治思想或政治哲学的主要内容 脉络和特征 以期达到正本清源 继往开来之目的

law_content: The content of this course includes the main political systems in China from pre-Qin to the Republican period, taught by topics. The ancient part includes the imperial system, central government organization, fiscal system, judicial system, military system, and local administrative system. The modern part includes the political systems of the Nanjing Provisional Government, Beiyang Government, and the Nationalist Government, as well as the central and local administrative systems, and military system.
zh_law_content: 本课内容包括中国先秦至民国时期的主要政治制度 按专题讲授 古代部分包 括 皇权制度 中央政府组织机构 财政制度 司法制度 军事制度 地方行政制：     度等 近代部分包括南京临时政府 北洋政府和国民政府的政治体制 中央与  地方行政制度 军事制度等

law_content: Political thought is a product of human contemplation on the dilemmas and issues faced in collective living. Western political thought explores the evolution of ideas from ancient Greece to ancient Rome, followed by the medieval and modern periods. It discusses the differing political concepts and theories formed in different political contexts and historical backgrounds throughout various time periods. This study primarily focuses on representative figures, works, viewpoints, and theoretical contributions in each era, aiming to present the development and historical panorama of Western political thought. Learning the history of Western political thought is an important avenue to understand the development of Western politics.
zh_law_content: 政治思想是人类针对集体生活的困境和问题而思考的产物 西方政治思想 “史 主要讲解从古希腊到古罗马再到中世纪而后现代时期 世纪 西方政治” （２０ ）思想的变迁 讨论不同时期在不同的政治生活形态和历史背景之下所形成的不同的政治观念和理论 重点介绍各个时期具有代表性的人物 著作 观点和  理论贡献 力求展现西方政治观念的发展脉络和政治文明的历史全景 学习 西方政治思想史 是了解西方政治发展的重要途径

law_content: The course focuses on the development of public management research and further explores the purpose and significance of comparative public management research, as well as the basic issues in the future development of administrative science. Through reading works by Japanese administrative scholars, inviting domestic and international experts and scholars for lectures, and engaging in classroom discussions, the course compares and analyzes the essence and connotation of public management research in Japan's administrative science and administrative activities. It helps students understand the public management issues in the stage of China's public policy transformation, the conditions for reform, and the core problems faced in future reform and development.
zh_law_content: 本课程在讲授公共管理研究发展过程的基础之上 深入探讨比较公共管理研究的目的 意义以及今后行政学科发展的基本课题 并通过阅读日本行政学家的专著 邀请国内外专家学者讲座以及课堂互动讨论的方式 比较分析日本 行政学和行政活动所具有的 公共管理 研究的实质内涵 帮助同学们了解当“ ” 下中国公共政策转型阶段的公共管理课题 变革的条件以及今后改革发展所面临的核心问题

law_content: The course covers the basic theory of human resource management, including basic theories of human resource development, job analysis and design, manpower planning and recruitment, personnel selection, personnel training and development, performance appraisal and management, compensation management, labor relations management, etc. It aims to enable students to master the overall structure framework and the development history of the discipline of human resource development and management, understand the basic concepts, principles and methods of human resource development and management, and grasp the commonly used techniques in contemporary public organizations and enterprises. It also aims to gradually develop students' abilities to observe, think, analyze, and solve theoretical and practical problems in related fields.
zh_law_content: 课程通过讲述人力资源管理的基本理论 人力资源开发的基本理论 职位分析 与职位设计 人力资源规划与招募 人员甄选 人员培训与开发技术 绩效考评   与绩效管理 薪酬管理 劳动关系管理等内容 使学生掌握人力资源开发与管  理的整体结构框架及学科的产生和发展脉络 掌握人力资源开发与管理的基本概念 基本原理 基本方法 掌握当代公共组织与企业常用的人力资源开发  与管理技术等 逐渐形成观察 思考 分析和解决相关理论和实践问题的能力

law_content: This course is one of the compulsory courses for students majoring in Public Administration and other related fields such as Political Science. It aims to study the general management principles in organizations and explore the fundamental theoretical knowledge about the generation, development, operation, and change of organizations. The main focus is to understand the main analytical tools for organizational management. The main contents include the concept of organization and its foundation, the development of organizational theory, and organizational goals and functions.

law_content: This course takes a comparative perspective and examines the local government systems of major countries around the world, including the UK, the US, Germany, France, Japan, and China. The focus is on the background, development process, ideology, constitutional foundation, structure, and functions of local government systems in each country. Additionally, attention is given to local government finance and local democracy.

law_content: The study of public economics has a rich tradition, originating from the political economic analysis of Adam Smith, John Stuart Mill, and David Ricardo. It gradually evolved into public economics after focusing on tax analysis, and has returned to its roots with the development of new political economics. As an important branch of economics, it provides the foundation for practical policy analysis. Although the research field and analysis methods of public economics have changed over time, the basic purpose of providing theoretical basis for practical decision-making remains the same. The content of this course aims to apply this theory to provide a coherent and logically consistent analytical framework for the study of economic policies. According to the most general definition, public economics is the study of economic efficiency, allocation, and government economic policies. This discipline covers a wide range of topics, such as addressing market failures caused by externalities and tax evasion.

law_content: In the era when governing the country according to law has become the fundamental way for the Party to lead the people in governing the country, students from the Government Administration College, as a reserve force for practicing and leading public administration, must be familiar with and " "master the knowledge of law-related disciplines in order to deeply understand the essence of governing the country according to law. However, it should also be noted that the Government Administration College focuses more on teaching public administration disciplines and cultivating students' cognition and skills related to public administration. If traditional law courses from law schools are adopted for teaching, it will deviate from the characteristics and teaching objectives of the Government Administration College's disciplines. Therefore, Introduction to Rule of Law Government, as a course, will be based on the characteristics and purpose of this discipline, following the teaching rules of this discipline, and achieving the integration of public administration and law disciplines. Specifically, this course has the following characteristics: First, diverse teaching methods ( ). It is a course that emphasizes both academic theory and practical application, and requires in-depth analysis and discussion of hot cases, forming diverse teaching methods. Specifically, besides the teacher lecturing on basic theories and fundamental issues, it also includes assigning the teacher or students to collect materials, literature, and data on various hot topics, forming a teaching method focused on hot issue aggregation. Students are encouraged to speak up in class and the teacher provides mid-term assessments to introduce teaching content. Second, it emphasizes the analysis of cases related to social hot issues ( ). The law itself often gives people a dull impression, and merely combining legal theories and legal provisions often results in mediocre teaching effects. This course selects appropriate hot cases

law_content:
The course is divided into three parts: 

1. The foundation of urban management. This section introduces the development context of urban management, reveals the new environment and emerging trends in contemporary urban development, and explains the main components and relationships within urban management.

2. Important aspects of urban management. This section includes topics such as urban development strategy management, economic development management, environmental management, spatial management, and social affairs management.

3. The pressing issues and topics worth exploring in contemporary Chinese urban management. This part covers topics such as urban residents, public housing, infrastructure, transportation management, city branding, and emergencies management.

law_content: The course introduces basic concepts such as cities, urbanization, and urban development, with a focus on the ideas and theories of urban planning. It also covers the nature, regulations, and administrative operations of urban planning, as well as urban planning support systems. Topics such as master planning, land use planning, transportation planning, and detailed planning are discussed comprehensively. The course aims to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of urban planning knowledge and methods. Practical field research is an important component of the course, allowing students to independently engage in planning exercises and gain practical experience in urban planning. The course is designed to equip students majoring in urban management with the necessary knowledge and practical skills in urban planning.

law_name: 地理信息系统基础与应用
law_content: The object of urban management is the physical entity of cities and urban spaces, which aim to solve problems in urban planning and management. It requires the mastery of management, utilization, and analysis methods for urban spatial information. Geographic Information Systems (GIS) integrate all relevant data about things based on geographic information, providing an analysis platform to extract meaning and insights from the data, enabling people to understand various situations occurring locally, regionally, or globally. It helps to clarify natural phenomena and social issues. With the help of geospatial technology, people can understand the complexity of the world and solve and communicate relevant social decision-making issues through visualized data language. This course is a compulsory course for undergraduate students majoring in urban management in the College of Government Management. In recent years, with the widespread application of spatial data analysis techniques based on geographic information and related big data in many social science fields including economics, management, political science, and sociology, teaching of geographic information systems and related analysis techniques has also been widely conducted in various social science disciplines. This course mainly introduces the basics of geographic information systems.

law_content: Cities and regions are complex systems that involve multiple departments, stakeholders, and temporal dimensions. The analysis of urban governance and spatial planning issues requires the integrated use of theories and analytical methods from various disciplines, such as political science, regional economics, urban and rural planning, geography, statistics, and computer science. Among these, quantitative analysis based on various types of data is an important approach to inform evidence-based policy-making in multiple domains, including spatial planning, population, industry, housing, transportation, and public facilities. This course aims to enable students to master the basic principles and methods of quantitative analysis for urban governance and spatial planning issues, emphasizing the integration of methodological principles and practical problems. It aims to cultivate students' ability to analyze real-world problems based on various types of data and proficiently apply relevant software. The course will introduce students to the basic quantitative analysis methods relevant to urban governance and spatial planning, covering three modules: basic knowledge, including course introduction, fundamentals of spatial analysis methods, and fundamentals of urban political analysis; practical applications, including urban spatial measurement, population change analysis, industry development analysis, housing supply and demand analysis, transportation governance analysis, public facility layout analysis, and regional development and governance analysis; and expansion and development, including principles and methods of policy simulation, big data and urban governance, visualization and information communication, and analysis strategy summary.

law_content: This course begins by introducing students to the applications and overview of statistics, guiding them to understand the basic concepts of statistics and the logic and methods of statistical inference. It then progressively delves into commonly used statistical analysis techniques. Building upon this foundation, students deepen their understanding of the basic theories and methods through practical exercises and case studies, laying a solid foundation for further mastery of statistical knowledge and skills and cultivating a mindset for empirical research. The course is divided into two major parts. The first part is the theoretical foundation, which includes an overview of the discipline of statistics, basic concepts of statistical inference, and the logic and methods of statistical inference. The second part is the applied practice, which includes descriptive statistics, contingency table analysis, analysis of variance and correlation analysis, general linear regression analysis and robust regression analysis, factor analysis, data quality assessment, design of quantitative research, and logistics writing for quantitative research reports.

law_content: Digital government is an interdisciplinary field of policy research. The rapid development of electronic information technology has not only profoundly changed the basic form of economic and social operations but also posed tasks and challenges to modern government governance. On the one hand, it is necessary to actively respond to the new opportunities and issues brought about by technology; on the other hand, it is necessary to use information technology to improve and enhance its own governance level. As students majoring in public management and public policy, it is necessary to understand and master the basic knowledge of the application of new technology in government governance, in order to cope with the challenges of future society. This course adopts a small-class teaching mode and various teaching forms such as knowledge-based lectures, flipped classrooms, and practical research. It includes two main modules. The first module focuses on four aspects of knowledge points. Firstly, it discusses the basic theories and best practices of the application of information technology in government governance at the tool level. Secondly, it discusses the governance of governments over information technology, especially cutting-edge information technology, at the object level. Thirdly, it discusses the transformation of governance models under the informationization background. Fourthly, it explores the application of information technology in government governance and social science research.

law_content: Data science is an interdisciplinary field that explores extracting knowledge from data. This course is designed for students majoring in information management and covers the fundamentals of big data management and application, with the aim of promoting the application of data science in other fields such as humanities and social sciences. The course will introduce the principles, techniques, and methods of data science in a progressive manner, following the data science process. It is tailored for students with no prior experience, assisting them in understanding the concepts and process of data science, emphasizing problem definition exploration, developing sensitivity in data preparation, grasping the concepts of data modeling techniques, and utilizing data visualization to present analytical results.

law_name: 社会科学问题研究的计算实践
law_content: The objective of this course is to familiarize students with a background in social sciences with computational thinking methods and develop problem-oriented computational problem-solving skills. The course will discuss several classic social science problems from the perspectives of models and mechanisms, and observe, reason, and evaluate their properties and characteristics using programming and other computational tools. The topics covered include but are not limited to centrality in social networks, the evolution of social networks, market matching mechanisms, principles of optimal auctions, discriminative network structure balance, cascade processes in networks, and simulation and validation of the rich-get-richer model and disease spreading models. Through these examples, students will not only see but also practice the role of computation in discussing and understanding these problems, thereby broadening their problem-solving horizons and building confidence in using computation to assist in social science research.

It encourages students to actively engage in programming, think critically, collaborate, and ultimately gain knowledge and skills from the course.
zh_law_content: 本课程介绍了人工智能的基础知识 并讲解人工智能在经济社会中的应用 重在培养同学们发现问题 提出问题 利用新技术分析解决问题的能力 鼓励  同学们动手编程 积极思考 协同合作 最终学有所获 学有所得

law_content: Currently, information system construction covers multiple departments of enterprises and institutions, such as office automation, enterprise resource planning (ERP), and other systems. Each system assists in improving management level and work efficiency. However, the inconsistent data definitions and unclear relationships between systems lead to data conflicts and lack of unified data standards. The task of data governance is to control data assets, including defining data standards, establishing data structures, creating data dictionaries, constructing encoding rules, and optimizing data quality. This course is divided into four modules: the concept of data governance, criteria for data governance, implementation of data governance, and practical case studies of data governance. It comprehensively introduces data governance and emphasizes the management of data quality, with a focus on discussing the overview, analysis, diagnosis, and application of data quality management in the context of big data. The course aims to assist students majoring in big data management and applications in understanding the concept and process of data governance, emphasizing the management of data quality and understanding the work tasks of enterprise digital transformation to achieve continuous use of data.
zh_law_content: 现今 信息系统建设已涵盖企事业机构多个部门 如办公自动化 企业资  （ＯＡ）源计划 等系统 各系统协助业务工作提高了管理水平和工作效率 然（ＥＲＰ）  而 各系统对数据的定义不一致 关联关系不清晰 导致数据冲突 数据规范不   统一等问题出现 数据治理的任务是对数据资产进行管控 主要工作包括定 义数据标准 建立数据结构 制作数据字典 构建编码规则 优化数据质量等    本课程分成数据治理的概念 数据治理的准则 数据治理的实施 数据治理的  实践案例四大模块 对数据治理进行了全面介绍 并将大数据治理规程化 重  点说明数据质量管理概述 剖析 诊断及应用 面向大数据管理与应用专业的  学生 协助学生理解数据治理的概念与流程 重视数据质量的管理 了解企业  数字化转型并达到数据持续使用的工作任务

law_content: Data visualization aims to effectively convey and communicate information using graphical techniques. This course covers the principles of different data visualization methods, emphasizing the importance of selecting the appropriate visualization method based on the data type. The course focuses on both theory and practice, including three modules: the fundamentals of data visualization, visualization of different data types, and interaction and evaluation of visualization. Python language will be primarily used to complete visualization tasks, and various Python tools and software will be introduced. This course is a required course for the Big Data Management and Application major and an elective course for other majors in the Information Management department. Students from other relevant majors are also welcome to take this course.
zh_law_content: 数据可视化旨在借助于图形化手段 清晰有效地传达与沟通信息 本课程讲 授不同数据可视化方法的原理 特别强调要根据不同数据类型来选择不同的可视化方法 本课程理论与实践并重 具体包括三个模块 数据可视化理  ：（１）论和实践基础 不同类型数据的可视化 可视化的交互与评测 在实；（２） ；（３） 践上 本课程主要使用 语言完成可视化任务 同时会介绍多种可视化 Ｐｙｔｈｏｎ 工具 软件 本课程是大数据管理与应用专业必修课 也是信息管理系其他（ ） 专业的限选课 同时也欢迎其他相关专业同学选修

law_content: Historical research is the foundation of all social sciences. This course focuses on modernization to elucidate the recent history of the world. It guides students to understand the origin and progression of global modernization, explore the different paths and characteristics of modernization in various countries, and enables them to observe the development and changes in the world from a global and comparative perspective. Furthermore, it aims to strengthen students' determination to engage in socialist modernization and cultivate their sense of historical responsibility to contribute to world peace, development, and human progress. Throughout this process, the course guides students to study the development laws of modern world history according to Marxist theories, understand the holistic historical perspective, and grasp the standpoint, viewpoint, and methods of Marxist historical theory. Additionally, the course integrates the study of modern world history with the development history of socialism to provide students with a global historical perspective for understanding the formation and development of socialism and Marxism. It helps students enhance their humanistic spirit and academic competence, laying a foundation for becoming innovative talents in the new era.
zh_law_content: 历史研究是一切社会科学的基础 本课程以现代化为主线来梳理世界近现代史 引导学生了解世界现代化的起源和演进 探讨各国现代化的不同道路及各 自特点 使学生能从全球范围的纵向与横向眼光中观察世界的发展变化 以及 不同国家走过的不同发展道路 坚定学生进行社会主义现代化建设的决心 并 培养他们为世界和平 发展与人类进步事业做出贡献的历史责任感 在此过程中 本课程引导学生学习马克思主义关于世界近现代史的发展规律 整体历 史观 现代化理论 加深对历史唯物主义的理解 领会马克思主义史学理论的  立场 观点和方法 本课程还将学习世界近现代史与学习社会主义发展史结合起来 为学生理解社会主义和马克思主义的形成发展提供世界历史视野 帮 助学生提升人文精神和学术能力 为成为新时代的创新型人才奠定基础

law_content: This course is a core basic course for undergraduate students at the School of Marxism of Peking University, focusing on the history of China from the pre and post-Opium War period to before the May Fourth Movement in 1919. The course follows a teaching approach that combines history and theory, with a chronological sequence as the basic thread. It aims to help students understand major events, figures, and ideological changes in modern Chinese history, and introduce the research status and important frontiers in related studies. Based on this, the course endeavors to enhance students' understanding of the basic laws of change in modern Chinese history, help them establish a materialistic historical perspective, and lay a foundation for improving their reading and analyzing abilities of literature sources and their academic research skills.
zh_law_content: 中国近现代史 上 为北京大学马克思主义学院本科生主干基础课 主要讲（ ） 授 年鸦片战争前后至 年五四运动之前的中国历史 本课程总体坚１８４０ １９１９ 持史论结合的基本授课思路 以历史时序为基本线索 努力围绕中国近代史上 的重大理论问题 帮助学生了解其间之重大事件 人物活动和思想流变 并对  ；相关研究状况和重要前沿学术动态有所介绍 在此基础上 本课程力图提升 学生对中国近代历史变迁基本规律的认知能力 帮助同学进一步树立唯物史观 并为增强学生文献资料阅读分析能力 学术研究能力做好基础性工作

law_content: This course uses the "Selected Works of Lenin" as the textbook to read and explain Lenin's fundamental works in Marxist philosophy, political economy, scientific socialism, and other fields.
zh_law_content: 本课程以 列宁选集 为教材 阅读讲解列宁在马克思主义哲学 政治经济学《 》   科学社会主义等领域的基本著作

law_content: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the history of capitalist development from the perspectives of intellectual history and economic history. It focuses on key figures, basic theories, and specific practices, aiming to help students gain a systematic understanding of the origins, evolution, central issues, and current developments of capitalism. The content of this course is divided into three modules. The first module consists of chapters one to four, which cover intellectual history and analyze the development of capitalism through the thoughts of Marx and Weber. The second module comprises chapters five to eight, which focus on economic history and provide specific introductions to important economic practices and figures in the development of capitalism. The third module includes chapters nine to sixteen, which delve into specific topics, emphasizing the core concerns and research progress on important issues related to different stages of capitalist development, both domestically and internationally.
zh_law_content: 本课程从思想史和经济史的角度讲述资本主义发展史 全面介绍资本主义的发展历程 重点人物 基本理论及具体实践 帮助学生系统理解资本主义的发  端 演变 核心议题与发展前沿 本课程内容分为三大模块 第一模块 一 二    （  三 四章 是思想史篇 从马克思和韦伯这两条脉络梳理资本主义发展的思想 ） 史 第二模块 五至八章 为经济史篇 具体介绍资本主义发展史中重要的经； （ ） 济实践和重要人物 第三模块 九至十六章 为专题篇 侧重资本主义各发展； （ ） 阶段所涉重要议题的国内外核心关注和研究进展

law_content: This course is a compulsory course for the undergraduate major of Ideological and Political Education. The purpose of the teaching is to provide students with a comprehensive and systematic understanding of the basic theories, professional theories, and management theories of ideological and political education, and to provide necessary professional theoretical foundations for students' future engagement in ideological and political education and related work. The main content of this course includes the essence, status, and functions of ideological and political education; the environment of ideological and political education; the formation and development process of human ideological and moral values and their laws; the process and laws of ideological and political education; the relationship between ideological and political educators and educational subjects; the content, principles, methods, art, and carriers of ideological and political education; management, etc. It also involves the research objects, basic categories, discipline system, and development process of ideological and political education, as well as the theoretical foundation and knowledge reference of ideological and political education. The basic task of this course is to clarify the laws of the formation and development of human ideological and political character, as well as the laws of ideological and political education for individuals. The basic requirements of this course are: 1) Mastering the basic concepts, principles, and theories of ideological and political education; 2) Mastering the basic methods and skills of ideological and political education.
zh_law_content: 本课程是思想政治教育专业本科专业的必修课 教学的目的是要学生对思想政治教育的基本理论 专业理论和管理理论有一个全面系统的了解 为学生以 后从事思想政治教育及相关工作提供必要的专业理论基础本课程的主要内容包括思想政治教育的本质 地位和功能 思想政治教育环 境 人的思想品德形成发展过程及其规律 思想政治教育过程及其规律 思想  政治教育者与教育对象及其关系 思想政治教育内容 原则 方法 艺术 载体     管理等 同时也涉及思想政治教育学的研究对象 基本范畴 学科体系及其发  展进程 以及思想政治教育学的理论基础和知识借鉴 本课程的基本任务是阐明人的思想政治品德形成和发展的规律 以及对人进行思想政治教育的规律本课程的基本要求：一 掌握思想政治教育学原理的基本概念 基本原理和基本理论（ ）  二 掌握思想政治教育的基本方法和技能

law_name: 中国共产党思想政治教育史
law_content: This course is a specialized study and discussion on the basic history of ideological and political education of the Communist Party of China (CPC). Guided by Marxism, the course takes the objective historical development of the CPC's leadership in China's revolution, construction, and reform as its starting point, and integrates the historical context of the CPC's ideological and political work and education. This course is a mandatory subject that emphasizes the theoretical principles, guidelines, and strategies of the CPC's ideological and political education.
zh_law_content: 本课程是对中国共产党进行思想政治教育的基本历史进行专题研究和讨论的课程 本课程以马克思主义为指导 坚持从中国共产党领导中国革命建设改 革的客观历史出发 将中国共产党开展思想政治工作和思想政治教育的历史融合讲授的必修课 本课程坚持把党的思想政治教育的理路 路线 方针 策

law_name: 马克思恩格斯经典著作导读
law_content: Studying classical works is the fundamental approach to theoretical learning. The main content of this course is to study and comprehend the essential ideas of the classic works written by Marx and Engels. Through reading the original works, we aim to grasp the basic principles of Marxism, its theoretical character, and its methods of thinking. By applying the Marxist perspective to observe and analyze problems, we strive to elevate our theoretical and ideological levels, and aspire to develop a new framework of understanding society. This course is a mandatory course for Marxist theory majors.
zh_law_content: 学习经典著作是理论学习的基本途径 本课程的主要内容是研读马克思 恩格 斯的经典著作 领会其中的精神要旨 通过阅读原著领会马克思主义的基本思 想 理论品格 思想方法 运用马克思主义观察和分析问题 提高理论和思想水   平 力争形成对社会新的认识框架 本课程是马克思主义理论专业的必修课

law_content: This course will provide an initial introduction to social survey research methods, offering guidance on social science research methods for undergraduate students in the field of Marxist theory. Given that the university already offers numerous courses specifically devoted to quantitative research methods, this course will focus more on the teaching of qualitative social research methods. Specifically, it will cover methodological theory, case study analysis, and survey practice. It is hoped that by combining theoretical instruction, case study analysis, and survey practice, students' research interests will be stimulated.
zh_law_content: 本课程将对社会调查研究方法进行初步介绍 以为马克思主义理论学科的本科生提供一定社会科学研究方法的指引 鉴于学校已有大量课程专门讲授定量研究方法 本课程将更多聚焦于质性社会研究方法的讲授 具体包括方法 论 社会调查方法 研究案例剖析 或调查实践 三部分 希望将理论讲授 案  （ ）  例解剖和调查实践三者结合起来 激发学生的研究兴趣

law_content: This course mainly teaches the social development theory of classical Marxist writers, the historical process of global modernization, and the evolution of development theories. It also covers the innovative development path and theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics and its contribution to the world. The purpose is to enable students to master the social development theory of Marxism and socialism with Chinese characteristics, grasp the basic knowledge of modernization and social development theory, and understand the laws of social development.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要讲授马克思主义经典作家的社会发展理论 世界现代化的历史进程和发展理论的演进 中国特色社会主义发展道路和理论的创新及其对世界的贡献 目的是使学生掌握马克思主义和中国特色社会主义的社会发展理论 掌握现代化和社会发展理论的基本知识 理解社会发展的规律

law_name: 马克思主义理论专业英语
law_content: This course is designed for undergraduate students majoring in Marxist theory, with the aim of improving their professional abilities in English language. The course selects English essays on classic Marxist writers' works for interpretation, analysis, and research, fostering professional English proficiency in terms of specialized knowledge, vocabulary, cultural background, and theoretical insights.
zh_law_content: 本课程是面向马克思主义理论专业本科生开设的 旨在提高学生专业能力的英语课程 课程遴选马克思主义经典作家作品的英文范文进行讲解 分析和研 究 从专业知识 词汇 文化背景和理论提点等方面进行专业英语素养培养

law_content: Argumentation is a sign of rational thinking. It is an important tool and method for seeking truth, clarifying thoughts, establishing positions, and refuting fallacies. The core of argumentation lies in the application of logic, which provides the basic principles for argumentation. This course introduces major argumentation methods and the logical thinking and techniques behind them. It showcases the rich means and tools of philosophical argumentation through famous cases in both historical and contemporary philosophy, and examines their applications in different branches of philosophy. The course analyzes how different logical principles and methods support or do not support these applications at the fundamental level. The purpose of this course is to enable students to grasp the main techniques of argumentation and provide them with appropriate training, laying a foundational toolset for future studies and research in various disciplines, especially philosophy.
zh_law_content: 论证是理性思维的标志 是探求真理 澄清思想 确立主张和反驳谬误的重要  工具和方法 论证的核心是对于逻辑的运用 逻辑提供论证的基本原理 本  课介绍主要的论证方法及其背后的逻辑思想和技术 其特点是结合历史和当代哲学中的一些著名案例 展示哲学论证中丰富的手段和工具 观察其在不同 哲学分支中的应用 分析不同的逻辑原理和方法如何在底层支持或不支持这些应用 本课的目的是让学生初步掌握主要的论证技术 经受适当的训练 为  将来在不同学科 特别是哲学 中的学习和研究打下一个工具性的基础

law_content: The reform and opening up is a great revolution initiated by the Communist Party of China, which aims at the self-improvement and development of the socialist system. Its purpose is to seek happiness for the people and rejuvenation for the nation under new historical conditions. Since the Third Plenary Session of the Eleventh Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the central government has made a historic decision to implement reform and opening up, ushering in a new era of reform, opening up, and socialist modernization construction. The Communist Party of China has firmly grasped the key of improving and developing the socialist system with Chinese characteristics, leading the people to overcome difficulties and promote comprehensive and coordinated reforms in various fields, rapidly enhancing the overall national strength, effectively withstanding the negative impact of the changes in the Soviet Union and Eastern Europe, and continuously promoting the healthy development of various undertakings in China. Socialist China stands proudly in the East and the world. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, with great political courage and wisdom, the Communist Party of China has proposed the overall goal of improving and developing the socialist system with Chinese characteristics and advancing the modernization of the national governance system and governance capacity, ushering in a new era of deepening comprehensive reforms and advancing the systematic, overall design of reforms, and creating a new chapter in China's reform and opening up. The Communist Party of China dares to break through ideological barriers and interests, with a focus on strengthening the system of the people's democracy, deepening the reform of the economic system, comprehensive reform of the judicial system, ecological civilization system, and defense and military reform, and establishing a national supervision system. The socialist system with Chinese characteristics is becoming more mature and complete, and it promotes the development and advancement of the party.
zh_law_content: 改革开放是中国共产党带领人民开启的一次伟大革命 实质是社会主义制度的自我完善和发展 目的是在新的历史条件下为人民谋幸福 为民族谋复兴  党的十一届三中全会以后 基于对党和国家前途命运的深刻把握 对历史发展 趋势的科学洞察 党中央做出实行改革开放的历史性决策 开启了改革开放和 社会主义现代化建设历史新时期 中国共产党扭住完善和发展中国特色社会主义制度这个关键 带领人民攻坚克难 以经济体系改革为牵引统筹推进各个 领域的体制改革 快速提升了国家综合实力 有效抵御了 苏东剧变 对我国  “ ”的负面冲击 不断推进我国各项事业的健康发展 使社会主义中国巍然屹立在 世界东方党的十八大以来 中国共产党以巨大的政治勇气和智慧 提出了完善和发展中 国特色社会主义制度 推进国家治理体系和治理能力现代化总目标 开启了全 面深化改革 系统整体设计推进改革的新时代 开创了我国改革开放的新局 面 中国共产党勇于冲破思想观念的障碍和利益固化的藩篱 重点加强了人 民当家作主制度建设 深化了经济体制改革 深化了司法体制综合改革 深化  了生态文明体制改革 深化了国防和军队改革 建立了国家监察制度 中国特  色社会主义制度日趋成熟定型 为推动党和国家事业取得历史性成就发挥了重大作用

law_content: Frontier Issues in Marxism is a restricted elective course offered to undergraduate students majoring in Marxist Theory at Peking University's School of Marxism, as well as to students in the Da Zhao Class undergraduate program. The course aims to help students gain a deeper understanding of the status of Marxist research in domestic and international academic circles, the focal points of scholarly debates, and to guide students in independent reading of relevant Marxist works. The course aims to enhance students' awareness of critical thinking and active exploration, and to improve their knowledge and research capabilities in Marxist theory. Please note that this course is offered for the first time in the first semester of the academic year, and classes are held only in the autumn semester of the academic year 2019-2020. The total number of class hours is subject to change.
zh_law_content: 马克思主义前沿问题 是为北京大学马克思主义学院马克思主义理论专业“ ”本科生及 大钊班 本科生开设的一门限制性选修课 该课程旨在帮助学生“ ” 深入了解国内外学界的马克思主义研究的状况 学界争论的焦点话题 引导学 生自觉阅读马克思主义相关著作 培养学生独立思考 积极求索的意识 提升  其马克思主义理论素养 科研能力备注 学年第一学期首次开课 仅在秋季学期上课 实际上课时（ ：２０１９—２０２０  长 学时

law_content: The course aims to train students in the methods of discovering, observing, and analyzing human communication activities. The course consists of three main parts, namely the methodological foundation and framework of communication studies, methods of data observation and collection, and techniques for data analysis and processing.
zh_law_content: 课程旨在训练学生发现 观察和分析人类传播活动的方法 课程包括三大部分 即传播学研究的方法论基础与方法体系 资料观察与搜集的方法 资料分 ； ；析与处理技术

law_content: This course is a compulsory course for undergraduate students in the School of Journalism and Communication. It aims to systematically introduce the basic norms of communication ethics and communication laws and regulations in China, so that students can acquire comprehensive knowledge in this field. The course also aims to cultivate students' healthy professional qualities and concepts in communication ethics and law. The teaching of this course particularly emphasizes the historical conditions, social conditions, and institutional conditions under which China's communication ethics and laws and regulations are formed. The course covers: 1) the basic norms of China's communication ethics and laws and regulations, 2) the current implementation status of China's communication ethics and laws and regulations, 3) some thoughts on improving China's communication ethics and laws and regulations.
zh_law_content: 本课程是新闻与传播学院本科生的必修课 旨在系统介绍我国传播伦理与传播法律 法规的基本规范 使学生在修完本课之后 能够获得该领域整体的知  识 培养传播伦理与法律的健康 良好的职业素养和观念 本课程教学特别强  调：我国传播伦理与法律 法规形成的历史条件 社会条件与制度条件１．   ；我国传播伦理与法律 法规的基本规范２．  ；我国传播伦理与法律 法规实施现状３．  ；完善我国传播伦理与法律 法规的一些思考

law_content: In the subject of journalism, the practical aspects of news, which are directly related to the dissemination of news information, including gathering, writing, editing, and evaluating news, have always been regarded as the most fundamental and important professional fields. In this field, the interview and writing of news not only cover the entire process of gathering and writing news information but also provide the material basis for the effectiveness of news editing and commentary. As a compulsory course for journalism majors, the aim of this course is to systematically master the guiding ideology, basic principles, professional skills, and writing methods of news gathering and writing through a combination of classroom teaching and various extracurricular training, and to effectively improve the professional ability in news gathering and writing, thus laying a solid professional foundation for achieving high-quality news information dissemination.
zh_law_content: 在新闻学的学科内容架构中 与新闻信息传播直接相关的新闻实务 包括采 （ 写 编 评 历来被视为最基础也是最重要的专业领域 而在这一领域中 新  ）  闻的采访与写作 不仅涵盖新闻信息从采集到撰写的全过程 而且也是新闻编 辑和新闻评论得以发挥功效的物质基础 作为新闻专业的必修课程 本课旨 在通过课堂讲授与多种课外训练相结合的方式 使得同学们系统掌握新闻采访与写作的指导思想 基本原则 业务技巧 写作方法等 切实提高新闻信息采   访与写作专业能力 为实现高质量的新闻信息传播打下扎实的专业基础

law_content: This course mainly consists of chapters on the role positioning of news editors, the positioning and product design of news media, the planning and organization of news reporting, newspaper layout design, and the selection and processing of news manuscripts. It introduces contemporary news editing work and its main contents and internal logic. The course also explores various new phenomena and issues related to it, with the hope of enabling students to understand the basic characteristics and development trends of contemporary news editing work. Students will learn about the main contents and workflow of news editing work, and through the study of theoretical knowledge and practical training, they will acquire the theoretical foundation and initial skills for engaging in news editing work.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要分为新闻编辑的角色定位 新闻媒体的定位与产品设计 新闻报道 的策划与组织 报纸版面设计 新闻文稿的选择与处理等章节 介绍当代新闻  编辑工作的主要内容和内在逻辑 研究与之相关的各种新现象与新问题 希冀 使同学在了解当代媒介形态变化与新闻编辑工作关系的基础之上 认识当代新闻编辑工作的基本特点和发展动向 掌握新闻编辑工作涉及的主要内容及工作流程 并通过理论知识的学习和实际操作的训练 具备从事新闻编辑工作 的理论基础和初步的工作技能

law_content: To enable students to understand the basic development process and laws of China's news industry and comprehend the main development stages, institutional evolution, significant events, and influential figures in the history of China's news industry, it is essential to cultivate students' perspectives from a historical viewpoint and help them grasp the significance of China's journalism and communication industry.
zh_law_content: 使学生掌握中国新闻事业产生 发展的基本历程及规律 了解中国新闻事业史 的主要发展阶段 制度演变和重要的事件 人物 培养学生从历史的眼光看待  和理解中国新闻传播事业

law_content: This course is a compulsory course for journalism majors and a core foundational course for the School of Journalism and Communication. It will provide students with a broad perspective to help them understand the historical development and basic laws of foreign news communication, familiarize themselves with famous events, figures, and trends in the history of foreign news communication, and grasp the main issues existing in the current international news communication field.
zh_law_content: 本课程是新闻学专业的必修课 也是新闻传播学院的主干基础课程 它将以 广阔的视野 帮助学生掌握外国新闻传播事业发展演变的历史进程和基本规律 了解外国新闻传播事业史中著名的事件 人物 思潮 及当前国际新闻传播   领域存在的主要问题

law_content: Based on the theoretical foundation of previous research on audio-visual language, this study outlines the unique features of audio-visual language in China, including individual shots, the connection between shots, and the overall form of film and television works. It aims to explore the special expressive power of film and television works and cultivate the visual thinking ability of undergraduate students majoring in broadcast journalism. It also enables graduate students in communication studies to have a more thorough understanding of the characteristics of film and television culture by starting with the research on audio-visual language, providing a more professional knowledge background for the study and dissemination of film and television culture.
zh_law_content: 在归纳 总结前人关于视听语言研究的理论基础上 勾勒出具有中国特色的视 听语言特征 从单个镜头 镜头组接和影视作品的整体形式三个方面研究影视 作品的特殊表现力 培养从事广播电视新闻专业的本科生视觉思维能力 也 让传播学专业的研究生从视听语言研究入手 更透彻地了解影视文化的特征 为影视文化的研究 传播提供更专业的知识背景

law_content: Through this course, you can understand the basic concepts, basic process, editing methods, special effects, composition, and output of video and audio non-linear editing. You will become familiar with the basic operation process of commonly used non-linear editing software such as Final Cut Studio, Final Cut Pro (FCP), and Compressor. You will also gain knowledge of the interface, performance, and connectivity of video and audio equipment such as DVD Studio Pro. Furthermore, you will master practical skills in uploading video materials, video editing, sound effects, subtitle effects, color correction, packaging, composition, and video output.
zh_law_content: 通过本课可以了解视音频非线性编辑的基本概念 基本流程 剪辑方法 特效  合成和输出 熟悉在 中的 Ｆｉｎａｌ Ｃｕｔ Ｓｔｕｄｉｏ Ｆｉｎａｌ Ｃｕｔ Ｐｒｏ（ＦＣＰ）Ｃｏｍｐｒｅｓｓｏｒ等常用非线性编辑软件基本操作流程 了解视音频设备的接ＤＶＤ Ｓｔｕｄｉｏ Ｐｒｏ 口与性能 掌握视频素材上载 视频剪辑 声音特效 字幕特效 色彩校正 包装     合成 视频输出等实践操作的技能

law_content: Video interviewing and video writing are two essential skills for video makers. The purpose of this course is to enable students to grasp the intrinsic principles of video communication, to have a systematic understanding of the particularity of video creation, and to avoid weaknesses while highlighting strengths. This course aims to achieve the ultimate goal of video communication and provide theoretical training and practical experience for students' future frontline practice or academic research.
zh_law_content: 视频采访和视频写作 是视频制作者最为重要的两项基本功 本课旨在使学生 们掌握视频传播的内在规律 系统认知视频采写的特殊性 以避短而扬长 实  现视频传播的最终目的 为其日后进行一线实践或学术研究同时提供理论训练和实务经验

law_content: This course focuses on oral communication and emphasizes a comprehensive understanding and introduction of the basic theories, history, categories, and techniques of oral communication. It also involves in-depth analysis of selected outstanding domestic and foreign programs as case studies. The course combines theoretical lectures, case studies, observation, and practical training to enhance the students' comprehensive rational understanding and basic practical skills in oral communication. It aims to broaden their theoretical perspectives and improve their overall competence in the field of journalism and communication.
zh_law_content: 本课程立足于口语传播 重点将对口语传播的基础理论 历史 类别 技巧做全   面梳理与介绍 并选择中外优秀节目为案例进行深入分析 将理论授课 案例  观摩与实践训练紧密结合 以期提高新闻与传播专业学生对口语传播有全面的理性认知和基本的实践能力 拓宽理论视野 增强综合素质

law_content: As a core course in Radio, TV, and Film Journalism, this course aims to familiarize students with the history and main genres of documentary film, as well as the relationship between documentaries and special-topic films. From the perspective of creators, students will learn the creative concepts and techniques used in documentary filmmaking. Through appreciation and discussion of various works, students will gain an understanding of the creativity, filming, and editing strategies involved in documentaries. Additionally, emphasis is placed on practicality, where groups of three students are required to collaborate and complete a documentary film with a duration of no less than 30 minutes by the end of the semester. Due to limited class training hours, students are expected to utilize their free time outside of class to work on their documentaries. This experimental approach trains students in cognitive understanding of special-topic and documentary film creation, as well as skills in subject selection, planning, filming, and production.
zh_law_content: 作为广播电视新闻学的核心专业课程 本课程的内容和任务主要是让学生了解纪录片的历史发展和主要流派 认识专题片与纪录片的关系 从创作者的角 度学习纪录片的创作理念和实现手法 在作品赏析与讨论中了解纪录片的创意 拍摄和剪辑的基本策略同时 本课程重视实践性 要求三个学生一个小组在学期末共同完成一部 纪录片 时间长度不低于 分钟 由于课堂计划训练时数有限 该纪录片主 ３０  要由学生课后利用业余时间创作 实验主要训练学生对专题片和纪录片创作思维的认知 选题与策划技巧 拍摄与制作技能等内容

law_content: Introduction to Advertising is a fundamental course in the field of advertising. The purpose of the course is to introduce and explore the development process, overall landscape, and future trends of the advertising industry, in order to lay a foundation for further study and research. The course will combine case studies to examine the development models of the advertising industry at different stages, as well as the service and operational models of advertising agencies. This will help students gradually form a comprehensive analytical framework and thinking methods for advertising-related issues. The course particularly emphasizes the analysis of the development of the advertising industry in the Chinese context, as well as the challenges and changes brought about by the internet. Industry experts will be invited to participate in teaching, and visits to advertising service companies will be arranged, aiming to enhance students' understanding of the advertising operation process and bridge the gap between theoretical learning and practical application.
zh_law_content: 广告学概论 是广告专业的基础课 课程的意图是希望介绍和探讨广告业“ ” 的发展过程 整体概貌和未来趋势 为进一步的学习和研究打下基础 课程会  结合案例 通过对不同阶段广告业的发展模式 广告类服务公司的服务模式  经营模式的研究 帮助同学逐渐形成对广告类问题的整体的分析框架和思考方法课程特别强调对中国环境中广告业发展的分析 以及对互联网带来的挑战和变化的分析 以希望能够使课程学习更好地贴近广告业发展的实际 在 课程中 会安排行业专家参与授课以及广告服务类公司的参观考察 希望加强 同学对广告操作过程中了解和认识 弥补理论学习的不足

law_content: The course on the history of Chinese and foreign advertising is a compulsory course for advertising majors. The Chinese part of the course is divided into three sections: ancient, modern, and contemporary, systematically teaching the historical development and evolution of advertising in China from ancient times to the present. The focus of the course is on the changes in advertising activities and advertising ideology in China throughout history, as well as the introduction of Western advertising concepts since the late Qing dynasty and their relevance to modern times.
zh_law_content: 中外广告史课程是广告专业必修课 其中 中国部分课程分古代 现代 当代三个板块 系统讲授中国自古至今广告发展演变的历史 课程重点内容为广 告活动及广告思想在中国的古今之变 晚清以来西方广告理念的传入与现代

law_content: Introduction of basic knowledge and strategic planning methods of advertising media, related to industry practice. Introduce the development status and operating models of the advertising media industry, enabling students to independently observe and analyze the development of advertising media. Enable students to simulate strategic planning for advertising media.
zh_law_content: 系统介绍广告媒体的基础知识和策略规划方法 同时联系产业实际 介绍广告 媒体行业的发展状况和运作模式 使同学们能够对广告媒体发展进行独立观察和分析 能够模拟进行广告媒体的策略规划

law_content: Advertising Planning and Creative is a foundational course for undergraduate students majoring in Advertising. The instructors will design and organize the course content based on the professional characteristics of the students and the number of class hours each academic year. The main lectures will cover theoretical knowledge in approximately 7-8 sessions, followed by practice exercises assigned as homework. The remaining class hours will be used for group practice exercises guided and reviewed by the instructors. The course will be taught using multimedia materials to encourage students to combine the unique context of contemporary Chinese advertising creativity and conduct research-oriented thinking on the role and significance of creativity in advertising planning, the relationship between the advertising industry and the creative industry, creative thinking and its expression, and other specific issues. Specific topics include: Can creativity be taught and trained? This will help students understand how domestic and foreign design schools teach creativity. What is the position of advertising planning and creative in contemporary advertising strategies? What are the differences in the application and research of creativity in graphic design and advertising? Introduce relevant theories and encourage critical thinking and discussion. The selection and application of local creative resources, combined with the creative practices of both domestic and foreign contemporary advertising, will be explored, focusing on the expression and localization of Chinese elements in creativity using several local resources as examples.
zh_law_content: 广告策划与创意 是广告学本科生的专业基础课程 教师将结合每学年开《 》 课听课对象的专业特点及学时进行编排设计 次左右的大课讲授理论内７～８容 课后布置练习题 其余学时安排分小组练习并由教师指导讲评 课程采用  多媒体形式讲授 引导学生结合中国当代广告创意所面临的独特语境 对创意 在广告策划中的地位和意义 广告业与创意产业的关系 创意思维及其表达等 具体问题进行研究型的思考具体内容包括：创意 是可以教 可以训练的吗 将带学生了解国内外设计院校 创意１． “ ”  ？ （ “ ”课程是怎样教的 让学生自己来思考这个问题 ）；广告策划与创意在当代广告策略中的位置 中国平面设计和中国广告发展２． （状况为何 创意 的应用和研究 在平面设计和广告学中各有何不同 介绍？ “ ”  ？相关理论并思考讨论）；本土创意资源的选择与应用 结合中外当代广告的创意实践 思考 中国元３． （  “素 的创意表现问题 并以几种本土资源为例 介绍对创意的本土化应用问题”  进行的实践尝试

law_content: The game between private interests and public interests in public space under the empowerment of new media affects the development of advertising and public relations industry. Understanding the significance and mechanisms of communication requires exploration of public expression, public narrative, and public opinion. It also requires a deep understanding of power relations and the power that can be formed through emotional expressions in our daily lives.
zh_law_content: 新媒介赋权下私人利益与公共利益在公共空间中的博弈 影响着广告 公关业 的发展 这需要从公共表达 公共叙事以及公众舆论等方面了解传播的意义与 机制 也需要深入我们的日常生活中 对权力关系以及情感表达所能形成的力 量进行深入探讨

law_content: The main contents of this course include the following aspects: the relevant concepts, generation, and development process of brands; basic concepts and theories related to brand identification systems; the basic content of brand strategy; strategies for brand expansion and their advantages and disadvantages; methods for building brand assets and strategies for brand communication.
zh_law_content: 该课程的主要内容有以下几个方面 品牌的相关的概念 产生和发展过程 品：  牌识别系统相关基本概念和基本理论 品牌战略的基本内容 品牌扩张的策略 及其优劣 塑造品牌资产的方法和传播品牌的策略

law_content: This course is a newly launched one that primarily focuses on introducing and discussing new theoretical methods and applications of internet marketing communication. Through methods such as case discussions, students will be able to stay at the forefront, become familiar with application and strengthen their operational capabilities.
zh_law_content: 本课程是新开课 主要内容是介绍和讨论互联网营销传播的新的理论方法和应用 并通过案例讨论等方法 让学生立足前沿 熟悉应用 加强操作能力的训   练
