law_content: This course will discuss various rich physical phenomena and related concepts, theories, and methods presented in semiconductor materials and basic device units in semiconductor physics. The content mainly involves crystal structure, band theory, equilibrium carrier distribution, lattice vibrations and phonons, carrier transport, including excess carrier, junctions, and contact structures. The course will focus on the professional requirements in the field of microelectronic integrated circuits. In terms of content selection, the emphasis is on the main physical phenomena and theoretical foundations of semiconductor materials and devices related to mainstream semiconductor integrated circuit technologies, and efforts are made to reflect the latest research and development trends in related fields. The course aims to bridge the gap between general mathematical and physical foundation courses and professional courses in the field of microelectronics and VLSI technology.
zh_law_content: 本课程将讲授半导体物理学中半导体材料和基本器件单元中呈现的各类丰富的物理现象及其相关的概念 理论 方法等多个方面 内容主要涉及 晶体结   ：构 能带论 平衡载流子分布 晶格振动与声子 载流子输运 包括过剩载流    （子 结 接触 结构等 课程将针对微电子集成电路专业方向学）ＰＮ ＭＳ ＭＯＳ 生的专业基础需求 在课程内容的选择上 重点侧重于与主流半导体集成电路 技术相关的半导体材料和器件中主要物理现象及其理论基础 并力求反映相关领域最新的研究发展趋势 试图在通用的数理基础课程与 和微电子技 ＶＬＳＩ术领域专业课之间建立起联系的桥梁

law_content: One of the basic purposes of semiconductor physics is to provide students majoring in microelectronics with a fundamental course that focuses on the semiconductor materials and device physics related to mainstream semiconductor integrated circuit technology. It also aims to reflect the latest research and development trends in the field. The course attempts to establish a connection between general mathematical and physical foundation courses and the professional courses in microelectronics and VLSI technology, laying a necessary theoretical and knowledge foundation for students studying and researching in the field of VLSI technology. The "seminar" is a supplementary course specially designed for the teaching and learning of semiconductor physics. It will adopt a seminar format with teacher-student interaction, aiming to help students better understand and master the core content of the semiconductor physics course, understand the development trends and frontier issues in the discipline, as well as the limitations and challenges of related theoretical and technological development. It also aims to improve students' ability to apply basic physical theories and methods to research, analyze, process, and solve practical problems. At the same time, it will explore international frontier research topics and development trends related to semiconductor physics, inspiring and guiding students to develop their innovative thinking and potential. The course will include 18 theoretical units and frontier research topics related to the contents of the semiconductor physics course.
zh_law_content: 一 基本目的半导体物理 是微电子学专业学生的主干基础课程之一 将重点讲授与主流“ ” 的半导体集成电路技术相关的半导体材料和器件物理基础内容 并力求反映相关领域最新的研究发展趋势 试图在通用的数理基础课程与 和微电子 ＶＬＳＩ技术领域专业课之间建立起联系的桥梁 为将在 技术相关领域学习和研 ＶＬＳＩ究的微电子学专业学生 奠定必要的专业基础理论与知识方法 半导体物理  “研讨班 是针对 半导体物理 课程的讲授和学习而配套设立的新课程 该课” “ ” 程将采用师生互动的研讨班形式 目的是帮助学生更深入地理解和学习掌握半导体物理课程的核心内容 了解学科发展趋势和前沿问题 及相关理论和技 术发展的局限性和挑战 提高学生运用基本物理理论和方法 研究 分析 处理   和解决实际问题的能力 同时 还将探讨与半导体物理领域相关的国际前沿 研究课题与发展趋势 启发引导学生发展其创新性思维与创新潜力 二 内容提要本课程内容安排将包括 个单元 分别讨论半导体物理课程内容相关的理论１８ 与前沿研究课题内容

law_content: Digital Logic is a fundamental course in the field of microelectronics. It is based on digital electronic technology and involves the basic principles, analysis methods, and design methods of digital technology. Through this course, students can acquire the basic theory, knowledge, and skills in the field of digital technology, master the basic analysis and design methods of digital logic circuits, and develop preliminary problem-solving abilities in digital logic. It lays a foundation for subsequent courses on digital systems. The theory of digital logic is based on mathematical logic, especially Boolean algebra and sequential circuits. Digital logic can be divided into combinational logic and sequential logic. Combinational logic covers the analysis and design of combinational circuits, optimization of combinational logic, and standardized modular combinational circuits. Sequential logic covers the basics of sequential devices, standardized modular synchronous sequential circuits, analysis and design of synchronous sequential circuits, optimization of synchronous sequential circuits, and also includes basic knowledge. In addition, the course also covers hardware, ADC, DAC, description languages, and related knowledge.
zh_law_content: 数字逻辑 课程是微电子专业的专业技术基础课 它以数字电子技术为基“ ” 础 涉及数字技术中的基本原理 基本分析和设计方法 通过本课程学习 使   学生获得数字技术方面的基本理论 基本知识和基本技能 掌握数字逻辑电路 的基本分析和设计方法 使学生具有初步的解决数字逻辑问题的能力 为学习 数字系统的后续课程奠定基础数字逻辑的部分理论建立在数理逻辑 特别是布尔代数和时序机的理论基础之上 数字逻辑可分为组合逻辑和时序逻辑 组合逻辑讲授组合电路的 分析与设计 组合逻辑优化 以及标准模块化的组合电路 时序逻辑讲授基本  ；时序器件 标准模块化的同步时序电路 同步时序电路的分析与设计 及其优  化 和 基础知识也会在本课程中涉及 另外 课程中还会讲授硬件 ＡＤＣ ＤＡＣ  描述语言与 相关知识

law_content: This course focuses on the general and fundamental principles, analysis methods, and integration of devices, circuits, and system knowledge in the study of digital integrated circuits. It also incorporates laboratory experiments to enhance the understanding of theoretical knowledge. This course is designed for students majoring in microelectronics and related fields. It emphasizes the arrangement of basic unit circuit structures and the analysis of CMOS characteristics. By studying basic unit circuits, students will master the structural features and CMOS analysis methods of circuits.
zh_law_content: 本课程学习数字集成电路中普遍和基本的规律 分析方法 联系器件 电路与  系统知识 并配合上机实验加深对理论知识的理解 本课程对微电子 集成电  路等相关专业的学生开设 在课程内容安排上突出 基本单元电路结构 ＣＭＯＳ和特性的分析 通过基本单元电路让学生掌握 电路的结构特点和电路 ＣＭＯＳ分析方法

law_content: This course covers the fundamentals of simulation integrated circuits and systems, including various circuit analysis methods such as DC, AC, noise, feedback, and stability. The circuit structures include single-stage amplifiers, differential amplifiers, current mirrors, operational amplifiers, bandgap voltage references, layout, and packaging. The course includes classroom lectures, assignments, and laboratory design projects.
zh_law_content: 本课程讲授模拟集成电路与系统基础知识 要讲授的电路分析方法包括直流 交流 噪声 反馈 稳定性等 电路结构包括单级放大器 差分放大器 电流镜      运算放大器 带隙基准源 版图与封装 本课程包括课堂讲授 作业 以及上机    设计实习三部分

law_content: This course is a compulsory course for undergraduate majors in Microelectronics Science and Engineering and Integrated Circuit Design and Integrated Systems. It mainly teaches silicon-based integrated circuit manufacturing technology. The teaching method combines classroom lectures with practical experiences. The course has a total of learning hours and credits.
zh_law_content: 本课程为微电子科学与工程和集成电路设计与集成系统两个本科专业的专业必修课 主要教授硅基集成电路制造技术 采用课堂讲授与实践体验相结合的 教学方式 共 学时 学分

law_content: Probability theory and stochastic processes are fundamental theoretical courses for science and engineering students. It is a mathematical discipline that studies the objective regularities of random phenomena. With the development of science and technology, the ideas and methods of probability theory and stochastic processes have been widely and deeply applied in various fields, such as digital communication systems, signal processing, and control: theory, adaptive filtering, etc. The teaching of this course enables students to master the basic concepts of probability theory and stochastic processes, understand its basic theory and methods, and develop their ability to analyze and solve practical problems using probability theory and stochastic processes.
zh_law_content: 概率论与随机过程是理工科学生的一门基础理论课 是研究随机现象客观规律性的数学学科 随着科学技术的发展 概率论与随机过程的思想方法在以 下诸多领域中得到了非常广泛和深入的应用 数字通信系统 信号处理 控制：  理论 自适应滤波等等 本课程的教学使学生掌握概率论与随机过程的基本概念 了解它的基本理论和方法 使学生初步掌握处理随机现象的基本思想和 方法 培养学生运用概率论与随机过程分析和解决实际问题的能力

law_content: This course will cover the basic concepts of convex analysis, such as convex sets, convex functions, convex hull, subgradients, conjugate functions, convex envelopes, proximity operators, etc. On this basis, it will teach basic optimization methods, such as conditional gradient, coordinate descent, Karush-Kuhn-Tucker (KKT) conditions, subgradient descent, accelerated proximal gradient descent, Lagrange multiplier series, Frank-Wolfe algorithm, alternating direction method of multipliers, linearized alternating direction method, etc. It will also discuss dual problems, penalty function method, quasi-Newton method, stochastic subgradient method, etc. Lastly, it will introduce various techniques for problem transformation. This course is aimed at the needs of machine learning and will explain most of the theory and methods with derivations and proofs, and will use examples from the field of machine learning as much as possible. It requires a relatively high level of mathematical ability.
zh_law_content: 本课程将讲授凸分析的基本概念 如凸集 凸函数 凸包 次梯度 共轭函数 凸     包络 近邻算子等 并在此基础上讲授基本的优化方法 如 条件 坐标下   ＫＫＴ 降 次 梯度下降 加速 近邻梯度下降 算法 拉格朗日乘子系（ ） （ ） Ｆｒａｎｋ－Ｗｏｌｆｅ 列算法 交错方向法 线性化交错方向法等 对偶问题 罚函数法 拟牛顿法（  ）   随机 次 梯度法等 最后介绍若干问题转化的技巧 本课程将面向机器学习（ ）  的需要 会讲解多数理论与方法的推导与证明 并尽量选用机器学习领域的例 子 对数学能力要求较高

law_content: This course systematically introduces the basic principles and mathematical analysis methods of communication systems, including the components and classifications of communication systems, channels and capacity, analog modulation and demodulation principles, analog signal digitization and encoding, digital baseband transmission systems, digital carrier transmission systems, optimal reception of digital signals, several new types of digital carrier modulation techniques, and an introduction to communication networks.
zh_law_content: 本课程系统地介绍通信系统的基本原理和数学分析方法 包括通信系统的组成和分类 信道和容量 模拟调制解调原理 模拟信号数字化和编码 数字基带   传输系统 数字载波传输系统 数字信号的最佳接收 几种新型数字载波调制  技术 通信网络简介等

law_content: By studying this course, students will be able to correctly understand the basic theory and working principles of communication systems, and thereby gain knowledge about modern communication technology and its applications. The main content of this course includes fundamental knowledge of communication systems, analog linear modulation, analog angular modulation, analog signal digitization, digital baseband transmission systems, binary digital modulation systems, optimal receivers, multi-binary digital modulation systems, phase locking and synchronization principles, etc. The main features of this course are: emphasis on understanding and mastery of basic concepts, principles, and analytical methods; emphasis on understanding the physical meaning and physical imagery of theoretical problems; emphasis on application-oriented ability development; emphasis on cultivating independent thinking ability, scientific thinking methods, and the spirit of seeking knowledge and innovation; and strengthening the theoretical foundation and professional background to expand the depth and breadth of knowledge.
zh_law_content: 通过本课程的学习 使学生能够正确理解通信系统的基本理论和工作原理 进 而能够了解现代通信技术及其应用 本课程的主要内容包括通信系统的基础知识 模拟线性调制 模拟角度调制 模拟信号数字化 数字基带传输系统 二    进制数字调制系统 最佳接收机 多进制数字调制系统 锁相与同步基本原理  等本课程的主要特色为：重视基本概念 基本原理和基本分析方法的理解与掌握１．  重视理论问题的物理含义和物理图像的理解与掌握２． 重视理论结合实际的应用能力培养３． 重视独立思考能力 科学思维方法和求知创新精神的培养４．  强化理论基础和专业背景 拓展知识面的深度和广度

law_content: Digital signal processing is an important fundamental course in the field of information and communication. It focuses on digital signals and systems, analyzing and studying them from the perspective of signals and systems. The main contents include concepts of digital signal processing, discrete Fourier transform, fast Fourier transform, digital filter structures, digital filter design, multi-rate FIR, and finite word length effects in digital signal processing.
zh_law_content: 数字信号处理是信息与通信类学科的一门重要的专业基础课 它是以数字信号和数字系统为讲授对象 从信号与系统的角度对数字信号与数字系统进行分析和研究 主要内容包括 数字信号处理概念 离散傅立叶变换 快速傅立 ：  叶变换 数字滤波器结构 数字滤波器设计 数字滤波器设计 多速率 Ｒ ＦＩＲ 数字信号处理 有限字长效应

law_content: This course is a compulsory course for undergraduate students majoring in computer science in the second semester of the second year. Its purpose is to enable students to master the basic knowledge of computational theory, including the principles and methods of computational models such as Turing machines. The requirements for students include mastering automata, regular languages, pushdown automata, context-free grammars, and the basic principles of Turing machines. Understanding ideas of computability, computational complexity, completeness, etc. (NP, PSPACE) and proof methods, having a basic understanding of circuit complexity, random computation, and other important computational models.
zh_law_content: 本课程是计算机科学专业本科生二年级下学期开设的专业必修课 其目的是使学生掌握计算理论的基础知识 图灵机等计算模型的基本原理和方法 对学生的要求包括 掌握自动机 正则语言 下推自动机 上下文无关文法 图灵：    机等的基本原理 理解可计算性 计算难解性 完全性 等 的思想  （ＮＰ ＰＳＰＡＣＥ ）和证明方法 对电路复杂性 随机计算 以及其他重要计算模型有基本了解

law_content:
Any computer must load the corresponding operating system before it can constitute a functioning computer system. The performance of the operating system determines the overall system performance. The reliability of the operating system itself determines the security and reliability of the entire system. The operating system is the core of software technology and the fundamental platform for operation. Therefore, students in related majors must learn and master the basic principles and professional knowledge of operating systems. The objectives of this course are as follows: 
1. Master the basic concepts, functional components, system structure, and running environment of operating systems. 
2. Familiarize and apply the working principles, design methods, and implementation technologies of operating systems. 
3. Understand the evolutionary process of operating systems, research trends, new technologies, and new ideas. 
4. Understand various representative and typical examples of operating systems. 
5. Cultivate the basic abilities of problem discovery, problem definition, problem-solving, and result evaluation to become innovative individuals. 
6. Lay a solid foundation for subsequent courses and future development.
zh_law_content: 任何计算机都必须在加载相应的操作系统之后 才能构成一个可以运转的计算机系统 操作系统的性能高低 决定了整体系统的性能 操作系统本身的安  ；全可靠程度 决定了整个系统的安全性和可靠性 操作系统是软件技术的核 心和基础运行平台 因此 相关专业的学生必须学习和掌握操作系统的基本 原理和专业知识 本课程的目的如下 ：掌握操作系统的基本概念 功能组成 系统结构及运行环境１．   熟悉并运用操作系统工作原理 设计方法和实现技术２．  了解操作系统的演化过程 发展研究动向 新技术 以及新思想３．    理解各种有代表性的 典型的操作系统实例４．  培养发现问题 界定问题 解决问题 评估结果的基本能力 成为创新型人５．    才为后续课程打下良好基础 为后续发展奠定基石

law_content: This course covers the design and implementation methods of compilers, with a focus on the ideas and techniques used to translate high-level language programs into various machine languages. The main topics include lexical analysis, syntax analysis, syntax-directed translation, intermediate code generation, and code optimization. These ideas and techniques are not only used in compiler construction, but also widely applied in various other computer fields. This course consists of theoretical lectures and practical exercises, aiming to help students understand and master the theories discussed in class through hands-on compiler construction.
zh_law_content: 本课程讲述编译器的设计和实现方法 其核心是一系列用于将高级语言程序翻译成各类机器语言的思想和技术 主要包括词法分析 语法分析 语法制导  翻译 中间代码生成 代码优化等 这些思想和技术除用于构造编译器以外还广泛用于多个其他计算机领域 本课程包括理论讲述和上机实习两部分 目的是通过上机构造编译器帮助同学们理解和掌握课堂讲述的理论

law_content: This course introduces the basic concepts, ideas, and methods of artificial intelligence (AI) as well as the latest advances in various research areas of AI. It incorporates specific robot research platforms and experimental environments to design corresponding AI project topics. It also encourages the selection of self-chosen topics based on the course content, and conducts project research in the form of team collaboration, aiming to deepen students' understanding of related content and emphasize practical and hands-on abilities as well as cultivate their research skills. The course mainly includes the following topics: basic concepts and important advances in artificial intelligence, problem-solving and knowledge reasoning, agent-environment perception and motion control, basic hardware architecture of an intelligent agent, software platforms for intelligent agents, search, planning, learning, logic and reasoning, game theory, and the ethics of artificial intelligence.
zh_law_content: 本课程系统介绍人工智能的基本概念 思想和方法 以及人工智能所涉及各个 研究方向的最新前沿进展 结合具体的机器人研究平台及实验环境 设计相应； 的人工智能课题题目 也鼓励结合课程内容的自选题目 以小组团队的形式开 展课题研究 以深刻理解相关内容为目标 注重实践动手能力的培养和科研素； 养的训练 课程主要包括以下内容 人工智能的基本概念及重要进展 问题 ： 求解与知识推理简述 智能体环境感知与运动控制 智能体基本硬件体系结 构 智能体软件平台 搜索 规划 学习 逻辑与推理 博弈论 人工智能伦理等

law_content: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence is a course that introduces the basic concepts, ideas, and methods of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and explores the latest advancements in various research areas related to AI. It combines specific robot research platforms and experimental environments to design corresponding AI project topics. It also encourages the selection of self-chosen topics related to the course content and conducts project research in small group teams, aiming to deeply understand the relevant content and focus on the cultivation of practical skills and research literacy. The main topics covered in the course include the basic concepts of AI and important advancements, problem-solving and knowledge reasoning, perception and motion control of intelligent agents, basic hardware architecture of intelligent agents, software platforms for intelligent agents, search, planning, learning, logic and reasoning, game theory, AI ethics, etc. The practical course of Introduction to AI serves as a complementary practical course of the Introduction to AI course, which includes series of practical courses such as AI games, computer vision, speech and audio, natural language processing, data intelligence, intelligent robots, etc.
zh_law_content: 人工智能引论课程介绍人工智能的基本概念 思想和方法 以及人工智能所涉 及各个研究方向的最新前沿进展 结合具体的机器人研究平台及实验环境 设； 计相应的人工智能课题题目 也鼓励结合课程内容的自选题目 以小组团队的 形式开展课题研究 以深刻理解相关内容为目标 注重实践动手能力的培养和； 科研素养的训练 课程主要包括以下内容 人工智能的基本概念及重要进 ：展 问题求解与知识推理简述 智能体环境感知与运动控制 智能体基本硬件  体系结构 智能体软件平台 搜索 规划 学习 逻辑与推理 博弈论 人工智能      伦理等本课程人工智能引论实践课为人工智能引论课程的配套实践课 包括 博 ＡＩ弈 计算机视觉 言语与听觉 自然语言处理 数据智能 智能机器人等系列实    践课程

law_content: This course is a professional foundation course for the majors of Computer Science and Technology and Software Engineering. It aims to systematically introduce the methods, technologies, and tools for the development, maintenance, and project management of software systems, and cultivate students' abilities in software development, software maintenance, and project management, especially in requirements capturing and analysis, software design and construction, software testing, etc. It enables students to flexibly apply software engineering methods, technologies, and tools to create high-quality software products. The objectives of the software engineering course are as follows: to enable students to master the basic ideas of software engineering, including software engineering goals, software engineering principles, and software engineering activities; to enable students to master the methods of software development and maintenance, understand the software development process and software project management basics; to cultivate students' ability in software development and maintenance through case teaching and course practices; to cultivate students' awareness of software project management, that is, planning and management of work quality, cost, schedule, and personnel for a software project; to cultivate students' engineering qualities, innovative spirit, and team spirit.
zh_law_content: 本课程是计算机科学与技术专业和软件工程专业的专业基础课程 旨在系统地介绍软件系统的开发 维护和项目管理的方法 技术和工具 培养学生在软  件开发 软件维护 项目管理等方面 尤其是需求捕获与分析 软件设计和构   造 软件测试等方面的能力 使得学生能够在软件开发中灵活应用软件工程方 法 技术和工具 创建高质量的软件产品  软件工程的课程目标如下：使学生掌握软件工程的基本思想 包括软件工程目标 软件工程原则及软１．  件工程活动使学生掌握软件开发和维护的方法 了解软件开发过程和软件项目管理的２． 基础知识 通过案例教学和课程实践培养学生软件开发和维护的能力 通过课程实践 培养学生软件项目管理的意识 即对一个软件项目的工作３．  量 成本 进度和人员的计划和管理  培养学生的工程素质 创新精神和团队精神

law_content: This course covers the following topics: taking the software lifecycle as the main theme, systematically teaching the essence of software, the basic ideas of software engineering, and mainstream methods using new generation information technology, targeting emerging application models, and following typical software development organizational patterns. It guides students to develop medium-sized new software systems in a team-oriented manner, applying software engineering principles, methods, techniques, and tools for software development, management, and maintenance. It helps students gain a preliminary understanding and application of problem-driven software engineering knowledge through project internships. It aims to enhance creative thinking and innovation abilities, cultivate basic qualities and practical skills in software engineering.
zh_law_content: 本课程覆盖以下内容：以软件生命周期为主线 系统化讲授软件的本质 软件工程的基本思想和１．  主流方法采用新一代信息技术 面向新兴应用模式 按照典型的软件开发组织模式２．  引导学生以团队合作的方式 开发中等规模的新型软件系统 应用软件工程原 则 方法 技术及工具进行软件的开发 管理和维护   帮助学生通过项目实习 体会 初步掌握和应用问题驱动的软件工程知识３．   提高创造思维和创新能力 培养软件工程基本素质和实践能力

law_content: Software testing is one of the important means to ensure software quality. This course will introduce the basic theory of software testing, so that undergraduate students in computer science have the necessary knowledge foundation for software development process and lay a solid testing foundation for future research work.
zh_law_content: 软件测试是保障软件质量的重要途径之一 本课程将介绍软件测试的基本理论 使得计算机系本科生具备软件开发过程中必要的测试知识基础 也为未来 的科研工作打好测试基础

law_name: 智能电子系统设计与实践
law_content: This course is a compulsory course in the research and innovation level of the curriculum system of Electronic Information Science and Engineering of Peking University. The aim is to cultivate students' comprehensive research and experimental ability and innovative consciousness. Students are required to use their theoretical knowledge and experimental skills to comprehensively implement a complete intelligent electronic system in teams of three. Typically, the work includes an intelligent hardware prototype with intelligent interconnection capability and intelligent sensing capability, and a mobile or cloud-based application software with intelligent cognitive signal processing capability. This provides innovative solutions for various practical problems in reality or demonstrates new technology prototypes for leading future information industry applications. The course combines classroom and laboratory teaching, and is divided into three levels: theoretical teaching, practice, and self-directed projects. The self-directed projects are mainly implemented through open-ended laboratory teaching. The course adopts a project-driven self-directed design and development format, requiring teamwork and collaboration among the three team members to complete an intelligent electronic system project. During the course implementation, emphasis is placed on student-centeredness, fully exerting the teamwork and self-learning initiatives. By setting several key milestones, the teacher plays a role of supervision, inspection, and mentoring. After going through the whole process of overall scheme design, detailed system design, circuit welding, PCB testing, cloud system debugging, prototype system testing, and full-stack development practice, the final project demonstration and defense acceptance will be completed through project defense.
zh_law_content: 本课程作为北京大学电子信息科学与工程课程体系中研究创新层次的必修课程 目的是培养学生的综合 研究实验能力和创新意识 要求学生综合利用学  过的理论知识和实验技能 三人组队去实现一个完整的智能电子系统 作品通 常包括一个具有智能互联能力和智能感知能力的智能硬件原型和一个具有智能认知信号处理能力的手机端或云端应用软件两个部分 从而为现实中的各种实际问题提供创新的解决方案 或者为引领未来的信息产业应用提供新的技术演示原型本课程采用课堂和实验教学相结合 分为理论教学 实践和自主项目三个 ＤＩＹ层次 其中自主项目是以开放式实验教学为主的教学方式 课程采用项目驱 动的自主设计和开发的形式 要求三人组队 分工合作完成一个智能电子系统 项目 在课程实施过程中 强调以学生为中心 充分发挥团队合作和自主学习  的主动性 通过设置若干关键节点 教师只起到监督 检查 答疑的导师作用    学生在经过了总体方案设计 系统详细设计 设计制作 单元电路焊接调 ＰＣＢ 试 端云系统联调 原型系统测试的软硬件全流程 全栈开发实践后 最后将通   过项目答辩的方式 完成项目的实际演示和答辩验收

law_content: Introduction to Machine Learning is a course that covers the basic concepts, fundamental theories, and methods of machine learning, with a focus on the main models and algorithms. One distinctive feature of this course is the equal emphasis on theoretical approaches and engineering practice. Another feature is that the course involves interdisciplinary knowledge, where various mathematical theories are applied to model practical problems and different algorithms are used to solve these problems. Typical tasks in machine learning are explained during the teaching process, aiming to stimulate students' curiosity and interest, and cultivate their ability to solve practical problems and engage in comprehensive innovation.
zh_law_content: 机器学习概论 是一门讲授机器学习基本概念 基础理论和方法 主要模型“ ”  和算法的课程 本课程的一个特点是理论方法讲解和工程实践并重 另外一 个特点是该课程涉及多学科交叉 因此 本课程按照从实际问题出发 运用各  类数学理论方法对问题建模 采样不同的算法进行问题求解的思路 对机器学 习中的典型任务进行讲解 在教学过程中激发学生的好奇心和兴趣 培养学生 解决实际问题和综合创新的能力

law_content: This course is designed for first-year undergraduate students and is the preferred course for students in the School of Information Science and Technology before entering the laboratory. The experiments start with understanding basic electronic components and carrying out basic circuit soldering operations. Students will be gradually trained to master circuit installation, measurement, debugging, and other techniques. In addition, the course will introduce the use and operation of commonly used instruments such as multimeters, signal generators, and oscilloscopes. Based on these foundations, students will independently complete soldering and installation, debugging, and use of radios, as well as digital control experiments using development boards to learn about Arduino UNO, LED, and the use of analog interfaces on development boards. They will also learn temperature measurement and remote control of small cars using Arduino UNO, or the implementation of robotic arms for experiments such as gesture-controlled remote control cars. Through the completion of different automated and intelligent controls in electronic systems, students will be cultivated to develop interest, improve the fun, participation, systematicness, and productiveness of the experimental process, and lay a solid foundation for better understanding modern information science and the hardware control and implementation of intelligence.
zh_law_content: 本课程面向本科一年级学生 是信息科学技术学院学生进入实验室前的首选课程 实验从认识基本电子元器件 进行基本电路焊接操作开始 逐步训练学  生掌握电路安装 测量 调试等技术 同时介绍万用表 信号发生器 示波器等    常用仪器的使用和操作 在这个基础上 学生独立完成收音机的焊机和安装 调试 使用 开发板完成数字控制实验 声光控 灯 学习 Ａｒｄｕｉｎｏ ＵＮＯ ； ＬＥＤ ；开发板的模拟接口的使用方法 对环境温度进行测量 遥控小车Ａｒｄｕｉｎｏ ＵＮＯ  ；或者机械手的实现 完成手势操控遥控小车等实验 对电子系统完成不同的 自动 以及智能化的控制进行培养 使同学们产生兴趣 提高实验环节中的趣  味性 以及参与性 系统性 产品性 为学生更好地理解现代信息科学 以及智    能化的硬件控制和实现打下坚实的基础

law_content: This course is an important foundational course for majors in electronics and electronic engineering.
zh_law_content: 本课程是电子学 电子工程等专业的重要基础课程

law_content: Master the basic principles and methods of digital circuit and system design through theoretical classes, engineering practice, and small-group discussions. Possess the ability to independently complete the comprehensive design of a small-scale digital system. Learn the mathematical foundation, combinational circuits, finite state machines, principles of sequential circuit design, modeling methods, and system models. Through engineering practice and small-group discussions on hardware description language (HDL), gain a deep understanding and mastery of optimization design methods for digital systems.
zh_law_content: 通过理论课学习 工程实践和小班研讨 掌握数字电路和系统设计的基本原理 和方法 具备独立完成一个小型数字系统的综合设计能力 在学习数理基础  组合电路 有限状态机 时序电路设计原理 建模方法和系统模型的基础／ ／ ＨＤＬ上 通过工程实践和小班研讨 深入理解并掌握数字系统的优化设计方法

law_name: 数字电路与系统设计（实验班）
law_content: This course is a mandatory course in the undergraduate curriculum of electronic information. The main task is to familiarize students with the basic components of digital logic circuits, such as digital integrated circuits, SSI MSIs, and programmable logic devices, including their principles, functions, and usage. Students will also learn about the analysis, design, and development methods of digital logic circuits, and develop the ability to design, debug, and implement medium-scale digital systems. The course also aims to provide knowledge of the latest developments in the industry and cultivate students' ability in digital innovation, laying a solid foundation for future course learning and research. The emphasis of this course is on grasping the basic principles, analysis methods, and design methods of digital circuits, and exercising the ability to implement digital system design and application. The course requires students to work in pairs and complete a prototype design project of a medium-scale digital system, such as a breakout game, electronic keyboard music, smart fan, smart photo frame, or Amazon game controller, using development boards or FPGAs. The project will be evaluated through demonstration and presentation to enhance students' system design capabilities and promote innovative design thinking. In terms of expanding a forward-looking perspective and promoting teamwork and communication, each student is required to complete a presentation on a cutting-edge research paper, a disassembly of a digital product, and a summary of a course unit.
zh_law_content: 本课程作为电子信息类本科课程体系中的必修课程 主要任务是通过学习 使 学生熟悉数字逻辑电路的基本组件 如数字集成电路 ＳＳＩＭＳＩＭＥＭＯＲＹＡＤ／和可编程逻辑器件等的原理 功能和使用方法 掌握数字逻辑电路的分析ＤＡ  方法和设计方法 基本具备中等规模数字系统的设计 开发 调试和实现能力   了解产业界的最新进展 锻炼数字创新的能力 为后续课程的学习和未来科研 的创新打下牢固的基础本课程着重于掌握数字电路的基本原理 分析方法和设计方法 锻炼实现数字 系统设计和应用的能力 本课程要求两人组队基于 开发板完成一个中 ＦＰＧＡ等规模的数字系统原型设计项目 如下打砖块游戏 电子琴音乐 智能风扇 智   能相框 亚马逊游戏 控制器等 并通过演示汇报进行验收 从而锻炼系统 ＭＤＩ  设计能力和创新设计思维在前沿视野扩展和团队合作交流方面 本课程要求每位同学完成一篇前沿论文阅读分享 一款数字产品拆解和一次课程单元内容小结

law_content: This course is the first lab course for electrical engineering majors and serves as the foundation for subsequent electrical lab courses. It is a core course for undergraduate students in the Department of Electronics. Students in the electronics department are required to master various electrical courses including Introduction to Information Science and Technology, Fundamentals of Microelectronics and Circuits, and Fundamentals of Electronic Systems. While the courses Electronic Circuit Analysis and Design, Digital Logic Circuits, and Experimental Foundations of Electronics are more practical in nature, allowing students to apply their knowledge of electronics.
zh_law_content: 本课程是电类专业实验课程的第一门 是后续电类实验课程的基础 本课程 是电子学系本科生的专业核心课程 电子系学生需要掌握的电类课程中 信 息科学技术概论 微电子与电路基础 电子系统基础训练是概论性质 学生只  能了解电子学的知识 电子线路分析与设计 数字逻辑电路 电子学基础实验

law_content: This course will cover various optoelectronic devices and modern integrated optoelectronic technology. Students will learn the basic principles and engineering practices of optoelectronics, as well as current trends and developments in the field. Through this course, students will improve their ability to analyze and solve practical problems.
zh_law_content: 本课程将学习各种光电器件和现代集成光电技术 学习光电子学的基本原理和工程实践 了解该领域的当前趋势和发展 通过该课程学习 提高学生分析  和解决实际问题的能力

law_content: This course is a new course that integrates the fundamental content of two important courses, Circuit Analysis Basics and Signals and Systems. It aims to study the common and fundamental laws, analysis methods, and to understand how to establish mathematical models and solve them through appropriate mathematical analysis, giving physical interpretations and significance to the obtained results. This course is designed for students majoring in microelectronics and integrated circuits. In addition to the basic content such as circuit topology, analysis methods, basic laws and theorems, time domain analysis of continuous-time systems and discrete-time systems, Fourier transform, Laplace transform, and other transformations, this course also strengthens the explanation and practice of continuous system analysis methods, system function zero-pole analysis, and other related contents required for subsequent integrated circuit learning and research. Due to the widespread use of computer-aided design, this course also provides a brief introduction to important tools such as MATLAB/Simulink, reducing the requirement for manual calculation for complex circuits. This course intends to emphasize physical images and physical significance, and minimize mathematical derivation processes, hoping to lay a good foundation for subsequent learning and research.
zh_law_content: 本课程是将 电路分析基础 与 信号与系统 两门重要课程的基础内容融合“ ” “ ”到一起形成的一门新的课程 研究电路中普遍和基本的规律 分析方法 认识  如何建立数学模型 经适当的数学分析求解 对所得结果给以物理解释 赋予  物理意义 本课程为微电子 集成电路等相关专业的学生开设 除了电路拓扑  分析方法 基本定律和定理 连续时间系统和离散时间系统的时域分析 傅里  叶变换 拉普拉斯变换 变换等这些基本内容之外 还针对后续集成电路的 ｚ 学习 研究需要 加强连续系统的 域分析方法 系统函数的零极点分析等内  ｓ 容的讲解和练习 由于计算机辅助设计的广泛应用 本课程还将对  Ｍａｔｌａｂ／这一重要工具进行简要介绍 从而降低对复杂电路的手算要求 本ＳｉｍｕＬｉｎｋ  课程因涉及内容较多 拟淡化数学推导过程 强调物理图像和物理意义 希望  能为后续的学习和研究奠定比较好的基础

law_content: This course serves as a substitute for the core course of Semiconductor Device Physics in the original Microelectronics program, focusing on the development of integrated circuit technology. The course content is centered around the fundamental elements of integrated circuits, such as Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor Field-Effect Transistors (MOSFETs) and commonly used junction semiconductor devices like diodes and bipolar junction transistors (BJTs). The main objectives of the course are to help students understand and master the working principles, DC and frequency characteristics, and switching properties of these devices, as well as the analysis methods involved. Students will also learn about the commonly used models, equivalent circuits, and model parameters for these devices. Additionally, they will gain an understanding of the second-order effects that arise in small-scaled devices and the corresponding description methods. The course also highlights the development trends in device structures as technology nodes progress. The course design aims to meet the practical needs of professional research, focusing on the fundamental properties of the most widely applied devices in Very Large Scale Integration (VLSI) and providing the necessary physical foundation for studying and researching in technology-related fields of microelectronics. Besides the basic working principles of devices, the course emphasizes the cultivation of students' analysis methods for semiconductor device characteristics and the mastery of physical imagery rather than memorizing formulas.
zh_law_content: 本课程作为原微电子专业核心课程 半导体器件物理 的替代课程 根据集成“ ” 电路技术的发展 将课程内容聚焦在集成电路基础元件 金属 氧化物 半导 ： － －体场效应晶体管 和常用的结型半导体器件 二极管 讲述器（ＭＯＳＦＥＴ） （ ＢＪＴ）件的基本工作原理 以及在技术节点进步过程中器件结构的演变 教学的主要 目标包括：使学生了解和掌握集成电路中常用的结型半导体器件 化合物半导体器件和金属 氧化物 半导体器件的工作原理 直流特性 频率特性 开关特性及其分－ －   析方法使学生了解和掌握上述器件的常用模型 等效电路和模型参数２．  使学生了解和掌握上述器件在小尺寸条件下出现的二阶效应及描述方法３． 了解技术节点进步过程中器件结构的发展趋势课程特色：在课程内容的安排上将以满足专业研究的实际需要出发 着重讲述在１．  ＶＬＳＩ中应用最广泛的器件的基本特性 为在 技术相关领域学习的微电子学专 ＶＬＳＩ业学生进行 技术领域专业课的学习和研究提供必要的物理基础ＶＬＳＩ 除了讲述器件基本工作原理之外 强调培养学生对于半导体器件特性的分２． 析方法 强调对于物理图像的掌握 而不是对公式的死记硬背

law_content: This course is a core course in the Micro/Nano-Electronics Engineering program. Micro/Nano-Electro-Mechanical Systems (MEMS/NEMS) is an emerging interdisciplinary field involving various disciplines such as electronics, mechanics, materials, manufacturing, information, physics, chemistry, and biology, and encompasses many cutting-edge achievements in science and technology today. MEMS/NEMS refers to batch-fabricated devices or systems that integrate micro or nano mechanisms, sensors, actuators, as well as signal processing and control circuits, interfaces, communication, and power sources. The characteristic sizes range from micrometers to nanometers, while the devices and systems are at the millimeter scale. It has developed along with the advancement of semiconductor integrated circuit microfabrication technology and specialized ultra-fine processing and fabrication techniques. This course will start from the basics of MEMS/NEMS and strive to reflect the latest developments in the field, enabling students to have a systematic understanding of the theory and application of this field, providing the necessary foundation and guidance for future research in the field.
zh_law_content: 本课程是微纳电子学系专业的核心课程 微纳机电系统 （Ｍｉｃｒｏ／ｎａｎｏ－Ｅｌｅｃｔｒｏ是一个新兴的 多学科交叉的高科技领域 涉及电子 机－ｍｅｃｈａｎｉｃａｌ Ｓｙｓｔｅｍｓ）   械 材料 制造 信息 物理 化学和生物等多种学科 并集约了当今科学技术的     许多尖端成果 微纳机电系统是指可批量制作的 集微纳机构 微纳传感器   微纳执行器 以及信号处理和控制电路 直至接口 通讯和电源等于一体的微  纳器件或系统 其特征尺寸从微米到纳米量级 器件和系统是毫米级的 它是  随着半导体集成电路微细加工技术 以及特种超精细加工制备技术的发展而发展起来的 本课程将从微纳机电系统的基础知识出发 并力求反映相关领 域最新的发展状况 使学生对该领域能够从理论到应用有系统的了解 为未来 开展该领域的研究工作提供必要的基础和指导

law_content: This course introduces the important demand for electronic material technology development caused by the advancement of information technology, as well as the driving role of new materials technology in the development of microelectronic integrated circuit technology. The course will also discuss the correlation between the properties of advanced electronic materials and the development of microelectronic technology, as well as the technological challenges and possible solutions currently faced by research. This course aims to provide students with the necessary knowledge and technical foundation to conduct cutting-edge research in the field of advanced electronic materials.

law_content: Python and related data analysis software platforms are currently the fastest developing direction in the field of computer technology. This course introduces the language and programming knowledge and utilizes software packages such as Python, NumPy, and SciPy to perform specialized practical learning tasks in the fields of matrix decomposition, graph analysis, text mining, image processing, signal processing, and spectrum analysis. The aim is to deepen students' understanding and mastery of the use of relevant software packages through practical tasks. While implementing operations using strong models in Python, the course will also focus on explaining the fundamental data models and essence behind data analysis in various different fields, creating conditions for students to further delve into learning. In the later stages of the course, the theoretical foundation of neural network modeling will be taught based on the PyTorch platform and practical deep learning in the areas of computer vision, natural language processing, and signal processing will be covered. Emphasis will be placed on the correlation and evolutionary relationship between traditional data mining and data analysis and the latest deep learning models.

law_name: 数据结构与算法（实验班）
law_content: This course is an important computer foundation course for students majoring in science and engineering. It systematically explains the basic principles of data structures and algorithms, various basic data structures and algorithms, as well as the analysis of algorithm time and space performance. This course emphasizes the combination of theory and practice, guiding students to learn and apply data structures and algorithm knowledge to solve practical problems and write efficient programs, laying a solid foundation for future computer research and development. The content of this course includes the organization and implementation of basic data structures, such as lists, binary trees, trees and forests, graphs, efficient sorting and searching algorithms, data abstraction and problem solving. The basic design principles of this course plan can be summarized as emphasizing the training of basic data structures and algorithms, cultivating students' ability to analyze and solve problems using data structures and algorithms from the perspective of problem solving, and focusing on the cultivation of practical and engineering abilities, making students follow the normativity of software development and establishing a knowledge system for data structure and algorithm design and problem solving. The focus of the course is to grasp the knowledge system of data structures and algorithms from both breadth and depth perspectives, understand basic data structures and classical algorithms, and master theoretical abstraction and design methods.

law_content: The focus of this course is on the main components of the computer's internal structure and the connections between them. The main content includes the key points of the Von Neumann computer architecture, the process of executing computer instructions, analysis and comparison of currently popular instruction sets, the relationship between high-level language, assembly language, and machine language, the main arithmetic and logic operation methods and their implementations used by computers, the basic principles and key technologies of microprocessors, storage systems, and input/output systems. This course emphasizes the interaction between computer software and hardware, and pays attention to analyzing fundamental concepts based on real systems. It is a foundational course for undergraduate students majoring in computer science and related fields to understand and master computer organization and architecture.

law_content: "Circuit Theory and Design of Integrated Circuits" is a course that focuses on the devices and circuit structures of digital and analog integrated circuits, as well as their working principles and design methods. This course is based on the foundations of semiconductor physics and semiconductor device physics, and builds upon the topics covered in digital logic circuits and electronic circuits. It is an essential foundation for research fields such as system-level chips and micro-nano integrated systems. This course is the practical component of the "Circuit Theory and Design of Integrated Circuits" course, including practical exercises on inverters, full adders, amplifiers, filters, and phase-locked loop design, among others.

law_content: Natural language is the language we use in everyday communication, such as English and Chinese. Unlike programming languages, natural language is more difficult to analyze and process. However, natural language processing technologies, such as intelligent question-answering and machine translation, are being widely applied. Natural language processing is a course offered to undergraduate students and is interdisciplinary in nature, jointly offered by the Computer Science Department and the Chinese Department at Peking University. The course is taught by teachers from both departments, focusing on the basic ideas, concepts, and common algorithms of natural language processing. It encourages students to think deeply and gain understanding of relevant issues through discussions and comparisons. Building upon the "Programming" course, the aim of this course is to introduce students to the probabilistic and statistical foundations, linguistic foundations, and basic applications of natural language processing. Additionally, an introductory overview of hot topics such as machine translation and deep learning is provided. In addition to theoretical knowledge, practical tasks are also assigned in this course. Through the integration of theory and practice, we hope to cultivate students' innovative spirit and practical ability, and promote the comprehensive improvement of their knowledge, abilities, and qualities.

law_content: With the development of big data, information dissemination is gradually transitioning from a single text medium to a cross-media form that integrates images, audio, video, and new types of sensors. The data generated in this process is massive, heterogeneous, and interrelated. To break through the limitations of single-modal analysis and achieve semantic coherence across different modalities, it is crucial to draw inspiration from the cross-media properties of the human brain and enhance the intelligence level of computers. Therefore, multimodal learning has become a very popular research field in recent years. Universities such as Carnegie Mellon University and Georgia Institute of Technology have also opened undergraduate courses on multimodal learning. This course aims to introduce the theoretical algorithms and related applications in the cross-fields of computer vision, language, sound, and new sensors. The technical aspects involve deep learning-based single-modal representation models, including convolutional neural networks (CNNs), recurrent neural networks (RNNs), generative models, variational autoencoders, transformers, and generative adversarial networks (GANs), as well as their applications in independent representation of vision and language. It also covers basic mathematical concepts in multimodal representation learning, such as variation and mapping, modality alignment, and multimodal fusion techniques, including but not limited to multimodal autoencoders, deep canonical correlation analysis, multikernel learning, attention models, and multimodal recursive neural networks. This course will focus on their applications in understanding and reasoning in the cross-fields of vision, language, and sound, including multimodal pre-training models, cross-modal retrieval, and cross-modal generation.

law_content: Game theory is an important tool in the field of artificial intelligence, which mainly focuses on how intelligent agents make decisions and achieve equilibrium when interacting. Multi-agent learning further empowers intelligent agents to make adaptive decisions through continuous learning from interactions. In real-life scenarios, many problems can be modeled using multi-agent systems and can be solved with the help of game theory and multi-agent learning, including games, sports, and more.

law_content: This course will focus on the fundamental concepts and practices in the field of computer vision. What sets this course apart from most modern computer vision courses is that it not only introduces geometry and deep learning, but also emphasizes the systematic construction of computer vision concepts and their interrelationships. The first part introduces the underlying and intermediate visual concepts, including relevant theories and classic algorithms from the 20th century and the early 21st century. The second part covers geometry-related knowledge, including camera models and multi-view geometry. The third part covers contemporary statistical models, including machine learning basics, theories of statistical features in images, and probabilistic graphical models. The fourth part introduces some typical applications of deep learning in computer vision. The fifth part focuses on recent cutting-edge directions.

law_name: 计算系统建模分析与优化
law_content: Complex computing systems, such as integrated circuits, require a series of modeling, analysis, and optimization techniques. This course uses integrated circuits as an example to introduce the basic methods and tools for complex system design. The course covers techniques such as modeling, discrete systems, synchronous and asynchronous systems, automata, optimization techniques, linear programming, integer linear programming, analysis techniques, model checking, and consistency checking. The practical part of the course will give students hands-on experience with state-of-the-art tools such as SAT and SMT solvers. The course will be taught in both Chinese and English and is aimed at undergraduate students interested in chip design automation, embedded computing, and computational systems, as well as those with a research interest in academia. The study of this course has significant importance in helping students gain a deep understanding of integrated circuits, computer hardware and software design, and algorithm optimization for solving real-world problems, and establishing a comprehensive and scientific knowledge system.
zh_law_content: 复杂的计算系统 如集成电路需要一系列的建模 分析 优化技术 本课程以   集成电路为例 介绍了复杂系统设计的基本方法和工具 本课程内容包括 建  ：模技术 离散系统 同步和异步系统 自动机 优化技术 线性规划 整数线性（   ） （ 规划 分析技术 模型检查 一致性检查 实习部分将使学生接 ＳＡＴ ＳＭＴ） （  ）触到最先进的工具 本课程将采用中英文双语教学 面向对芯片设计自动化 嵌入式计算 计算系统感兴趣的 并对科研学术有一定兴趣的本科生ＥＤＡ   本课程的学习对于帮助学生深入理解集成电路 计算机软硬件 设计并优化算 法 解决实际问题 建立全面科学的知识体系 具有重要的意义

law_content: This course is an introductory course on visual computing and interaction. The main objectives of this course include two aspects. Firstly, through the introduction of basic principles of visual computing and interaction, students will establish visual thinking and gain understanding and mastery of relevant knowledge and basic methods. Secondly, through the introduction of new developments in visual computing and interaction, combined with programming and tool practice, students will be trained in simulation, visualization, and visual thinking skills.
zh_law_content: 本课程为可视计算与交互导论性课程 该课程的主要目的包括两个方面 首 ：先 通过对可视计算与交互基本原理的介绍 使学生建立视觉思维  （ｖｉｓｕａｌ了解和掌握相关知识和基本方法 其次 通过对可视计算与交互最ｔｈｉｎｋｉｎｇ） ； 新进展的介绍 辅以编程和工具实践方式 培养学生仿真模拟 可视化与视觉

law_content: This course provides targeted instruction in the mathematical foundations commonly used in artificial intelligence, including matrix theory, probability and statistics, and advanced mathematical analysis. The advanced matrix theory content includes matrix norms, matrix derivatives, singular value decomposition, and matrix eigenvalue extraction using power iteration. The probability and statistics foundation covers random events, conditional probability, Bayes' formula, independent random variables, mathematical expectation, variance, point estimation, maximum likelihood estimation, hypothesis testing, and maximum a posteriori probability estimation. The course also includes the laws of large numbers, central limit theorem, linear regression analysis, concentration inequalities, and advanced mathematical analysis topics such as basic set theory, graph theory, completeness of real numbers, Banach spaces, and Hilbert spaces.
zh_law_content: 本课程针对性地讲授人工智能中常用的数学基础知识 包括矩阵论 概率与统 计基础 和高级数学分析基础高级矩阵论内容主要包括矩阵范数 矩阵导数 奇异值分解 幂法求解矩阵特  征值 概率与统计基础包括随机事件 条件概率 贝叶斯公式 随机变量独立   性 数学期望 方差 矩 点估计 极大似然估计 假设检验 最大后验概率估计       大数定律 中心极限定理 线性回归分析 集中不等式 高级数学分析内容主   要包括基础的集合论 图论 实数完备性 巴拿赫空间 希尔伯特空间

law_content: Understand the basic concept of common-sense reasoning, and be able to understand and solve challenging problems in computer vision based on common-sense reasoning. This course introduces relevant knowledge of common-sense reasoning, including how to use the functions of objects, physical laws, causality, utility, intention, and other factors for reasoning. The course will also introduce theories of mind and knowledge related to explainable artificial intelligence.
zh_law_content: 了解常识推理的基本概念 能够了解并解决基于常识推理的计算机视觉的一些挑战性问题 本课程介绍常识推理的相关知识 包括如何利用物体的功能  物理规律 因果关系 效用 意图等因素进行推理 本课程还将介绍心智理论   和可解释人工智能的相关知识

law_content: This course aims to help students develop a basic understanding of scientific research and cultivate good scientific literacy. It trains students in research methods and enables them to understand the cutting-edge research directions in the field of artificial intelligence. Specifically, this course will introduce important elements of scientific research and foster students' abilities in creative and critical thinking, problem identification and solving, as well as methods and habits of scientific writing, communication, and time management. It will also address knowledge regarding intellectual property and research ethics. Additionally, the course will introduce essential research programming tools, including command line usage, the use of powerful text editors, and taking advantage of the features offered by version control systems, which are often overlooked in conventional courses. Finally, the course will explore the frontiers of related research areas and provide opportunities for potential research mentors and outstanding students to interact and exchange ideas.
zh_law_content: 本课程旨在帮助学生建立对科研的基本认识和良好的科研素养 训练学生的科研方法 使学生了解智能领域的前沿研究方向 为深入科研实践做准备 具  体来讲 本课程将介绍科学研究的一些重要要素 培养学生创造性思维与批判 性思维的能力 培养学生发现问题和解决问题的能力 方法和习惯 培养学生  科技写作与交流 时间管理的能力等 同时 也介绍科研中所涉及的知识产权  和科研道德规范 该课程还会对基本的科研编程工具做介绍 包括命令行 强  大的文本编辑器的使用 使用版本控制系统提供的多种特性等常规课程可能忽略了的训练 最后 本课程还将介绍相关领域的前沿科研方向 并和潜在的  科研导师及优秀学生交流

law_content: Introduction to Natural Language Processing is a compulsory course for students majoring in artificial intelligence. The course aims to introduce the basic concepts and theories, classical tasks and methods in the field of natural language processing. The focus is on cultivating students' understanding of basic modeling methods and typical solutions in natural language processing, as well as how to use machine learning methods to solve common problems in this field. The course will follow the complexity of language structure, starting from the lexical level and gradually deepening to more complex structures such as semantics and discourse. Additionally, the course will introduce cutting-edge research achievements in the field of natural language processing, particularly in modeling techniques for large-scale text data, human-computer interaction applications, and cross-lingual, low-resource language understanding and generation.
zh_law_content: 自然语言处理基础 是人工智能相关专业方向的专业必修课 本课程旨在“ ” 介绍自然语言处理方向中的基本概念与理论 经典任务及方法 重点培养同学们掌握自然语言处理中的基本建模方法和典型解决方案 掌握如何利用机器学习方法来解决自然语言处理中的常见问题 本课程将以语言中结构的复杂度为主线 从词法层面不断深入 直至语义与篇章等复杂结构 同时 本课   程将通过专题报告等方式介绍自然语言处理领域的前沿研究成果 特别是在大规模文本数据的建模手段 人机交互应用场景 以及跨语言 低资源语言理  ／解和生成等方面

law_content: Understanding the history of artificial intelligence development, mastering knowledge representation and logical reasoning, searching, machine learning, reinforcement learning, and basic algorithms for game decision making. Establishing awareness of artificial intelligence ethics and safety, understanding basic tools, chips, and platforms for artificial intelligence, and being able to develop simple applications using artificial intelligence technology.
zh_law_content: 了解人工智能发展历史 掌握知识表达与逻辑推理 搜索 机器学习 强化学习   和博弈决策等基本算法 树立人工智能伦理和安全的意识 了解人工智能基本 工具 芯片与平台 能够开展人工智能技术简单应用开发

law_content: Materials Mechanics, as a fundamental mechanics course, has the characteristics of an introduction to solid mechanics. It covers the basic concepts of materials mechanics, such as tension and compression, torsion and bending, complex stress states, stability of compression members, and the energy method for elastic rod systems. The course mainly introduces the concepts and calculation methods of strength, stiffness, and stability of elastic members and rod structures, laying a foundation for subsequent courses.
zh_law_content: 材料力学课程作为一门基础的力学课程 具有固体力学引论的特性 通过材 料力学的基本概念 拉伸和压缩 扭转与弯曲 复杂应力状态 压杆稳定性 弹    性杆系能量法等内容 主要介绍弹性杆件和杆系结构在强度 刚度和稳定性方 面的概念和计算方法等基础知识 为后续课程打下基础

law_content: As a complementary experimental course for the course of Mechanics of Materials, the Materials Mechanics Experiment is a compulsory course for undergraduate students majoring in Mechanical Engineering, Materials Science, and Aerospace Engineering in the second semester of every spring semester. The course has a total of 1 credit and 16 hours. This course adopts an experimental teaching method as the main approach, supplemented by theoretical introduction. The theoretical explanation and experimental introduction parts account for 1-6 hours, while the experimental operation and report writing parts account for 12-14 hours. The course is designed to deepen students' understanding of the basic concepts of mechanics and fundamental theoretical knowledge, strengthen their ability to apply materials mechanics knowledge flexibly for strength, stiffness, and stability analysis, and cultivate their comprehensive abilities in solving complex engineering problems and team collaboration.
zh_law_content: 作为 材料力学 课程的配套实验课 材料力学实验 是每学年春季学期大二“ ” “ ”本科力 工 航的专业必修课 共 学分 学时 本课程采用实验教学为主   １ １６  理论介绍为辅的教学方式 其中理论讲解 实验介绍部分占 学时 实验操  ２～４ 作部分占 学时 设立基础实验和综合实验 以加深学生对力学基本概１２～１４  念和基础理论知识的掌握 加强培养学生灵活运用材料力学基础知识进行强度 刚度和稳定性分析的能力 培养学生解决复杂工程问题和团队合作的综合 能力

law_content: Advanced dynamics mainly introduces the preliminary analysis of dynamics, the theory of small vibrations, and the dynamics of rigid body three-dimensional motion. The theoretical and methodological aspects of analytical dynamics have significant applications in modern physics and engineering. It also serves as the foundation for later courses in the mechanical engineering major. The theory of small vibrations has important applications in modern engineering practice, while the kinematics and dynamics of rigid body three-dimensional motion are the theoretical basis for aerospace vehicles.
zh_law_content: 高等动力学主要是介绍分析动力学初步 微振动理论和刚体三维运动的动力学 分析动力学的理论和方法在现代物理与工程实际中有重要的应用 也是 力学专业后期课程的基础 微振动理论在现代工程实际中有重要的应用 而 刚体的三维运动学与动力学是航空航天飞行器的理论基础

law_content: Matter can be classified into two main categories based on their motion: fluids and solids. Fluids, unlike solids, can flow and undergo continuous macroscopic deformation. This includes liquids, gases, plasmas, etc., which are widely present and involved in the natural world and industrial technology. Air and water are the most common examples of fluids. Fluid motion typically has countless degrees of freedom and more complex flow patterns, requiring the concept of fields for quantitative description. The governing equations, known as the control equations, for fluid mechanics are partial differential equations with time and spatial coordinates as independent variables. Fluid mechanics primarily studies the static and dynamic states of fluids under the action of various forces, as well as the mechanical interactions and flow behavior between fluids and solid boundaries when there is relative motion. As an important branch of mechanics, it shares similarities with solid mechanics but also has unique characteristics due to the fluid nature.

law_content: Fluid Mechanics Experiment is indispensable for mechanical engineering students, especially for those majoring in fluid mechanics. This course helps improve students' ability to analyze and solve problems, enabling them to develop a profound understanding of typical fluid physics phenomena. The course covers classical fluid experimental methods and techniques, providing guidance for students to conduct experiments independently.

law_content: Fluid mechanics is an important foundational course for engineering, energy, aerospace, and mechanics disciplines. This course systematically introduces the basic concepts, fundamental theories, commonly used analytical methods, and relevant engineering applications of fluid mechanics. It aims to cultivate students' ability to analyze and solve basic fluid mechanics problems, laying a foundation for future study of specialized courses and engaging in related research work.
zh_law_content: 流体力学是工程 能源 航空 力学等专业的重要基础课 本课程的将系统地   介绍流体力学基本概念 基础理论 常用分析方法 以及相关工程应用知识 将   ；培养学生具有对基础流体力学问题的分析能力和求解能力 为今后学习专业课程 从事相关研究工作打下基础

law_content: The course of Engineering Elasticity Mechanics utilizes tensors as tools to systematically introduce the basic concepts, principles, and methods of classical elasticity mechanics. It emphasizes both the systematic, complete, and rigorous nature of the theory and its practical applications. The main content includes the theory of strain, the theory of stress, constitutive relationships, the basic equations of elasticity mechanics, and the solution of plane strain and torsion problems of cylinders.
zh_law_content: 工程弹性力学课程以张量为工具 系统阐述经典弹性力学的基本概念 基本原 理和基本方法 既注重理论的系统性 完整性和严密性 也注重理论联系实际   主要内容包括 应变理论 应力理论 本构关系 弹性力学的基本方程 平面问：    题和柱体扭转问题的求解等

law_content: The purpose of this course is to teach students majoring in Engineering Analysis at the Department of Mechanics, Peking University, relevant engineering knowledge and mechanical knowledge related to engineering loads, steel structures, reinforced concrete structures, and composite materials.
zh_law_content: 本课程目的在于给北京大学力学系工程分析专业的学生教授工程荷载 钢结构 钢筋混凝土结构以及复合材料的相关工程知识和力学知识

law_content: Structural mechanics and its matrix methods are one of the important basic courses in the field of engineering structural analysis. It mainly covers the methods for analyzing internal forces and calculating displacements in truss structures, as well as introducing matrix analysis methods suitable for computer processing, such as the finite element method.
zh_law_content: 结构力学及其矩阵方法是工程结构分析专业的重要专业基础课之一 主要讲授杆系结构的内力分析与位移计算方法 并介绍适合计算机处理的矩阵分析方法 有限元法

law_content: The relationship between energy and the environment can be divided into three parts. The first part mainly introduces the classification of energy and its relationship with socio-economic development. It discusses the traditional energy resources such as coal, oil, natural gas, and hydropower, including their resource quantities, production and consumption status. It also introduces nuclear energy, solar energy, geothermal energy, wind energy, ocean energy, and tidal energy.
zh_law_content: 以能源和环境的关系为主线 内容可分为三部分 第一部分主要介绍能源的 分类 能源和社会经济发展的关系 煤炭 石油 天然气和水能资源等传统能源   的资源量 生产和消费状况 并介绍了核能 太阳能 地热能 风能 海洋能 潮

law_content: Heat and Mass Transfer is a scientific study of the laws of heat and mass transfer. It is a fundamental course in the field of energy and power engineering. This course is designed for undergraduate students and aims to introduce the basic knowledge and theories of heat transfer. It focuses on the three basic modes of heat transfer, namely conduction, convection, and radiation, and seeks to provide students with a deep understanding of these concepts. The course also emphasizes the mastery of analytical, experimental, and numerical methods for analyzing and solving heat transfer problems. Additionally, practical applications in engineering, such as heat exchangers, are introduced to help students develop analytical skills and independent analysis capabilities.
zh_law_content: 传热传质学是研究热量及质量传递规律的科学 是能源与动力工程类专业的基础课程 本课程是针对本科学生开展的基础理论型课程 以介绍传热学基 础知识和理论为目标 对热量传递的三种基本方式 即导热 对流 辐射进行深   入讨论 重点引导学生理解概念 掌握通过实验方法 解析方法以及数值方法  对传热问题进行分析求解的方法 同时结合实际 引入工程领域内的应用实 例 比如换热器等 引导学生学习研究思维和方法 掌握对应用实例独立分析  的能力

law_content: Energy and its utilization are the material basis for human survival. The main form through which humans obtain energy from the natural world is thermal energy. The rational and effective utilization of thermal energy is the core and main body of the entire energy utilization. Engineering thermodynamics is a scientific discipline that studies the laws of thermal energy interconversion with other forms of energy. It is a continuous development and improvement of the experience and summary of energy utilization. Based on the efforts to deeply understand the nature of energy phenomena, this course aims to enable students to understand the latest developments and trends in energy conversion technology and engineering thermodynamics.
zh_law_content: 能源及利用是人类生存的物质基础 人类从自然界获得能量的主要形式是热能 热能的合理和有效利用 是整个能源利用的核心与主体 工程热力学是研  究热能与其他形式能量相互转换规律的一门科学 是不断地发展和改善能源利用的经验总结 本课程在力求学生深刻理解能源现象本质的基础上 让学 生了解能源转换技术与工程热力学最新的发展及其趋势等

law_content: New energy technology, as a representative technology of energy and resource engineering, is crucial for the future development of the national economy and the improvement of people's living standards. This course is based on this and teaches the basic theories of new energy applications, the structure and principles of new energy conversion devices, and their application technologies. Furthermore, on this basis, students will be able to understand the latest developments and trends in new energy technology.
zh_law_content: 新能源技术作为能源与资源工程的代表技术 对未来国民经济发展 人民生活 水平提高等至关重要 本课程基于此讲授新能源应用的基本理论 新能源转 换装置的结构与原理以及应用技术等 在此基础上让学生了解新能源技术最新的发展及其趋势等

law_content: Aerospace Information Engineering is a core research direction in the field of aerospace engineering. This course combines domestic and international aerospace engineering practices to extract key theories and technologies in the areas of aerospace information acquisition, organization, storage, processing, transmission, distribution, and application. The course aims to fill the gaps in students' knowledge in this field. The teaching methods include classroom lectures, literature reading, discussions, and presentations. Through this course, students will master the basic theories and technological systems of aerospace information engineering, understand the research hotspots and development trends in this field, and lay the foundation for their future scientific research and engineering practice.
zh_law_content: 航空航天信息工程 是航空航天工程领域的核心研究方向 本课程将结合国 内外航空航天工程实践 提炼出航空航天信息获取 航空航天信息组织 航空  航天信息存储 航空航天信息处理 航空航天信息传输 航空航天信息分发 航   空航天信息应用等核心理论与技术 作为课程主要教学内容 以弥补我校学生 在此专业领域知识体系的不足 课程教学以课堂讲授 文献阅读 讨论 报告   方式组织 通过本课程学习 将使学生掌握航空航天信息工程的基础理论与 技术体系 了解航空航天信息工程中的研究热点和发展趋势 为学生未来科学 研究与工程实践奠定基础

law_content: In order to further adapt to the development of aerospace discipline in the School of Engineering and the comprehensive cultivation of students, it is necessary to offer a specific foundational course for electrical specialties, control, navigation, guidance, human-machine engineering, etc. This course, based on the interdisciplinary characteristics of Peking University's School of Engineering and referring to the course offerings of Harvard University's School of Engineering, will strive to cover a broad range of electrical content, including lumped parameter circuit modeling analysis methods, basic analog and digital electronic circuit devices and related design methods, and aim to provide an overview of the fundamental theories of electricity within a limited number of hours. Topics covered include direct current circuits, circuit transient processes, frequency analysis methods for alternating current circuits and various circuits, diodes, transistors (including bipolar junction transistors and field-effect transistors), amplification, negative feedback, signal acquisition circuits, as well as basic analog and digital circuits, and the design principles of combinational and sequential logic.
zh_law_content: 为进一步适应工学院航空航天学科发展和学生全面培养的形势需要 专门开设一门针对航空航天学科中电类专业 控制 导航 制导 人机工程等 方向的（    ）基础课程 针对北大工学院多学科交叉特点 参照 大学工学院电子  Ｈａｒｖａｒｄ学课程设置 本课程将尽可能涵盖比较宽广的电学内容 主要包括集总参数电 路模型分析方法 基本模拟和数字电子电路器件和相关设计方法 争取在有限 学时内给工学院学生讲解电学基本理论整体框架内容提要 直流电路 电路的过渡过程 交流电路及各种电路的时频分析方法：  等 二极管 三极管和场效应管 放大 负反馈 采集电路等基本模拟和数字电    路以及组合和时序逻辑设计思想

law_content: Introduced the development process of aircraft structures and the evolution of design ideas based on energy methods. Introduced the basic thin-walled elements of aircraft structures, including closed and open thin-walled members, composite section members, plates, and shells, and discussed their stress and deformation characteristics, as well as corresponding mechanical analysis methods. Based on this, introduced the theory and methods for analyzing statically determinate truss systems and beam-plate composite structures. Then, discussed the structure.

law_content: This course mainly discusses the main principles of jet propulsion technology, the basic structure of aircraft engines, and the main design methods. The course will help students understand the main criteria for aircraft engine selection and familiarize them with the basic composition, main functions, and technical parameters of various components of aircraft engines. Students will also learn how to apply various basic knowledge in solving complex engineering problems. Through this course, students will be able to select power systems for different aircraft and determine the most important technical parameters for designing power devices for new flight systems.
zh_law_content: 本课程主要讲述喷气推进技术的主要原理 航空发动机的基本结构和主要设计方法 课程将帮助学生理解目前飞机选择发动机的主要准则 了解航空发 动机各个部件的基本构成 主要作用以及基本技术参数 学生也将学习在复杂工程问题中运用各种基础知识的方法 通过该课程的学习 学生将有能力 为不同飞行器选择动力系统 并能为新的飞行系统设计动力装置的最主要技术参数

law_content: The course focuses on providing students with a fundamental understanding of aerodynamics, with an emphasis on the application of this knowledge to aerospace engineering. The course begins with an introduction to the basic concepts, principles, and methods of aerodynamics based on classical fluid mechanics. In the application part, the course specifically explores the lift, drag, and moment concepts of airfoils and their roles in the aerodynamic design of aircraft, with reference to classical aerodynamic shapes.
zh_law_content: 课程以空气动力学基础知识为主 辅以飞行器气动力学知识 帮助学生加深对 基础知识及航空工程应用意义的理解 在基础部分 以理想流体力学经典内 容为基础 重点介绍空气动力学的基本概念 基本原理和方法 以体现课程的  基础性 在应用部分 结合经典气动外形 重点介绍翼型的升阻力 力矩等概   念及其在飞行器气动设计中的作用

law_content: Biomedical engineering is a newly emerging interdisciplinary field that combines principles and methods from traditional natural sciences such as physics, chemistry, biology, and mathematics, as well as modern fields like medicine and engineering. It applies principles and techniques from natural sciences and modern engineering to study human body structure, function, and various life phenomena at multiple levels, from molecular, cellular, and tissue to organ and systemic levels. Its main goal is to provide engineering solutions for disease prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, treatment, and healthcare, as well as reproductive health services. In summary, the development of biomedical engineering is closely related to modern high-tech advancements. It involves the integration of electronics, micro-nano technology, computer technology, materials technology, optoelectronics, radiation technology, and many other modern technologies, combined with the close relationship between modern biology and medicine. Its purpose is to study and develop engineering methods and technologies relevant to human health. This course is a mandatory course for undergraduate students majoring in biomedical engineering, aiming to provide a systematic and comprehensive introduction to the background, basic theories, applied technologies, and cutting-edge developments in the field. It enables students to have a good understanding and grasp of various directions in the field of biomedical engineering, and guides and cultivates their interest in the profession. It serves as the foundational course for students to pursue further studies in specific areas within the biomedical engineering field during their later years.
zh_law_content: 生物医学工程 是在物理学 化学 生物学 数学（Ｂｉｏｍｅｄｉｃａｌ ｅｎｇｉｎｅｅｒｉｎｇ ＢＭＥ）   等传统自然学科及现代医学 工程学等现代自然学科基础上发展起来的学科跨度很大的理 工 医相结合的新兴交叉学科 它运用自然科学和现代工程技  术的原理和方法 在从分子 细胞 组织 器官水平到人体系统的多层次上研究   人体结构 功能和各种生命现象 为人类疾病预防 诊断 监护 治疗 保健 康      复及生殖健康服务等提供工程技术手段 概括地说 生物医学工程的发展与 现代高新技术密切相关 它应用电子技术 微纳米技术 计算机技术 材料技   术 光电子与射线技术等以及许多现代技术的集成 与现代生物学和医学紧密 结合 研究发展与人类健康相关的工程方法和技术 本课程为生物医学工程专业本科生的专业必修课 目的是对学生在生物医学工程领域相关背景 基础理论 应用技术以及学科发展前沿动态进行系 统 全面的介绍 使学生对生物医学工程各领域方向具有较好的理解和掌握  引导和培养学生对生物医学工程专业的兴趣 是本专业学生在高年级阶段进入各专业具体方向学习的基础课程

law_content: The course of Molecular Cell Biology falls under the field of Biomedical Engineering. This course introduces the relevant knowledge of Molecular Cell Biology, including the basic understanding of cells, the structure and function of biomolecules, regulation, and homeostasis, as well as major advancements in technology.
zh_law_content: 分子细胞生物学属生物医学工程基础课程 本课程介绍分子细胞生物学的相关知识 主要包括细胞的基本知识 生物大分子的结构与功能 调控 新陈代   谢 以及主要的新技术

law_content: This course is a mandatory course for undergraduate students majoring in biomedical engineering. The prerequisite course is "Principles of Biomedical Engineering". This course is a foundation course for students to enter various specialized areas of study in their later years. Building upon students' preliminary understanding and mastery of background knowledge, basic theories, applied techniques, and disciplinary development in the field of biomedical engineering, this course adopts a problem-based learning (PBL) approach. Firstly, several PBL scenarios are designed based on real biomedical engineering problems in industrial and clinical applications. Under the guidance of the instructor, students work in groups to design and solve these real biomedical engineering problems. Through collaboration, division of labor, and repeated discussions within the group, students gain an understanding of the biomedical engineering knowledge implicit in the problems and develop skills to solve problems in the field of biomedical engineering. This course also cultivates students' teamwork, communication, and interpersonal skills, as well as their interest in various specialized areas. Furthermore, it lays a foundation for the subsequent study of various specialized courses in the field of biomedical engineering.
zh_law_content: 本课程为生物医学工程专业本科生的专业必修课 先修课程为 生物医学工程 “原理 本课程是基于问题学习 系列的课程之” （ｐｒｏｂｌｅｍ－ｂａｓｅｄ ｌｅａｒｎｉｎｇ ＰＢＬ）一 也是本专业学生在高年级阶段进入各专业具体方向学习的基础课程 在学生对生物医学工程领域相关背景 基础理论 应用技术以及学科发展 具有初步理解和掌握的基础上 本课程采用 的教学模式 首先设计若干 ＰＢＬ 在工业和临床应用中的生物医学工程学问题 将本课程的学习设置到这些复杂的 有意义的问题情景之中 学生在教师指导下通过分组 合作 来设计解   决真实性的生物医学工程领域问题的方案 通过小组内部的合作 分工以及 反复讨论学习 从而理解隐含于问题背后的生物医学工程专业知识 形成解决 生物医学工程领域问题的技能 并发展在本专业领域自主学习的能力 最终形 成解决这些真实性生物医学工程问题的设计方案 本课程的学习可以培养学生的合作精神和沟通交流技能 培养学生在各领域方向的兴趣 还将为后续的 生物医学工程专业各方向课程的学习打下基础

law_content: Biomedical signal processing is an important research field in biomedical engineering and is also a significant application area of rapidly developing digital signal processing technologies in recent years. It is the close integration of digital signal processing techniques with biomedical engineering that has provided new means for detecting, extracting, and clinically applying biomedical signal features, as well as deepening our understanding of the human body. This course first introduces the applications and characteristics of digital signal processing in the field of biomedical engineering, and then comprehensively teaches traditional digital signal processing techniques, including signal acquisition, time-domain and frequency-domain signal analysis, basic theories, basic signal processing methods, Fourier transforms, digital filtering techniques, etc., in order to enable students to master the basic digital signal processing techniques that can be used in the field of biomedical engineering. Finally, some examples of digital signal processing in the field of biomedical engineering are presented, and the frontier technologies in this field are discussed.
zh_law_content: 生物医学信号处理是生物医学工程学的一个重要研究领域 也是近年来迅速发展的数字信号处理技术的一个重要的应用方面 正是由于数字信号处理技术和生物医学工程的紧密结合 才使得我们在生物医学信号特征的检测 提取 及临床应用上有了新的手段 并且也能帮助我们加深了对人体自身的认识 本课程先介绍数字信号处理在生物医学工程领域应用的情况及特点 然后全面讲授传统的数字信号处理技术 包括信号采集 时域及频域信号分析的 基本理论 基本的信号处理方法 傅立叶变换 数字滤波技术等 以使得学生能   掌握基本的可用于生物医学工程领域的数字信号处理技术 最后介绍一些生物医学工程领域中数字信号处理的实例 并对该领域的前沿技术进行展望

law_content: The Fundamentals of Materials Science is an important foundation course for the Materials Science and Engineering major. It covers knowledge in material physics, physical chemistry, and materials thermodynamics. Through this course, students will acquire basic knowledge in the field of materials science and fundamental experimental skills. The main reference textbook for this course is "Fundamentals of Materials Science" by Professor Yongning Yu, published by Higher Education Press in 2006. The teaching content, combined with relevant domestic and foreign textbooks, emphasizes the basic concepts and theories of materials science, as well as showcasing the latest research achievements in related fields. It is based on the theory of metallic materials, integrating the content of inorganic non-metallic materials and polymer materials, highlighting the teaching of the commonality of materials. The course focuses on the relationship and variation laws between material chemistry, composition, microstructure, processing technology, and performance, systematically introducing the structure, crystal defects, crystallization and solidification, phase structures and phase diagrams, interfaces, diffusion in solids, materials thermodynamics, plastic deformation and recrystallization, phase transformations in materials, and their interconnections. For conceptually difficult and abstract teaching content such as crystal structures, crystal defects, plastic deformation, and phase diagrams, the advantages of multimedia teaching are fully utilized, including the use of images and 3D animations to enhance teaching effectiveness. During the teaching process, students are also organized to visit the college's characteristic laboratories to help them understand the characteristics of the materials discipline and cultivate their professional interest.

law_content: University laboratories are the main places for scientific research, where various unsafe factors exist. Learning about safety protection knowledge is an important guarantee for preventing safety accidents and protecting personal safety. This course will systematically introduce common laboratory safety accidents and prevention methods, including physical and chemical unsafe factors, handling hazardous chemicals, microbiological and biohazard material safety, fire safety, safety precautions in the workplace, personal protective measures, accident scene handling, and first aid methods.
zh_law_content: 大学实验室是科学研究的主要场所 存在多种不安全因素 安全防护知识的学 习是预防安全事故 保护人身安全的重要保障本课程将系统介绍实验室常见安全事故和防范方法 包括物理和化学不安全因素 危险化学品的处理 微生物和生化材料安全 消防安全 工作场所中   的安全注意事项 个人防护措施 事故现场处理及急救方法等内容

law_content: Materials Science and Engineering Laboratory is a basic experimental course for materials-related majors. The experimental content is guided by new " " materials and new technologies, aiming to embody the combination of materials science and engineering. It covers various aspects such as metallic materials, functional ceramic materials, semiconductor materials, polymer materials, nanomaterials and devices, as well as material characterization, etc. The course focuses on cultivating undergraduates' hands-on abilities, combining the development trends of materials disciplines, and the key research directions of our department, such as nanomaterials and micro/nano devices, new energy materials and devices, biomedical materials and devices, and organic polymers and their composites. It is designed with basic teaching experiments such as material microstructure observation and chemical elemental quantitative analysis, preparation and testing of nanomaterials.
